CREATE TABLE "obi"."actn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_actn" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_orig_actn" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"no_ncnf" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_pl_actn" integer NULL,
	"no_int_dem_actn" integer NULL,
	"cd_actn" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_typ_doc" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_decis" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'C',
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tps" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_forf" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_mnt" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_base" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_unia" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_ser" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fnct" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_actn" integer NULL,
	"cd_doc_ref_actn" char(25) NULL,
	"ident_act" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_actn" timestamp NULL,
	"qte_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_qte_actn" char(20) NULL,
	"tps_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_tps_actn" char(20) NULL,
	"ident_result" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"base_calc_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_base_calc_actn" char(20) NULL,
	"px_unia_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_px_unia_actn" char(20) NULL,
	"forf_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_forf_actn" char(20) NULL,
	"mnt_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_mnt_actn" char(20) NULL,
	"dte_valid" timestamp NULL,
	"ident_valid" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"dte_imput_chif" timestamp NULL,
	"tx_mon_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_actn" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_act" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_act_int" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_act_ext" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NULL,
	"cd_cpte_evl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NULL,
	"mnt_est" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"gain_est" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_actn", "typ_orig_actn" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_int_actn" IS 'No interne action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."typ_orig_actn" IS 'Origine action N=non conformité, P=plan action, D=divers';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_ncnf" IS 'no de non conformite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_int_pl_actn" IS 'No de plan action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_int_dem_actn" IS 'No de damande action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_actn" IS 'Code action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_typ_doc" IS 'Code document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_decis" IS 'Code decideur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."typ_moy" IS 'Type de moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_moy" IS 'Code moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_unit_qte" IS 'Unite de quantite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_unit_tps" IS 'Unite de temps';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_mon_forf" IS 'Code monnaie Montant forfaitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_mon_mnt" IS 'Code monnaie Montant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_unit_base" IS 'Unite de base';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_unit_px_unia" IS 'Unite Prix unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_perso" IS 'Code personnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_ser" IS 'Code service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_fnct" IS 'Code fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_aff_actn" IS 'No affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_doc_ref_actn" IS 'Code doc de reference';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."ident_act" IS 'Identifiant action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."dte_actn" IS 'Date action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."qte_actn" IS 'Quantite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."fmt_qte_actn" IS 'Format quantite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."tps_actn" IS 'Temps';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."fmt_tps_actn" IS 'Format temps';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."ident_result" IS 'Identifiant resultat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."base_calc_actn" IS 'Base de calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."fmt_base_calc_actn" IS 'Format base de calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."px_unia_actn" IS 'Prix unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."fmt_px_unia_actn" IS 'Format prix unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."forf_actn" IS 'Montant forfait';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."fmt_forf_actn" IS 'Format montant forfait';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."mnt_actn" IS 'Montant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."fmt_mnt_actn" IS 'Format montant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."dte_valid" IS 'Date de validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."ident_valid" IS 'Identifiant validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."dte_imput_chif" IS 'Date imputation chiffrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."tx_mon_actn" IS 'Taux';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."typ_actn" IS 'Type action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."pt_act" IS 'Pointeur act';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."pt_act_int" IS 'Pointeur act interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."pt_act_ext" IS 'Pointeur ect externe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."no_int_amdec" IS 'No interne amdec';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_cpte_evl" IS 'Code de compte evaluation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_sect" IS 'Code secteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."cd_anal" IS 'Code analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."mnt_est" IS 'montant estime';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actn"."gain_est" IS 'gain estime';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."actnlog" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_actn_log" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NULL,
	"typ_prog_drt" char(3) NULL,
	"niv" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_dec_actn_log" char(7) NULL,
	"ident_actn_log" char(2048) NULL,
	"typ_actn_log" char(1) NULL,
	"ver_dec" char(35) NULL,
	"prepa_real" char(12) NULL,
	"act_real_actn_log" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_liv_prev_actn_log" "datetime" NULL,
	"etu" char(2048) NULL,
	"pt_clos" char(1) NULL,
	"ver_real" char(35) NULL,
	"act_real_reel_actn_log" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_liv_reel_actn_log" "datetime" NULL,
	"com_int_real" char(2048) NULL,
	"pt_prise_dif_ext" char(1) NULL,
	"dif_ext" char(2048) NULL,
	"cd_proj" char(7) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_mdl" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_actn_log" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."cpt_actn_log" IS 'No action logicielle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."niv" IS 'Niveau';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."aut_dec_actn_log" IS 'Auteur découverte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."dte_liv_prev_actn_log" IS 'Date livraison prévue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."etu" IS 'etude';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."pt_clos" IS 'Cloture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."ver_real" IS 'Version réalisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."act_real_reel_actn_log" IS 'Acteur réalisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."dte_liv_reel_actn_log" IS 'Date livraison réelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."com_int_real" IS 'Commentaire réalisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."pt_prise_dif_ext" IS 'Action diffusable en externe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."dif_ext" IS 'Commentaire diffusion externe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modif.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."actnlog"."cd_mdl" IS 'Code module';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."af" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_af" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"des_af" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_af" "datetime" NULL,
	"mnt_af" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"statut_af" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_actn_orig" char(7) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"cd_fam_orig" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_stat1" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_stat2" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_af" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."af" IS 'Affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."cd_af" IS 'Code de l''affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."des_af" IS 'Désignation de l''affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."cd_perso" IS 'Responsabe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."dte_hre_af" IS 'date affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."mnt_af" IS 'Montant affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."statut_af" IS 'statut affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."cd_cl" IS 'code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."no_cl_adr" IS 'adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."cd_actn_orig" IS 'Origine action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."af"."com" IS 'commentaire';
CREATE TABLE "DBA"."AFFAIRE" (
	"NAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COCDE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COCLI" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PIECE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"MODELE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DESA" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DESA2" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DESA3" varchar(100) NULL,
	"QTEAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"UNITEPRIX" varchar(100) NULL,
	"BLOCAGE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"QTEAFREST" varchar(100) NULL,
	"REM" varchar(100) NULL,
	"REM2" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PRIXB" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PRIXAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PRIXMON" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COMON" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PCONSTANT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"TACLEUNIK" varchar(100) NULL,
	"EXCLU" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DATEAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DDP" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DELAI" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DELAIINIT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ETATAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"TYPEAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"NDEV" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ACHETEUR" varchar(100) NULL,
	"APPROVISIO" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PREPARATOR" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COACT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"CODEEMP" varchar(100) NULL,
	"REPRESENT1" varchar(100) NULL,
	"TAUXREP1" varchar(100) NULL,
	"REPRESENT2" varchar(100) NULL,
	"TAUXREP2" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DOSSIER" varchar(100) NULL,
	"URGENCE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ASSQ" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ADRLIV" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ADRFAC" varchar(100) NULL,
	"EDITDESA" varchar(100) NULL,
	"QTEFAB" varchar(100) NULL,
	"NBHR" varchar(100) NULL,
	"OBS" varchar(100) NULL,
	"OBSINTERNE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"GRATUIT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"FACT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"POSTE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COEF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DTDEBPL" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DELAIPL" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DELAIINTER" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DELAIATELIER" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PLUSTARD" varchar(100) NULL,
	"MODIFMAN" varchar(100) NULL,
	"NUPL" varchar(100) NULL,
	"INDPL" varchar(100) NULL,
	"INDPCE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ECHANTILL" varchar(100) NULL,
	"FLAG" varchar(100) NULL,
	"NUMEXOTVA" varchar(100) NULL,
	"MAGASIN" varchar(100) NULL,
	"EstPDP" varchar(100) NULL,
	"LIGNE" varchar(100) NULL,
	"Couleur" varchar(100) NULL,
	"GACLEUNIK" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DATEORDOOLD" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PTDECHARGEMENT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COFA" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PIECEETAT" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COCDENAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ETATDATEAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PIECEDATENAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"PIECEDELAI" varchar(100) NULL,
	"ETATDELAI" varchar(100) NULL,
	"COCLIDELAI" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DATEAFNAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"DELAINAF" varchar(100) NULL,
	"dateafnv" "datetime" NULL,
	"intnaf" integer NULL
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "DBA"."AFFAIRE"."COCLI" IS 'xx';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "DBA"."AFFAIRE"."PIECE" IS 'xx';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "DBA"."AFFAIRE"."NUPL" IS 'xx';
CREATE TABLE "DBA"."affairemaxnaf" (
	"cocli" varchar(100) NULL,
	"piece" varchar(100) NULL,
	"nupl" varchar(100) NULL
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."amdec" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_amdec" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"typ_amdec" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"seuil_npr" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_valid" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_amdec" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."amdec" IS 'Entête étude AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."no_int_art" IS 'Numéro interne article technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."cd_proc" IS 'Code du processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."typ_moy" IS 'Type du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."typ_amdec" IS 'Type AMDEC (M=moyen, A=article technique, P=processus)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."seuil_npr" IS 'Seuil du NPR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."dte_hre_valid" IS 'Date de validation étude AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."amdec_cau_effet" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cau" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_effet" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_amdec_def" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NOT NULL,
	"des_moy_amdec" char(35) NULL,
	"val_detect" integer NOT NULL,
	"val_freq" integer NOT NULL,
	"val_tmp_detect" integer NULL,
	"val_tmp_freq" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cau", "cd_effet", "no_int_amdec_def", "no_int_amdec" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."amdec_cau_effet" IS 'AMDEC cause et effet probable du défaut étudié';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."cd_cau" IS 'Code de la cause';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."cd_effet" IS 'Code effet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."no_int_amdec_def" IS 'Numéro interne du défaut AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."des_moy_amdec" IS 'Moyen de détection du mode de défaillance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."val_detect" IS 'Valeur de la détection du mode de défaillance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."val_freq" IS 'Valeur de la fréquence apparition du mode de défaillance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."val_tmp_detect" IS 'Valeur temporaire de la détection';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."val_tmp_freq" IS 'Valeur temporaire de la fréquence apparition';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_cau_effet"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."amdec_def" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_amdec_def" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NOT NULL,
	"val_gravite" integer NULL,
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_amdec_def", "no_int_amdec" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."amdec_def" IS 'AMDEC Défaut étudié';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."no_int_amdec_def" IS 'Numéro interne du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."val_gravite" IS 'Valeur de la gravité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de FNC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."no_int_n_cnf_def" IS 'Numéro interne de défaut FNC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_def"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."amdec_reunion" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_reunion" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin" timestamp NULL,
	"obj_reunion" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"lieu_reunion" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_reunion", "no_int_amdec" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."amdec_reunion" IS 'AMDEC cause et effet probable du défaut étudié';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."no_int_reunion" IS 'Numéro interne de réunion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."dte_hre_fin" IS 'Date et heure de fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."obj_reunion" IS 'Objet de la réunion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."lieu_reunion" IS 'Lieu de la réunion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_reunion" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_reunion", "no_int_amdec", "cd_perso" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso" IS 'AMDEC participants d une réunion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."no_int_reunion" IS 'Numéro interne de réunion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."cd_perso" IS 'Code du personnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_reunion_perso"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."amdec_suivi" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_amdec_suivi" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_def" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_car" char(7) NULL,
	"pd_financier" integer NOT NULL,
	"val_gravite" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_amdec_suivi" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."amdec_suivi" IS 'AMDEC suivi du savoir faire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."no_int_amdec_suivi" IS 'Numéro interne de réunion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."no_int_art" IS 'Numéro interne d article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."cd_proc" IS 'Code du processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."typ_moy" IS 'Type du moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."cd_def" IS 'Code du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."cd_car" IS 'Caractéristique suivie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."pd_financier" IS 'Estimation du poids financier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."val_gravite" IS 'Valeur de la gravité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."amdec_suivi"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_art_stat" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_art_stat_ql" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_util" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_base_n_ql" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_ident" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cat_art" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,

	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,

	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,

	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"nrm_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"nrm_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"px_unia_n_ql" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"fmt_px_unia_n_ql" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"pt_valid_tech" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"coef_unit" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"num_identa" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identb" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identd" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_idente" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_compt" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,

	"pt_lot" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_emp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_fifo" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"qte_sto_min" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_sto_max" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"px_fab" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_appro" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"coef_sto" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"px_revie" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"px_moy_pond" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_appro" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"del" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_sec" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"dur_vie" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_anal" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_sect" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_valid" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_art_etat" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_anal_appro" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_sect_appro" "t_cd" NULL,
	"pt_prov" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"pt_trac" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"mode_trac" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_col" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"coef_depr_sto" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"cd_typ_etat_ci" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_ci" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_imp_real" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp_prev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"coef_unitappro" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_calc_appro" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_emp" char(7) NULL,

	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" integer NULL,
	"pxach_dern" "t_tx" NULL,
	"dte_pxach_dern" "datetime" NULL,

	"dte_px_fab_dern" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_px_revie" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_px_fab" "datetime" NULL,
	"clas_art" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '2',

	"pt_lot_oblig" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_trac_oblig" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_fam_pic" char(7) NULL,
	"pdp_form" char(1) NULL,

	"mrp_zf" integer NULL,
	"mrp_couv" integer NULL,
	"mrp_avanc" integer NULL,
	"mrp_recul" integer NULL,

	"coef_fam_pic" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_amdec" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_lot_int" integer NULL,
	"cd_emp_usuel" char(7) NULL,
	"resp_sto" char(7) NULL,
	"resp_appro" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_seria" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_invent" timestamp NULL,
	"typ_sto_resrv" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_qte_resrv" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_peremp" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_peremp" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_hors_inv" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_dodo" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_idente" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_identf" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_liv_dir" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"coef_prix" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pxvte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_pxvte" "datetime" NULL,
	"pxvte_cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"pxvte_no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"pt_comp_px" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_lot_art" integer NULL,
	"dte_clas" date NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_manu" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_um" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_um" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_col_um" decimal(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_gest_int" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art"."pxvte_no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'No de ligne de BL du dernier prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art"."pt_comp_px" IS 'Composant utilisation dernier prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art"."cpt_lot_art" IS 'Compteur lot article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Dernier OF en entrée';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_bes" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_bes" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"typ_appro" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"dte_hre_dem" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art", "dte_hre_bes" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_bes" IS 'art_bes';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."dte_hre_bes" IS 'Date du besoin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."typ_appro" IS 'Type appro  (acheté ou fabriqué)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."dte_hre_dem" IS 'Date de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_bes"."qte" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_car" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_car" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_critc" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_rego_edit" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_orig" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_princ" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_tol" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'R',
	"tol_sup" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tol_inf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_tol" "t_fmt" NOT NULL,
	"val_nml" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,
	"lim_usur" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_val_nml" "t_fmt" NOT NULL,
	"typ_ctrl_car" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'M',

	"repe_pl" char(7) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"no_affic_car" integer NULL,
	"cd_car" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"loi_stat" char(1) NULL,
	"moy_ref" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"etal" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"tol_repet" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"des_iso" char(12) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_car", "no_int_art", "cd_car" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_car" IS 'Caractéristique suivie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."no_int_car" IS 'No interne de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."cd_rego_edit" IS 'Code de regroupement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."typ_orig" IS 'Provenance: fournisseur, client ou fabriqué';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."typ_princ" IS 'Type principal ou secondaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."typ_tol" IS 'Tolérance absolue ou relative';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_car"."tol_inf" IS 'Tolérance inférieure';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,

	"typ_orig_ref_mvt" "t_typ_orig_ref" NULL,

	"no_lig_mvt" integer NULL,
	"no_cad_mvt" integer NULL,
	"pt_sld" integer NULL,
	"qte_mvt" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_real" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_mvt" "datetime" NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_occ_mvt" integer NULL DEFAULT 1,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_mvt" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_mvt" IS 'Mouvement global de stock';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_int_mvt" IS 'Numéro interne de mouvement global';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."typ_orig_ref_mvt" IS 'Type origine référence';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_lig_mvt" IS 'Numéro de ligne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_cad_mvt" IS 'Numéro de cadence';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."qte_mvt" IS 'Quantité du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."qte_real" IS 'Cumul des quantités réalisées';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."dte_hre_mvt" IS 'Date et heure de transaction du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'No commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'No ligne de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_int_cde_cad_cl" IS 'No cadence de ligne de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'No ligne de nomenclature OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'No commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'No ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_int_cde_cad_fo" IS 'No cadence de ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvt"."no_occ_mvt" IS 'Document - occurence';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_mvtprev" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_mvt" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mvt_prev" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mvt_lie" integer NULL,
	"no_int_mvt_prev_lie" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"typ_mvt_prev" char(3) NULL,
	"dte_hre_mvt_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin_mvt_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_mvt_prev" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des_mvt_prev" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"typ_prev" "t_typ1" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_mvt", "no_int_mvt_prev" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_mvtprev" IS 'Mouvement prévisionnel de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."no_int_mvt" IS 'Numéro interne de mouvement global';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."no_int_mvt_prev" IS 'Numéro interne du mouvement prévisionnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."no_int_mvt_lie" IS 'Numéro interne de mouvement global';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."no_int_mvt_prev_lie" IS 'Numéro interne du mouvement prévisionnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."typ_mvt_prev" IS 'Type du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."dte_hre_mvt_prev" IS 'Date et heure de transaction du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."dte_hre_fin_mvt_prev" IS 'Date fin mouvt prév';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."qte_mvt_prev" IS 'Quantité du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."des_mvt_prev" IS 'Libellé du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtprev"."typ_prev" IS 'Commentaire général';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_mvtreel" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_mvt_reel" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_emp" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_unit_manu" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_unit_manu" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"typ_mvt" char(3) NULL,
	"dte_hre_mvt" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_mvt" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des_mvt" varchar(50) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"typ_genr" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"no_int_mvt" integer NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"typ_orig_ref_mvt" "t_typ_orig_ref" NULL,
	"no_doc_mvt" integer NULL,
	"no_lig_mvt" integer NULL,
	"no_cad_mvt" integer NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"typ_orig_ref_resrv" "t_typ_orig_ref" NULL,
	"no_doc_resrv" integer NULL,
	"no_lig_resrv" integer NULL,
	"no_cad_resrv" integer NULL,
	"no_lot_trac" char(10) NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_orig" "datetime" NULL,
	"cpt_cl_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_recep" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" integer NULL,
	"px_vte" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_moy_pond" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_revie" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_ach" "t_tx" NULL,
	"pt_ann" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_mvt_bis" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_us_mvt" integer NULL,
	"cd_cau_mvt" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_peremp" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_mvt_reel" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_mvtreel" IS 'Mouvement réel de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_int_mvt_reel" IS 'Numéro interne de mouvement réel de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cd_emp" IS 'Code de l''emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cd_unit_cond" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_unit_manu" IS 'Numéro de l''unité de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cd_unit_manu" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."typ_mvt" IS 'Type du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."dte_hre_mvt" IS 'Date et heure de transaction du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."qte_mvt" IS 'Quantité du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."des_mvt" IS 'Libellé du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."typ_genr" IS 'Type de génération (automatique ou manuel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_int_mvt" IS 'Numéro interne de mouvement global';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."typ_orig_ref_mvt" IS 'Type origine référence';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_cad_mvt" IS 'Numéro de cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cd_lot" IS 'Numéro de traçabilité';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_lig_resrv" IS 'Numéro de ligne réservée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_cad_resrv" IS 'Numéro cadence réservé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_lot_trac" IS 'Numéro de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cpt_cl_bnliv" IS 'No BL client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'No ligne BL client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'No ligne de nomenclature OF';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_int_lig_bnrecep" IS 'No ligne reception fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."px_vte" IS 'Prix de vente de ligne de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."px_moy_pond" IS 'Prix moyen pondere lors du mouvement';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."px_ach" IS 'Prix achat de ligne de bon reception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."pt_ann" IS 'Pointeur annulation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."qte_mvt_bis" IS 'quantite en unite stok secondaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."no_us_mvt" IS 'Numero US liee au mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."cd_cau_mvt" IS 'Code cause liee au mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_mvtreel"."dte_peremp" IS 'date de peremption';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_obj" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_obj" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"des_obj" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_obj" char(100) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_repert_obj" char(100) NULL,
	"typ_sto_obj" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_obj" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art", "cd_obj" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_obj" IS 'ART_OBJ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."cd_obj" IS 'Code de l''objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."des_obj" IS 'Désignation de l''objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."typ_obj" IS 'Type objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."cd_repert_obj" IS 'Répertoire de l''objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."typ_sto_obj" IS 'Type de stockage objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."no_int_obj" IS 'no objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_obj"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur de stockage  (système ou utilisateur)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_pdp" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_pdp" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_fam_pdp" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"dte_deb_perio" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_perio" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_pdp" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_pdp" IS 'PDP ou PIC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."no_ste" IS 'Société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."no_int_pdp" IS 'No interne ligne de PDP ou PIC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."cd_fam_pdp" IS 'Code famile PDP ou PIC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."no_int_art" IS 'No interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."dte_deb_perio" IS 'Début de la période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."dte_fin_perio" IS 'Fin de la période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."qte" IS 'Quantite a fabriquer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pdp"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure création';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."art_pxvte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art_pxvte" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_art_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_art_ctl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_ctl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" integer NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_art_vte" "t_typ1" NOT NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"coef_unit_qte" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"pt_forf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_frs" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,
	"coef" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art_pxvte" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."art_pxvte" IS 'Prix de vente article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_art_pxvte" IS 'Numéro interne du prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_art_cl" IS 'Numéro interne de l''article (système)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_art_ctl" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."cd_ctl" IS 'Code catalogue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'no interne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_cl_dmd_lig" IS 'no interne ligne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."typ_art_vte" IS 'Type Article vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."coef_unit_qte" IS 'Coefficient de conversion pour l''unité de quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."typ_sais_tf" IS 'Lieu de saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation de la ligne de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."art_pxvte"."coef" IS 'Coefficient prix';

CREATE TABLE "admin"."cd_couleur" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_couleur" integer NOT NULL,
	"des_couleur" char(50) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_couleur" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cd_couleur"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cd_couleur"."cd_couleur" IS 'Code couleur definie par access';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cd_couleur"."des_couleur" IS 'Designation couleur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cd_couleur"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cd_couleur"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cd_couleur"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."certif" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_certif" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_affic" integer NULL,
	"no_certif" integer NULL,
	"no_lot" char(12) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"pt_imp" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_imp_certif" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_cde_man" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_cde_man" timestamp NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ctrl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"des_etat" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_certif" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_ste" IS 'No société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_certif" IS 'No interne de certificat qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_affic" IS 'No ordre affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_certif" IS 'No certificat qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_lot" IS 'No de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_art" IS 'No article technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No ordre fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'No commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'No ligne commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."pt_imp" IS 'A imprimer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."pt_imp_certif" IS 'Imprimé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre exemplaires';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."cd_cde_man" IS 'No commande manuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."dte_hre_cde_man" IS 'Date commande manuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."cpt_bn_liv" IS 'No de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_ctrl" IS 'No interne contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_art_cl" IS 'No interne article client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_cl_adr" IS 'No adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'No de ligne de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."cd_etat" IS 'Code état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."des_etat" IS 'Désignation état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Type état';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."certif_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_certif" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_certif_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_car" integer NULL,
	"cd_car" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_decis" char(7) NULL,
	"fmt_val_nml" char(20) NULL,
	"fmt_tol" char(20) NULL,
	"eff" integer NULL,
	"nb_echant" integer NULL,
	"val_nml" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tol_inf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tol_sup" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mes_min" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mes_max" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_ht_inf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_ht_sup" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_critc" char(10) NULL,
	"cp" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cpk" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cam" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"moyenne" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"ec_typ" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_ctrl_car" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_certif", "no_certif_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."no_ste" IS 'No société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."no_int_certif" IS 'No certificat qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."no_certif_lig" IS 'No ligne de certificat qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."no_int_car" IS 'No interne caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."cd_car" IS 'Code caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."cd_decis" IS 'Code décision';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."fmt_val_nml" IS 'Format valeur nominale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."fmt_tol" IS 'Format tolérances';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."eff" IS 'Effectif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."nb_echant" IS 'Nombre échantillons';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."val_nml" IS 'Valeur nominale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."tol_inf" IS 'Tolérance inférieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."tol_sup" IS 'Tolérance supérieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."mes_min" IS 'Mesure minimale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."mes_max" IS 'Mesure maximale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."nb_ht_inf" IS 'Nombre hors tolérance inférieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."nb_ht_sup" IS 'Nombre hors tolérance supérieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."cd_critc" IS 'Code de la criticité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."cp" IS 'Cp ou CAP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."cpk" IS 'Cpk';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."cam" IS 'CAM';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."moyenne" IS 'Moyenne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."ec_typ" IS 'Ecart-type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."certif_lig"."typ_ctrl_car" IS 'Mode de contrôle';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cgr_art_proc_gam_nom" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_art_stat" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_unit_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_cat_art" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"nrm_art_b" char(35) NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_appro" char(1) NULL,
	"pds_net" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_sto_sec" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_sto_max" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_fab" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"c_proces_qte_fab" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_no_int_proc_gamope" integer NULL,
	"c_cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"c_cd_unit_tps_prod" char(3) NULL,
	"c_cd_oper" char(8) NULL,
	"c_proc_gamope_des" char(35) NULL,
	"c_qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_typ_dur" char(1) NULL,
	"c_proc_gamope_qte_fab" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_no_aff" integer NULL,
	"c_no_int_ressopeproc" integer NULL,
	"c_cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"c_typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"c_cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"c_typ_ress" char(1) NULL,
	"c_pt_def" char(1) NULL,
	"c_cd_ctchar" char(7) NULL,
	"c_cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"c_cd_compt" char(7) NULL,
	"c_cd_cat_art_comp" char(2) NULL,
	"c_cd_art_comp" char(25) NULL,
	"c_indice_comp" char(4) NULL,
	"c_cd_unit_sto_comp" char(3) NULL,
	"c_qte_comp" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_no_affic" integer NULL,
	"c_dte_hre_fin_calcul" "datetime" NULL
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cgr_art_proc_gam_nom" IS 'Table utilisée dans cgr_art_proc_gam_nom';

CREATE TABLE "admin"."cgr_banques" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"code" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"nom_banque" char(100) NULL,
	"Chaine1" char(10) NULL,
	"IBAN" char(100) NULL,
	"Chaine2" char(10) NULL,
	"BIC" char(100) NULL,
	"mention_libre" char(30) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "code" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cgr_bes_prev_fo" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NULL,
	"c_cd_cat_art_comp" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"c_cd_art_comp" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"c_indice_comp" char(4) NULL,
	"c_no_int_art_comp" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"c_pt_multi_fo" char(1) NULL,
	"c_cd_unit_sto_comp" char(3) NULL,
	"c_annmois" char(7) NULL,
	"c_nb_mois_per" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"c_cumul_rar" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_bes_prev_mois" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_qte_restante_mois" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_bes_prev_mois_fo" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"des_fo" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_lang" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_art" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"des_ste" char(35) NULL,
	"c_adr" char(180) NULL,
	"c_tel_fax" char(50) NULL,
	"c_dte_hre_fin_calcul" "datetime" NULL

	"no_ste" varchar(2) NOT NULL,
	"Exploitation" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Secretariat" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Comptabilite" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Fabrication" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Technique" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Qualite" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Achats" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Planning" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Informatique" varchar(50) NULL,
	"RCS" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Capital" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Telephone_Fax" varchar(50) NULL,
	"Siege" varchar(100) NULL,
	"Facturation" char(100) NULL,
	"RIB" char(100) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste" )
);

	"no_int_ordre" integer NULL,

	"no_int_cde_cad_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"c_today" "datetime" NULL,
	"c_max_dateadd_per" "datetime" NULL,
	"c_annmois" integer NOT NULL,
	"c_annmois_today_integer" integer NULL,
	"c_max_annmois_per_integer" integer NULL,
	"c_no_int_art_comp" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"c_no_int_art_comp_pk" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"c_no_int_proc_nomlien_pk" integer NOT NULL,
	"c_coef_unit_comp" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_coef_comp" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_qte_rebut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_ral_annmois" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_qte_annmois" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"c_dte_hre_fin_calcul" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_cde_cad_cl", "c_annmois", "c_no_int_art_comp_pk", "c_no_int_proc_nomlien_pk" )
);

	"cd_rep" "t_cd" NULL,

COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl" IS 'Client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_rep" IS 'Code représentant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_reg" IS 'Code règlement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_sectr_cl" IS 'Code du secteur d''activité pour analyse des clients';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cnd_emb" IS 'Code de l''emballage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cnd_port" IS 'Code condition port';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_mode_tro" IS 'Code du mode de transport (Galia)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_rub_prof" IS 'Code de la rubrique professionnelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_inc" IS 'Code de l''incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cl_rego" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_ctl" IS 'Code catalogue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cl_tf" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_stat_cl" IS 'Code de la famille regroupant les clients pour analyse statistiques';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_lang" IS 'Code de la langue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."tx_rem_neg" IS 'Taux de remise pour les pièces de type négoce';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."des_cl" IS 'Désignation de l''adresse du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_intl_pays" IS 'Désignateur du code international (1ère partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_intl_pays_intcom" IS 'Désignateur intracommunautaire (1ère partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_org" IS 'Code organisation (en France le no SIREN, 2ième partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cptl_cl" IS 'Code comptable du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."no_facto" IS 'Numéro de factoring';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."fmt_px" IS 'Format de présentation des prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."fmt_mnt" IS 'Format de présentation des montants';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."dte_deb_valid_com" IS 'Date de début de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."dte_fin_valid_com" IS 'Date de fin de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."dte_liv_cpte" IS 'Date de prise en compte des livraisons';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."jo_ar_fact" IS 'Jour d''arrêt de la facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mnt_max_rel" IS 'Montant maximum admis sur un relevé de factures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."jo_ar_rel_cl" IS 'Jour d''arrêté sur relevé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."tx_rem" IS 'Taux de remise pour les références clients (hors pièce de négoce)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."tx_esc" IS 'Taux d''escompte applicable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."txe_parf" IS 'Taxe parafiscale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."des_bnq" IS 'Nom de la banque du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."vil" IS 'Ville';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_bnq" IS 'Code de la banque du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_gui" IS 'Code guichet de la banque du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cpte" IS 'Code du compte de banque du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."rib" IS 'Clé RIB';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mnt_max_ass_cred" IS 'Montant du plafond d''assurance crédit (solvabilité)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_rego_imp_liv" IS 'Type regroupement livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_rego_imp_fact" IS 'Type regroupement facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_liv" IS 'Mode de livraison (sur livraison...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."tol_liv" IS 'Tolérance de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_del" IS 'Expression du délai de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_dero" IS 'Pointeur ligne de BL bloquée car dépassement dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_rel" IS 'Pointeur relevé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."freq_fact" IS 'Fréquence de facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_dero" IS 'Type dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_valid" IS 'Type de valideur (interne ou externe)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_cptl_gene" IS 'Code comptable centralisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_cde_gcf" IS 'Remplacement de commande ferme (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_cde_avret" IS 'Expression du retard (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_cde_mod_synch" IS 'Mode de contrôle de la synchronisation (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_cde_maj" IS 'Mode de mise à jour des programmes (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_cde_anal_ecart" IS 'Alerte sur les écarts (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_liv_affec_cad" IS 'Mode d''affecation des livraison sur les cadences (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_liv_cad_prev" IS 'Livraison répartie sur des cadences prévisionnelles (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_freq_fact" IS 'Frequence facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."dte_hre_fact" IS 'Date de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_frs_fixe" IS 'Frais fixe (Oui/Non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."edi_cd_vend" IS 'Code vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."edi_cd_vend_lg" IS 'Longueur de contrôle pour CSG3347 (nul Totalité)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_dur1" IS 'Durée court terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_dur2" IS 'Durée moyen terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_pt_eclat1" IS 'Eclatement du court terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_pt_eclat2" IS 'Eclatement du moyen terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_pt_eclat3" IS 'Eclatement du long terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_typ_perio1" IS 'Horizon cadence court terme 0-Jour, 1-Semaine, 2-Mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_typ_perio2" IS 'Horizon cadence moyen terme 0-Jour, 1-Semaine, 2-Mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_typ_perio3" IS 'Horizon cadence long terme 0-Jour, 1-Semaine, 2-Mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_typ_dte1" IS 'Expression délai court terme 0-Début, 1-Fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_typ_dte2" IS 'Expression délai moyen terme 0-Début, 1-Fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_typ_dte3" IS 'Expression délai long terme 0-Début, 1-Fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mrp_perio_eclat" IS 'Eclatement cadence 0-Jour, 1-Semaine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_cl" IS 'Type de client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."aut_prefact" IS 'Auteur de la pré-facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_prefact" IS 'Pré-facturation en cours ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire ent facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire pied facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_supp_cad" IS 'Gestion des cadences hors horizon';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."nb_sal" IS 'Nombre de salaries';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pour_tol_ferme" IS 'Pourcentage de tolérance variation cadence ferme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pour_tol_prev" IS 'Pourcentage de tolérance variation cadence prévisionnelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."nb_jour_mvt" IS 'Nb de jour pour previsionnelle a mouvementer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_delins" IS 'Interface delins';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_deljit" IS 'Interface deljit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_orders" IS 'Interface orders';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_aviexp" IS 'Interface aviexp';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_invoice" IS 'Interface invoice';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."val_retar" IS 'Critère de reconnaissance des cadences retard';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_supp_cad_apr" IS 'Suppression des cadences après horizon';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."tx_rem_fact" IS 'Taux de remise sur facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_edi_prev" IS 'Pilotage des cadences previsionnelles avec le message EDI';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_subro" IS 'Code de subrogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."typ_tva" IS 'D = TVA au debit, E = TVA a l encaisssement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."cd_ape" IS 'Code APE';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_bloq" IS 'Pointeur de blocage client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."indic_recep_edi" IS 'periode reception programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."mnt_max_enc" IS 'montant maximum encours';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."pt_auto_fact" IS 'Pointeur auto facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl"."no_dern_fact" IS 'N° dernière facture';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_adr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_tre" "t_cd" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_aff_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"des_cl_adr" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_ext" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_fo_cl" char(17) NULL,
	"deno" "t_deno_ste" NULL,
	"adr_lig_a" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"adr_lig_b" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"vil" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"tlf" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlc" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlx" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"nic" char(5) NULL,
	"del_trans" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"e_mail" char(50) NULL,
	"adr_internet" char(50) NULL,
	"typ_cde_gcf" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_cde_avret" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_synch" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_cde_mod_synch" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_cde_maj" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_cde_anal_ecart" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_liv_affec_cad" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_liv_cad_prev" char(1) NULL,
	"edi_cd_achet" char(20) NULL,
	"edi_cd_achet_lg" integer NULL,
	"edi_nom_achet" char(35) NULL,
	"edi_nom_achet_lg" integer NULL,
	"edi_dest_cd_ser" char(37) NULL,
	"edi_dest_cd_ser_lg" integer NULL,
	"db_cd_pt_dest" integer NULL,
	"lg_cd_pt_dest" integer NULL,
	"edi_cd_fact" char(35) NULL,
	"edi_cd_fact_lg" integer NULL,
	"edi_cd_exp" char(35) NULL,
	"edi_dest_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"edi_dest_lieu" char(17) NULL,
	"edi_cd_vend" char(20) NULL,
	"edi_cd_vend_lg" integer NULL,
	"cd_dest_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"edi_cd_btl" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_zongeo" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cee" char(14) NULL,
	"pt_txe" char(1) NULL,
	"pour_tol_ferme" "t_tx" NULL,
	"pour_tol_prev" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tel_abr" char(17) NULL,
	"fax_abr" char(17) NULL,
	"nb_jour_mvt" integer NULL,
	"no_contr" char(35) NULL,
	"no_ent" char(35) NULL,
	"nat_cont" char(35) NULL,
	"serveur" char(35) NULL,
	"telem" char(35) NULL,
	"Spec_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"Spec" char(2048) NULL,
	"avancement" char(2048) NULL,
	"Com_tech" char(2048) NULL,
	"pt_edi_prev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl_liv" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_liv" integer NULL,
	"cd_cl_fact" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_fact" integer NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_imp_uc_prepa" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_enlev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_delins" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_deljit" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_orders" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_aviexp" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_invoice" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_reg_tva" char(7) NULL,
	"des_reg_tva" char(35) NULL,
	"com_install" char(2048) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_adr" IS 'Adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."cd_pays" IS 'Code pays';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."cd_tre" IS 'Code du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."no_aff_cl_adr" IS 'Numéro d''adresse (affichage)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."des_cl_adr" IS 'Désignation adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."no_cl_adr_ext" IS 'Numéro d''adresse donnée par le client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."cd_fo_cl" IS 'Référence en tant que fournisseur chez le client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."deno" IS 'Dénomination d''une société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."adr_lig_a" IS '1ère ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."adr_lig_b" IS '2ième ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."cd_post" IS 'Code postal';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."tlx" IS 'Numéro de télex';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."nic" IS 'NIC (complément du numéro de Siren pour construire le numéro de Siret)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."del_trans" IS 'Délai de transport (jours)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."e_mail" IS 'Adresse E-mail';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."adr_internet" IS 'Adresse Internet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."typ_cde_gcf" IS 'Remplacement de commande ferme (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."typ_cde_avret" IS 'Expression du retard (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."pt_synch" IS 'Gestion de la synchronisation pour cette adresse (0-non,1-oui) (commandes ouvertes)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."typ_cde_mod_synch" IS 'Mode de contrôle de la synchronisation (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."typ_cde_maj" IS 'Mode de mise à jour des programmes (Commande ouverte)';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."typ_liv_cad_prev" IS 'Livraison répartie sur des cadences prévisionnelles (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_cd_achet" IS 'Code Acheteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_cd_achet_lg" IS 'Longueur de contrôle pour edi_cd_achet (nul Totalité)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_nom_achet" IS 'Acheteur partie nom';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_nom_achet_lg" IS 'Longueur de contrôle pour edi_nom_achet (nul Totalité)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_dest_cd_ser" IS 'Destinataire code et lieu (CSG31333+CSG3921)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_dest_cd_ser_lg" IS 'Longueur de contrôle pour edi_dest_cd_ser (nul Totalité)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."db_cd_pt_dest" IS 'Position de début dans CSG31333+CSG3921 du code du point de destination (nul pas de point de destination)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."lg_cd_pt_dest" IS 'Longueur dans CSG31333+CSG3921 du code du point de destination(nul toute la longueur restante)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_cd_fact" IS 'Adresse facturation : département ou correspondant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr"."edi_cd_fact_lg" IS 'Longueur de controle pour edi_cd_fact (nultotalité)';

CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_cont" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cont_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_cont_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"des_cont" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"tlf" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"e_mail" char(50) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"prenom_cont" char(20) NULL,
	"Mr_mme_mlle" char(1) NULL,
	"portable" char(17) NULL,
	"fax" char(17) NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"pt_cont_hab" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"tel_abr" char(17) NULL,
	"fax_abr" char(17) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr", "no_int_cont_cl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_cont" IS 'Contact par adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."no_int_cont_cl" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."no_aff_cont_fo" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."des_cont" IS 'Nom du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."tlf" IS 'Numéro de téléphone';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."e_mail" IS 'Adresse E-mail';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."prenom_cont" IS 'Prenom contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."Mr_mme_mlle" IS 'Type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."portable" IS 'portable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."fax" IS 'fax';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."com" IS 'commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."pt_cont_hab" IS 'Contact habituel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."tel_abr" IS 'No telephone abrege';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont"."fax_abr" IS 'No fax abrege';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cont_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_fnct" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr", "no_int_cont_cl", "cd_fnct" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct" IS 'Fonction des contacts client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct"."no_int_cont_cl" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_cont_dbfnct"."cd_fnct" IS 'Code de la fonction';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_histo" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_prod" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_ver" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_instal" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_envoi" "datetime" NULL,
	"installateur" char(35) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr", "cd_prod", "no_ver" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."no_ste" IS 'No Societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."cd_cl" IS 'code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."no_cl_adr" IS 'No adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."cd_prod" IS 'Code produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."no_ver" IS 'No version';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."cd_perso" IS 'Installateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."dte_hre_instal" IS 'date installation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."dte_hre_envoi" IS 'date envoi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."installateur" IS 'Installateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."cpt_bn_liv" IS 'no bl';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'date heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_histo"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'date heure creation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_mdl" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_prod" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_mdl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"pt_vendu" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_form" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_inst" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_mainta" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" "datetime" NULL,
	"nb_poste" integer NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr", "cd_prod", "cd_mdl" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."no_ste" IS 'No Societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."cd_cl" IS 'code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."no_cl_adr" IS 'code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."cd_prod" IS 'code produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."cd_mdl" IS 'code module';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."pt_vendu" IS 'module vendu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."pt_form" IS 'module forme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."pt_inst" IS 'module installe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."pt_mainta" IS 'module maintennu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."dte_hre_deb" IS 'date installation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."nb_poste" IS 'nb_poste';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'date heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_mdl"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'date heure creation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_adr_prod" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_prod" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"nb_poste" integer NULL,
	"no_ver" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"no_ver_bdd" char(35) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_bdd" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_logi" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr", "cd_prod" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."no_ste" IS 'No Societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."cd_cl" IS 'code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."no_cl_adr" IS 'No adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."cd_prod" IS 'Code produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."nb_poste" IS 'Nombre de postes';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."no_ver" IS 'No version';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."no_ver_bdd" IS 'No version BDD';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'date heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'date heure creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_adr_prod"."dte_hre_bdd" IS 'date base de donne';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_art" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_fam_tf" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_art_cl" "t_cd_art" NOT NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"com_liv" "t_com" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"lieu_trans" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"nom_pr_art" char(9) NULL,
	"coef_unit" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"mnt_plus_valu_stat" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_pie_gal" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_pie_sec" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_pie_regl" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"nb_pie_col" "t_nb_pie_col" NULL,
	"fmt_qte_art_cl" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_typ_tf" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"dte_hre_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_valid" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_valid" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ass_ql" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_ci" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_ci" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_unit_manu" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_um" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_um" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_imp_real" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp_prev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"nb_col_um" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"cd_pt_dch" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dch" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dest" char(35) NULL,
	"mrp_dur1" integer NULL,
	"mrp_dur2" integer NULL,
	"mrp_pt_eclat1" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_pt_eclat2" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_pt_eclat3" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_typ_perio1" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_typ_perio2" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_typ_perio3" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_typ_dte1" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_typ_dte2" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_typ_dte3" char(1) NULL,
	"mrp_perio_eclat" char(1) NULL,
	"indic_perio_qte" integer NULL,
	"indic_recep_edi" integer NULL,
	"indic_perio_qte_eco" integer NULL,
	"indic_rest_cad" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_unit_precond" char(7) NULL,
	"nb_pie_precond" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_etat_precond" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_precond_col" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_gest_int" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art_cl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_art" IS 'Article vendu à un client';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_pdp_clart" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art_cl", "dte_pdp_clart" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_art_pdp" IS 'cl_art_pdp';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_art_pdp"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
