COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_art_pdp"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_art_pdp"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_art_pdp"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_art_pdp"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_tre" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mode_tro" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_trans" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_etat_bn_liv" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_etat_eti_cnd" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_etat_eti_manu" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_rego_bn_liv" char(50) NULL,
	"dte_hre_imp" "datetime" NULL,
	"lieu_trans" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"pt_imp_bn_liv" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_valid" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_bn_liv_man" "t_nb" NULL,
	"pt_int_eti_imp_cnd" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_int_eti_imp_manu" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_liv" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_fact" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_bn_liv" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_bn_liv" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_eti_cnd" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_eti_manu" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_tre_trnst" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_vehi_motr" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_vehi_tract" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"dte_hre_arriv_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_vti_port" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti_emb" char(3) NULL,
	"nb_unit_manu" integer NULL,
	"pt_edi" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_enlev" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_edi_exp" "datetime" NULL,
	"cpt_bn_trans_lig" integer NULL,
	"no_bl_valid" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_liv" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv" IS 'Entête de bon de livraison client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cpt_bn_liv" IS 'Numéro de bon de livraison client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_tre" IS 'Code du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_cnd_emb" IS 'Code de l''emballage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_cnd_port" IS 'Code condition port';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_inc" IS 'Code de l''incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_mode_tro" IS 'Code du mode de transport (Galia)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cpt_bn_trans" IS 'Numéro de bon de transport';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_etat_eti_manu" IS 'Code de l''état';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."lieu_trans" IS 'Lieu de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_typ_etat_bn_liv" IS 'Code type état BL';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_typ_etat_eti_manu" IS 'Code type état etiquette manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_tre_trnst" IS 'Code du transporteur transitaire';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cd_vehi_tract" IS 'Code du véhicule tracté';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."dte_hre_arriv_prev" IS 'Date et heure d''arrivée prévue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."pt_edi" IS 'Livraison EDI';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."dte_hre_enlev" IS 'Date enlevement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."dte_hre_edi_exp" IS 'export date for building edifact message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."cpt_bn_trans_lig" IS 'N ligne bon de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv"."no_bl_valid" IS 'N° BL valide';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_reg" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_rep" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_cde_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_mod_cde_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_recep_cde_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_ext_cde_cl" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_cde_edi" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com_acpt" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_lig_cde_cl" "t_com" NULL,
	"no_ext_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"tx_rep" "t_tx" NULL,

	"pt_grat" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"pt_exp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_ident_transp" char(10) NULL,

	"pt_bon_transf" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv_ref" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig_bnliv" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig" IS 'Ligne de bl et de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de bl facture';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig"."cd_af" IS 'Code affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig"."no_int_lig_bnrecep" IS 'N° ligne bon reception associe';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig"."pt_force_cd_txe" IS 'Pointeur Code taxe force';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig"."pt_bon_transf" IS 'Lign sur bon de transfert';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_sld_cad" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"qte_sto_bis" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_av" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_av_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_cde_cad_cl", "no_int_lig_bnliv" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad" IS 'Détail des cadences livrées';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'Numero de poste de commande interne (ordre de creation)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."no_int_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Numéro de cadence interne d''une commande client (ordre création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de bl facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."qte_sto" IS 'Quantité en unité de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."pt_sld_cad" IS 'Cadence soldée (0-non,1-oui) (commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."qte_sto_bis" IS 'Quantite en unite secondaire stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."qte_av" IS 'Quantité livree en avance pour la livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_cad"."qte_av_sto" IS 'Quantité livrée en avance pour la livraison en unite de stock';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_clg" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit_manu" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pds_net" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pds_brut" "t_pds" NULL,
	"nb_unit_cond" "t_nb" NULL,
	"no_prem_eti_cnd" "t_nb" NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_eti_manu" "t_nb" NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_pie_col" "t_nb_pie_col" NULL,
	"cd_emp" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_pv" char(25) NULL,
	"qte_sto_bis" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_orig" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_peremp" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_orig" "datetime" NULL,
	"nb_precond" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_pie_precond" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_transf" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_transf_lig" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_transf_no_int_clg" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig_bnliv", "no_int_clg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg" IS 'Colisage des expéditions client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de bl facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."no_int_clg" IS 'Numéro de ligne de colisage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cd_unit_cond" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cd_unit_manu" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."qte" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."pds_brut" IS 'Poids brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."nb_unit_cond" IS 'Nombre d''unité de contionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."no_prem_eti_cnd" IS 'Numéro de première étiquette de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cd_lot" IS 'Numéro de traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."no_eti_manu" IS 'Numéro d''étiquette de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."qte_sto" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."nb_pie_col" IS 'Nombre de pièce par colis';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cd_emp" IS 'code emplacement sur colisage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."qte_sto_bis" IS 'Quantite en unite secondaire stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."pt_orig" IS 'Pointeur origine colisage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."dte_peremp" IS 'date de peremption';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."dte_hre_orig" IS 'date du lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."nb_precond" IS 'Nb. de pré-cond par colis';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."nb_pie_precond" IS 'Nb. de piece par pré-conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cpt_bn_transf" IS 'No bon de transfert';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cpt_bn_transf_lig" IS 'No ligne bon de transfert';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg"."cpt_bn_transf_no_int_clg" IS 'No colisage ligne bon de transfert';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_clg_det" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_det_lig_cde_cl" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_clg" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds_tot" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"des_a" char(35) NULL,
	"des_b" char(35) NULL,
	"pds_tot" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pds_unit" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_fact_det" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_det_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_bnliv", "no_int_clg" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_bnliv_lig_pxvte" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"px_unia_net" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"mnt_forf" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"tx_rem" "t_tx" NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"typ_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"coef_unit_qte" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_vti" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_brut_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_esc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_rem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tva_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_tva" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_rem_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"px_brut" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"fmt_px" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"pt_frs_fact" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_forf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_frs" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_frs_prefact" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_vti_parf1" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti_parf2" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	"tx_txe_parf1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf1_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe_parf2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_aff_bnliv_lig_pxvte" integer NULL,
	"tx_txe" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tf" char(3) NULL,
	"coef_unit_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"base_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_esc" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig_bnliv", "no_int_bnliv_lig_pxvte" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte" IS 'Prix de vente ligne livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de bl facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."no_int_bnliv_lig_pxvte" IS 'Numéro interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."px_unia_net" IS 'Prix unitaire net dans la monnaie du pays utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_forf" IS 'Montant forfaitaire dans la monnaie du pays utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."tx_rem" IS 'Taux de remise pour les références clients (hors pièce de négoce)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."typ_px" IS 'Type de prix (constant ou proportionnel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."typ_sais_tf" IS 'Lieu de saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."typ_tf" IS 'Type de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."coef_unit_qte" IS 'Coefficient de conversion pour l''unité de quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."cd_vti" IS 'Numéro de la fourchette de quantité pour le prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."dte_deb_valid_tf" IS 'Date de début de validité du tarif client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."no_int_tf_dte_lig" IS 'Numéro de la fourchette de quantité pour le prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_brut" IS 'Montant brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_brut_ste" IS 'Montant brut de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_esc" IS 'Somme escompte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_esc_ste" IS 'Montant escompte société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_rem" IS 'Somme montant remise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_tva_ste" IS 'Montant tva société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_tva" IS 'Montant tva';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_rem_ste" IS 'Montant remise société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."px_brut" IS 'Prix brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."fmt_px" IS 'Format de présentation des prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."pt_frs_fact" IS 'Frais facturé (Oui/Non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."tx_txe_parf1" IS 'Taux de taxe parafiscale 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_txe_parf1" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_txe_parf1_ste" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 1 en monnaie société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."tx_txe_parf2" IS 'Taux de taxe parafiscale 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."mnt_txe_parf2" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 2';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."tx_txe" IS 'Taux taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation de la ligne de prix';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bnliv_lig_pxvte"."pt_esc" IS 'pointeur escompte';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bntrans" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_trans" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_bn_trans" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"pt_imp_bn_trans" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_tre" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"pds_brut" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pds_net" "t_pds" NULL,
	"com_ent" char(2032) NULL,
	"com_pied" char(2032) NULL,
	"cd_vehi_motr" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_vehi_tract" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mode_tro" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_imp" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_trans" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_bntrans" IS 'Bon de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cpt_bn_trans" IS 'Numéro de bon de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."dte_bn_trans" IS 'Date du bon de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."pt_imp_bn_trans" IS 'Pointeur à O si BT imprimé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_tre" IS 'Code du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."pds_brut" IS 'Poids brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire entete';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire pied';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_vehi_motr" IS 'vehicule moteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_vehi_tract" IS 'vehicule tracteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_cnd_emb" IS 'conditions d emballage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_cnd_port" IS 'conditions de port';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_inc" IS 'conditions incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."cd_mode_tro" IS 'mode de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans"."dte_hre_imp" IS 'date impression';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_trans" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_bn_trans_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_transf" integer NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"nb_um" integer NULL,
	"nb_uc" integer NULL,
	"pds_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"Volume" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit_vol" char(3) NULL,
	"com" char(2032) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_trans", "cpt_bn_trans_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."no_ste" IS 'No Societe';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."cd_cl" IS 'code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."no_cl_adr" IS 'adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."cd_fo" IS 'code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."no_fo_adr" IS 'adresse fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."nb_um" IS 'Nombre UM';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."nb_uc" IS 'Nombre UC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."pds_brut" IS 'poids brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."Volume" IS 'Volume';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."cd_unit_vol" IS 'Unite volume';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."com" IS 'Commentaire';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_bntrans_lig"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Unite de poids';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_cde" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_rep" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_reg" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_stat_cde_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_ext_cde_cl" char(25) NULL,
	"nat_cde_cl" char(2) NULL,
	"typ_cad" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"pt_cde_edi" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_cde_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_recep_cde_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_mod_cde_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"tx_mon_cde_cl" "t_tx" NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_cde_cl_imp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp_cde_cl" "t_pt_o" NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"mnt_acpt" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_acpt" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"pt_acpt_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_edi_liv" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_vend" char(1) NULL,
	"achet_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"exp_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_nom" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_a" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_b" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_c" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_d" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"vend_no" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_contact" char(35) NULL,
	"dest_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"dest_lieu" char(17) NULL,
	"exp_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"vend_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NULL,
	"mnt_acpt_fact" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_vti_acpt" char(3) NULL,
	"no_int_fact_acpt" integer NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_bloq" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif_bloq" char(7) NULL,
	"com_bloq" char(2048) NULL,
	"cd_cl_liv" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_liv" integer NULL,
	"cd_cl_fact" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_fact" integer NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_cont" integer NULL,
	"cd_vehi_trac" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_rep" "datetime" NULL,
	"achet_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"typ_acpt" char(1) NULL,
	"pourc_acpt" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_af" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_cde" IS 'Entête de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."cd_cl_fact" IS 'Client facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."no_cl_adr_fact" IS 'Adresse Client facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."no_int_cont" IS 'Contact commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."cd_vehi_trac" IS 'Plaque immatriculation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."dte_hre_rep" IS 'date reponse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."achet_iso_odt" IS 'Code iso ou code odt';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."typ_acpt" IS '0 = montant, 1 = % ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."pourc_acpt" IS '% acompte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde"."cd_af" IS 'code affaire';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_rep" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_art_ctl" "t_cpt" NULL,

	"pt_pie_sec" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_af" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_unit_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_fact" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"pt_lie_cad_ord_fab" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_lanc_ord_fab" char(1) NULL,

	"pt_fact_spe" char(1) NULL,

	"typ_calc" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_calc" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_ass_ql" char(7) NULL,

	"cd_ctl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"mnt_plus_valu_stat" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_clg" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_force_sld" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_brut_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,

	"cd_unit_precond" char(7) NULL,

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_ctl" IS 'Code catalogue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''‚tat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mnt_plus_valu_stat" IS 'Plus value statistique';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'Num‚ro interne de ligne de bl facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_pt_dest" IS 'Code du point de destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."des_pt_dest" IS 'D‚signation du point de destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."typ_kanban" IS 'Poste de type Kanban (0-non, 1 -oui)  (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."typ_cde_maj" IS 'Mode de mise … jour des programmes (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."dte_deb_marc" IS 'Date d''effet du march‚ (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."dte_fin_marc" IS 'Date limite du march‚ (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."dte_deb_cumul" IS 'Date de d‚part des cumuls (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."qte_rest_liv_avt_intg" IS 'Quantit‚ restant … livrer avant int‚gration (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."qte_rest_liv_apr_intg" IS 'Quantit‚ restant … livrer aprŠs int‚gration (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."pou_vari" IS 'Pourcentage de variation du reste … livrer suite … l''int‚gration d''un programme (Commande ouverte)';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."ref1_com_cl" IS 'R‚f‚rence client 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."ref2_com_cl" IS 'R‚f‚rence client 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."outil_conf_cl" IS 'Outillage confi‚';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cond_conf_cl" IS 'Conditionnement confi‚';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_dur1" IS 'Durée court terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_dur2" IS 'Durée moyen terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_pt_eclat1" IS 'Eclatement du court terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_pt_eclat2" IS 'Eclatement du moyen terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_pt_eclat3" IS 'Eclatement du long terme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_typ_perio1" IS 'Horizon cadence court terme 0-Jour, 1-Semaine, 2-Mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_typ_perio2" IS 'Horizon cadence moyen terme 0-Jour, 1-Semaine, 2-Mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_typ_perio3" IS 'Horizon cadence long terme 0-Jour, 1-Semaine, 2-Mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_typ_dte1" IS 'Expression délai court terme 0-Début, 1-Fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_typ_dte2" IS 'Expression délai moyen terme 0-Début, 1-Fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_typ_dte3" IS 'Expression délai long terme 0-Début, 1-Fin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."mrp_perio_eclat" IS 'Eclatement cadence 0-Jour, 1-Semaine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."coef_sto" IS 'coefficient unité cde / unité stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."no_n_cnf" IS 'N° de non conformite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."no_rem1" IS 'N° de remise 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."no_rem2" IS 'N° de remise 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."pt_liv_dir" IS 'Pointeur livraison directe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'N° interne ligne cde achat associe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_imput_anal" IS 'Code imputation analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_cl_fact" IS 'Client facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."qte_marche" IS 'Frequence quantite de marche';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."tx_rem1" IS 'taux remise spec. client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."tx_rem2" IS 'taux remise spec. commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."nb_pie_precond" IS 'Nb. de piece par pré-conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig"."cd_unit_precond" IS 'Unité de  pré-conditionnement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_cde_cad_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_cde_cad_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"qte_cde_cad_cl" "t_qte" NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_deb_liv_dem_cde_cad_cl" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_liv_dem_cde_cad_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_liv_conf_cde_cad_cl" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"pt_fab_cde_cad_cl" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_prev_cde_cad_cl" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_tol_inf_cde_cad_cl" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_tol_sup_cde_cad_cl" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_liv_cde_cad_cl" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_cde_cad_cl_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_tot" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_sld_cad" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_cad_kanban" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_prec" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pou_vari_cad" integer NULL,
	"des_cad_cl" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"dte_hre_exp_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_av" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_ach_cde_cad_cl" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ident_transp" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_routage" char(35) NULL,
	"no_prepa" integer NULL,
	"cd_ran" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_cde_cad_cl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad" IS 'Cadence de ligne de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'Numero de poste de commande interne (ordre de creation)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_int_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Numéro de cadence interne d''une commande client (ordre création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_aff_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Numéro de cadence d''une commande client (affichage)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_ext_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Numéro de cadence d''une commande attribuée par le client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Quantité commandée de la cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."dte_deb_liv_dem_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Date de début de livraison prévue demandée par le client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."dte_fin_liv_dem_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Date de fin de livraison prévue demandee par le client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."dte_liv_conf_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Date de livraison prevue confirmee par le fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."pt_fab_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Pointeur cadence à prévoir en fabrication O N';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."pt_prev_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Pointeur cadence prévisonelle ou ferme O N';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_tol_inf_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Quantité tolérée inférieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_tol_sup_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Quantité tolérée supérieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_liv_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Quantité livrée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_cde_cad_cl_sto" IS 'Quantité tolérée supérieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_liv_tot" IS 'Quantité livrée totale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."pt_sld_cad" IS 'Cadence soldée (0-non,1-oui) (commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."pt_cad_kanban" IS 'Pointeur cadence Kanban (0 - non, 1 - oui)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_prec" IS 'Quantité avant intégration d''un programme (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."pou_vari_cad" IS 'Pourcentage de variation de la quantité cadencée suite à l''intégration d''un programme (Commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."des_cad_cl" IS 'Désignation de la cadence de ligne de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."dte_hre_exp_prev" IS 'Date d''expédition prévue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."qte_av" IS 'Quantité livree en avance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."pt_ach_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Autorisation achat composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."cd_ident_transp" IS 'Identifiant transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."cd_routage" IS 'Code routage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."no_prepa" IS 'Numero de preparation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."cd_ran" IS 'Code RAN';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_cad"."cd_pt_dest" IS 'Point de destination';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_pt_dest" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_pt_dest" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dest" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_pt_dest" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest" IS 'Point de destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'Numero de poste de commande interne (ordre de creation)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."no_int_pt_dest" IS 'Numéro interne de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."no_aff_pt_dest" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."cd_pt_dest" IS 'Code du point de destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_dest"."des_pt_dest" IS 'Code du point de destination';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_det_lig_cde_cl" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds_tot" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des_a" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"des_b" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"pds_tot" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pds_unit" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pt_fact_det" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_det_lig_cde_cl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det" IS 'Détail ligne commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'Numero de poste de commande interne (ordre de creation)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."no_int_det_lig_cde_cl" IS 'no interne detail ligne cde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."cd_unit_pds_tot" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."cd_unit_pds_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."cd_unit_qte" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."des_a" IS 'Première désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."des_b" IS 'Deuxième désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."pds_tot" IS 'Poids total';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."pds_unit" IS 'Poids unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_det"."pt_fact_det" IS 'Détail de ligne de commande à facturer (O/N)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cde_lig_pxvte" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_cde_lig_pxvte" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"px_unia_net" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"mnt_forf" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"tx_rem" "t_tx" NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"coef_unit_qte" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"px_brut" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"fmt_px" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"pt_frs_fact" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_frs" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_forf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_frs_prefact" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tf" char(3) NULL,
	"coef_unit_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl", "no_int_lig_cde_cl", "no_int_cde_lig_pxvte" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte" IS 'Composant du prix de la ligne de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'Numéro de la commande client attribuée en interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."no_int_cde_lig_pxvte" IS 'Numero de frais supplémentaire commande client (creation)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."no_aff_cde_lig_pxvte" IS 'Numero de frais supplémentaire commande client (affichage)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."px_unia_net" IS 'Prix unitaire net dans la monnaie du pays utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."mnt_forf" IS 'Montant forfaitaire dans la monnaie du pays utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."tx_rem" IS 'Taux de remise pour les références clients (hors pièce de négoce)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."typ_px" IS 'Type de prix (constant ou proportionnel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."typ_sais_tf" IS 'Lieu de saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."coef_unit_qte" IS 'Coefficient de conversion pour l''unité de quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."pt_modif" IS 'Pointeur modification possible';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."dte_deb_valid_tf" IS 'Date de début de validité du tarif client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."no_int_tf_dte_lig" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."px_brut" IS 'Prix brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."fmt_px" IS 'Format de présentation des prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."pt_frs_fact" IS 'Frais facturé (Oui/Non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."typ_tf" IS 'Type de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation de la ligne de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."cd_unit_tf" IS 'Code unité quantité du tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_cde_lig_pxvte"."coef_unit_tf" IS 'Coefficient unité de commande et unité de tarif';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"tx_rem_ctl_art" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,

	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "cd_ctl", "no_int_art" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_ctl_art"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date derniere modification';

	"com" char(255) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_cl_adr", "cd_motif" )
);

);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typcontrol" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,

);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_dbrglt" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_reg" "t_cd" NOT NULL,

	"mnt_sup_cnd_reg" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,

);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_dero" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_dero" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin_dero" "datetime" NULL,
	"mnt_max_dero" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_fact" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"mnt_pre_fact" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_dero" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_dero" IS 'Dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."no_dero" IS 'Numéro de dérogation pour la suspension de taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."dte_deb_dero" IS 'Date de début de la dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."dte_fin_dero" IS 'Date de fin de la dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."mnt_max_dero" IS 'Montant maximum de dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."mnt_fact" IS 'Montant déjà facturé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."des" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero"."mnt_pre_fact" IS 'Montant de préfacturation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_dero_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_dero" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_dero" "datetime" NULL,
	"des" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"mnt_max_dero" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_fact" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_pre_fact" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_dero", "dte_deb_dero" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."no_dero" IS 'Code dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."dte_deb_dero" IS 'Date début dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."dte_fin_dero" IS 'Date fin dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."des" IS 'NÝ de douane';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."mnt_max_dero" IS 'Montant autorisé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."mnt_fact" IS 'Montant facturé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dero_lig"."mnt_pre_fact" IS 'Montant pré-facturé';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_dpc" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cl_dmd" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_rep" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_reg" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_stat_cde_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_cont_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_cl_dmd" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_dem" "datetime" NULL,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"dte_repo" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_calcul_px" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cl_dmd" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_dpc" IS 'entete demande de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'no interne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_rep" IS 'Code représentant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_inc" IS 'Code de l''incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_reg" IS 'Code règlement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_stat_cde_cl" IS 'Code de la famille regroupant les commandes clients pour analyse statistiques';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."no_int_cont_cl" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."cd_cl_dmd" IS 'Code demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."dte_dem" IS 'Date demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire d''entête de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire de pied de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."dte_repo" IS 'Date prévue réponse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc"."dte_calcul_px" IS 'Date à prendre en compte pour calcul px';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_dpc_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cl_dmd" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_cl_opc" integer NULL,
	"cd_af" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_etat_lig" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"cd_art_cl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"coef_unit" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"no_ext_cl_dmd_lig" integer NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_motif_op" char(7) NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"com_status" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"pt_imp" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_hre_imp" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_imp_dem" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_an_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_an_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_an_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_an_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_calc_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_calc_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_calc_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_calc_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_revie_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_revie_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_revie_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_revie_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"marge_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"marge_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"marge_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"marge_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_calc_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_calc_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_calc_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_calc_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_mon_cl_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_mon_cl_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_mon_cl_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_vte_mon_cl_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_march_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_march_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_march_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_march_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"delai_val_a" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"delai_val_b" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"delai_val_c" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"delai_val_d" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_ctl" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ctl" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art_ctl" integer NULL,
	"tx_com_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_com_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_com_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_com_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_pie_col" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_accept" timestamp NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cl_dmd", "no_int_cl_dmd_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_dpc_lig" IS 'cl_dpc_lig';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'no interne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."no_int_cl_dmd_lig" IS 'no interne ligne demande';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."cd_af" IS 'Code de l''affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."cd_unit_sto" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig"."dte_hre_accept" IS 'Date/heure acceptation OPC';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cl_dmd" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mat" integer NOT NULL,
	"d" float NULL,
	"Dm" float NULL,
	"TolDm" float NULL,
	"H0" float NULL,
	"TolH0" float NULL,
	"H1" float NULL,
	"TolH1" float NULL,
	"P1" float NULL,
	"TolP1" float NULL,
	"H2" float NULL,
	"TolH2" float NULL,
	"P2" float NULL,
	"TolP2" float NULL,
	"Nu" float NULL,
	"NbSM" float NULL,
	"Perp_cl" float NULL,
	"Parall_cl" float NULL,
	"Hjmax_cl" float NULL,
	"H0_cl" float NULL,
	"TolH0_cl" float NULL,
	"TypeFil" integer NULL,
	"TypeCalcul" integer NULL,
	"Angle_meulage" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"massenet" float NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'Numero interne de la demande de prix client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."no_int_cl_dmd_lig" IS 'Numero interne du poste de la demande de prix client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."no_int_art" IS 'Numero interne de l article client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."no_int_mat" IS 'Numero interne de la matiere ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."d" IS 'Diametre de fil (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."Dm" IS 'Diametre moyen d enroulement (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolDm" IS 'Tolerance sur le diametre moyen d enroulement (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."H0" IS 'Hauteur libre du ressort (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolH0" IS 'Tolerance sur la hauteur libre du ressort (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."H1" IS 'Hauteur de travail H1 (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolH1" IS 'Tolerance sur la hauteur de travail H1 (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."P1" IS 'Charge sous la hauteur H1 (N)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolP1" IS 'Tolerance sur la charge P1 (%)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."H2" IS 'Hauteur de travail H2 (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolH2" IS 'Tolerance sur la hauteur de travail H2 (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."P2" IS 'Charge sous la hauteur H2 (N)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolP2" IS 'Tolerance sur la charge P2 (%)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."Nu" IS 'Nombre de spires utiles';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."NbSM" IS 'Nombre de spires mortes';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."Perp_cl" IS 'Defaut de Perpendicularite (mm/H0)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."Parall_cl" IS 'Defaut de parallelisme (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."Hjmax_cl" IS 'Hauteur a spires jointives maximum demandee par le client (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."H0_cl" IS 'Hauteur libre demandee par le client (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TolH0_cl" IS 'Tolerance du client sur la hauteur libre (mm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TypeFil" IS 'Categorie du fil pris en compte dans le calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."TypeCalcul" IS 'Categorie de calcul realisee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."Angle_meulage" IS 'Angle de meulage (ø)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_calcul"."massenet" IS 'Masse nette du ressort';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cl_dmd" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_pl_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"no_cl_pl_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_typ_pl_cl" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_classe_pl_cl" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cl_dmd", "no_int_cl_dmd_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'Numero interne de la demande de prix client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."no_int_cl_dmd_lig" IS 'Numero interne du poste de la demande de prix client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."cd_pl_cl" IS 'Code client de l editeur du plan';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."no_cl_pl_adr" IS 'Numero de l adresse du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."cd_typ_pl_cl" IS 'Code du type de plan (racine)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."cd_classe_pl_cl" IS 'Code de la classe du plan ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_pl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cl_dmd" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_qte" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"qte_mini" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_maxi" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_fab" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_annu" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_liv" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"coef_unit_px" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"px_vte_unia_tf_lig" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"del_liv" char(35) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cl_dmd", "no_int_cl_dmd_lig", "no_int_cl_dmd_qte" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte" IS 'cl_dpc_lig_qte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'no interne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."no_int_cl_dmd_lig" IS 'no interne ligne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."no_int_cl_dmd_qte" IS 'No interne quantité ligne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."qte_mini" IS 'Quantité mini';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."qte_maxi" IS 'quantité maxi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."qte_fab" IS 'Quantité eco fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."qte_annu" IS 'Quantité annuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."qte_liv" IS 'quantité livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."coef_unit_px" IS 'Coefficient de conversion de l''unité de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."px_vte_unia_tf_lig" IS 'Prix de vente unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."del_liv" IS 'Délai de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_dpc_lig_qte"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cl_dmd" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_qte" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,

	"qte_real" char(255) NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_ref" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"coef_unit_ref" char(255) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cl_dmd", "no_int_cl_dmd_lig", "no_int_cl_dmd_qte" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."no_int_cl_dmd_qte" IS 'Numero interne de la quantite du poste de la demande de prix client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l unite de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."qte_real" IS 'Quantite reelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."cd_unit_ref" IS 'Code de l unite de mesure de la reference : unite piece';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."coef_unit_ref" IS 'coefficient de reference : nombre de pieces';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_ajou"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,

	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"px_vte_unia_tf_lig" char(255) NULL,
	"qte_mini" char(255) NULL,
	"qte_maxi" char(255) NULL,
	"qte_fab" char(255) NULL,
	"qte_annu" char(255) NULL,
	"qte_liv" char(255) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,

	"del_liv" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_del_liv" char(3) NULL,

	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."no_int_cl_dmd_qte" IS 'Numero interne suivant la quantite de la sous traitance du poste de la demande de prix client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."cd_typcontrol" IS 'Type de controle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."cd_proc" IS 'Numero du processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."px_vte_unia_tf_lig" IS 'Prix de vente unitaire de la piece';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."qte_mini" IS 'Quantite mini';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."qte_maxi" IS 'Quantite maxi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."qte_fab" IS 'Quantite de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."qte_annu" IS 'Quantite annuel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."qte_liv" IS 'Quantite de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."cd_unit" IS 'Unite du lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."cd_mon" IS 'Unite monnetaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."typ_px" IS 'Type de prix';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."cl_dpc_lig_qte_fo"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';

);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "cd_typ_etat" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_etat" IS 'Etat client';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_etat"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_etat"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_etat"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_txe_base2" char(7) NULL,

	"cd_txe_base4" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_base5" char(7) NULL,

	"pt_bloq_frs" char(1) NULL,

	"mnt_rem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"mnt_txe_parf_base2" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"dte_hre_eche_rel" "datetime" NULL,

	"pt_imp_tr_real" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_intcom_real" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"mnt_txe_base2" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_txe_base3" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_txe_base4" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_txe_base5" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"mnt_mon_cl" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_mon_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,

	"mnt_arron_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_vti_arron" char(3) NULL,

	"cd_frs2" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_frs1" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_frs2" char(7) NULL,

	"tx_txe_frs2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_parf1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_parf1_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_parf2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_parf2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tax_parf1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tax_parf1_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tax_parf2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tax_parf2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_base_txe1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_base_txe2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_base_txe3" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"mnt_base_txe5" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"tx_txe3" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe4" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe5" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"mnt_txe2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe3_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe4_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe5_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"com_ent" char(2048) NULL,
	"com_pied" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_hre_edi_exp" "datetime" NULL,
	"nb_ex" integer NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,

	"mnt_rem_fact" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_vti_rem" char(25) NULL,
	"mnt_rem_fact_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_reg" integer NULL,
	"cd_subro" char(10) NULL,
	"typ_tva" char(1) NULL,
	"no_fact_cl" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_num_fact" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fact" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_fact" IS 'Entête de facture client';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."no_int_fact" IS 'Numéro interne de facture';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."cd_txe_base1" IS 'Code taxe';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."cd_txe_base3" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."cd_txe_base4" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."cd_txe_base5" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."cpt_fact_cl" IS 'Numéro de facture client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."typ_fact" IS 'Type facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."dte_hre_fact" IS 'Date de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."dte_hre_eche_fact" IS 'Date d''échéance de la facture';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."pt_bloq_frs" IS 'Pointeur facture bloquée par frais';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."mnt_rem" IS 'Somme montant remise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."mnt_esc" IS 'Somme escompte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."mnt_txe_parf_base1" IS 'Somme taxe parafiscale base 1';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact"."mnt_txe_base1" IS 'Somme taxe base 1';

CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_fact_cptl" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fact" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cpte_cptl" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"mnt_mon_cl" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_mon_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_debcre" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_typ_cptl" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cptl_cl" char(10) NULL,
	"no_int_fact_cptl" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fact", "no_int_fact_cptl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_fact_cptl" IS 'Facture Ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."no_int_fact" IS 'Numéro interne de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."cd_cpte_cptl" IS 'Code du compte comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."mnt_mon_cl" IS 'Montant global de la ligne de commande dans la monnaie client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."mnt_mon_ste" IS 'Montant de la ligne de commande dans la monnaie société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."cd_debcre" IS 'Code sens';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."cd_typ_cptl" IS 'Type de compte (Général ou Auxilliaire)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."cd_cptl_cl" IS 'Code comptable du tiers';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."no_int_fact_cptl" IS 'NÝ interne repartition comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl"."cd_vti" IS 'Code Ventilation comptable';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_fact" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cpte_cptl" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"mnt_mon_cl" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_mon_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_debcre" char(1) NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(3) NULL,
	"mnt_tva" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_int_cptl_anal" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fact", "cd_cpte_cptl", "cd_imput_anal", "no_int_cptl_anal" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."no_int_fact" IS 'N° interne de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."cd_cpte_cptl" IS 'Code comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."cd_imput_anal" IS 'Code imputation analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."mnt_mon_cl" IS 'Montant monnaie tiers';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."mnt_mon_ste" IS 'Montant monnaie societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."typ_debcre" IS 'Sens D = debit, C = credit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."des" IS 'Designation imputation analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."mnt_tva" IS 'Montant taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_cptl_anal"."no_int_cptl_anal" IS 'No interne';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_fact_ech" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_fact" integer NOT NULL,
	"date_ech" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"mnt_ech" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"mnt_ech_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"let_ech" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_cl_regl" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fact", "date_ech" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."no_int_fact" IS 'N° interne de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."date_ech" IS 'Date echeance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."mnt_ech" IS 'Montant echeance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."mnt_ech_ste" IS 'Montant monnaie ste';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."let_ech" IS 'Lettrage ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_fact_ech"."no_int_cl_regl" IS 'No interne reglement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_frs" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_frs_cl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_frs" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_qte" "t_typ_qte" NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "cd_frs_cl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."cl_frs" IS 'FRAIS CLIENT';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."cd_frs_cl" IS 'Code frais client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."typ_frs" IS 'Type frais société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."des" IS 'Désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_frs"."typ_qte" IS 'Quantité suivie (montant commande, montant facture, poids BL)';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."cl_group" (
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_group" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"des_cl" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_sectr_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_post" char(5) NULL,
	"vil" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_rep" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_dep" char(2) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_cl", "cd_group" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."cl_lot_inter" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_orig" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"pt_ordfab" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ordre" integer NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cl", "no_int_art", "no_int" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."cl_lot_inter"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
