CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbst" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_st" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"pt_st" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"des_st" "t_des_gen" NOT NULL,
	"cd_habil_av" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_habil_ai" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_habil_rv" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_habil_ri" "t_cd" NULL,
	"pt_appli" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_st" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbst" IS 'Statut des documents qualites';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."cd_st" IS 'Code statut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."pt_st" IS 'Indicateur de statut d''attente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."des_st" IS 'Designation du statut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."cd_habil_av" IS 'Code habiliation acteur quand statut valide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."cd_habil_ai" IS 'Code habiliation acteur quand statut invalide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."cd_habil_rv" IS 'Code habiliation recepteur quand statut valide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."cd_habil_ri" IS 'Code habiliation recepteur quand statut invalide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."pt_appli" IS 'Indique que la version est applicable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la derniere modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la creation de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbst"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure derniere modification de l''enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstactrl" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_stactrl" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_stactrl" char(7) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"deno_windows" char(15) NOT NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_stat_conf" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_ilotctrl" char(8) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_stactrl" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."no_int_stactrl" IS 'Numéro interne de la station de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."cd_stactrl" IS 'Code de la station de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."des" IS 'Désignation de la station de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."deno_windows" IS 'Nom réseau du PC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen associé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."typ_moy" IS 'Type du moyen associé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."cd_stat_conf" IS 'Code de la configuration des paramètres statistiques';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl"."cd_ilotctrl" IS 'Code de l''''îlot de contrôle';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstactrl_actn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_actn" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_stactrl" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_actn", "no_int_stactrl" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_actn"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_actn"."cd_actn" IS 'Code de l''action autorisée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_actn"."no_int_stactrl" IS 'Numéro interne de la station de contrôle';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstactrl_cau" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cau" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_stactrl" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_cau", "no_int_stactrl" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_cau"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_cau"."cd_cau" IS 'Code de la cause autorisée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_cau"."no_int_stactrl" IS 'Numéro interne de la station de contrôle';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ilotctrl" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"des_ilotctrl" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_ilotctrl" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot"."no_ste" IS 'Code de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot"."cd_ilotctrl" IS 'Code de l''''îlot de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot"."des_ilotctrl" IS 'Désignation de l''''îlot de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_ilot"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstactrl_niv" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_stactrl" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_niv" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"cpt_niv" integer NULL,
	"cpt0" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_cpt0" timestamp NULL,
	"no_ext_ptmes" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_stactrl", "cd_niv" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."no_ste" IS 'Code de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."no_int_stactrl" IS 'Numéro interne de la station de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."cd_niv" IS 'Code du niveau de fréquence de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."cpt_niv" IS 'Compteur du niveau';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."cpt0" IS 'Valeur absolue du compteur lors du dernier rafraîchissement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."dte_hre_cpt0" IS 'Date/heure absolue lors du dernier rafraîchissement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_niv"."no_ext_ptmes" IS 'Point de mesure pour le comptage des pièces';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstactrl_perso" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_perso" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_stactrl" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_perso", "no_int_stactrl" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_perso"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_perso"."cd_perso" IS 'Code du personnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstactrl_perso"."no_int_stactrl" IS 'Numéro interne de la station de contrôle';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstartql" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_art_stat_ql" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_art_stat_ql" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_art_stat_ql" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbstartql" IS 'Famille d''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstartql"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstartql"."cd_art_stat_ql" IS 'Code de la famille d''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstartql"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstartql"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstartql"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstartql"."des_art_stat_ql" IS 'Désignation de la famille d''article qualité';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbstatart" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_art_stat" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_art_stat" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_art_stat" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbstatart" IS 'Famille d'' articles pour statistiques';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstatart"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstatart"."cd_art_stat" IS 'Code de la famille statistique d''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstatart"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstatart"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstatart"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstatart"."des_art_stat" IS 'Désignation de la famille statistique';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,

);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_pl_actn_stat" )

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbstplactn"."des_pl_actn_stat" IS 'Désignation de la famille du plan d''action';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbsynop" (
	"cd_synop" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_synop" integer NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_synop" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"marge_x" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
	"marge_y" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
	"sens" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'H',
	"cd_etat_fond" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_fond" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"largeur_max" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 3660,
	"hauteur_max" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 2400,
	"barre_outils" char(1) NULL,
	"barre_x" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"barre_y" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"barre_largeur" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 1300,
	"barre_hauteur" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 400,
	"depart_x" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"depart_y" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"perio_maj" integer NULL DEFAULT 5,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_synop" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbsynop" IS 'Synoptique - paramètres généraux';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."cd_synop" IS 'Code du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."no_ext_synop" IS 'Numéro externe du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière moidification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."des_synop" IS 'Désignation du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."marge_x" IS 'Marge horizontale pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."marge_y" IS 'Marge verticale pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."sens" IS 'Sens pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."cd_etat_fond" IS 'Code de l''état par défaut pour le fond du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."cd_typ_etat_fond" IS 'Type de l''état par défaut pour le fond du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état par défaut pour les fenêtres de données';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Type de l''état par défaut pour les fenêtres de données';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."largeur_max" IS 'Taille maximale de la fenêtre (en unités PowerBuilder)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."hauteur_max" IS 'Taille maximale de la fenêtre (en unités PowerBuilder)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."barre_outils" IS 'Position de la barre d''outils à l''ouverture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."barre_x" IS 'Position de la barre d''outils si elle est flottante';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."barre_y" IS 'Position de la barre d''outils si elle est flottante';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."barre_largeur" IS 'Position de la barre d''outils si elle est flottante';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."barre_hauteur" IS 'Position de la barre d''outils si elle est flottante';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."depart_x" IS 'Position horizontale de départ pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."depart_y" IS 'Position verticale de départ pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop"."perio_maj" IS 'Période de mise à jour de l''ensemble du synoptique (en minutes)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_dyn" (
	"cd_table" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_auto" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"cd_col_sup" char(35) NULL,
	"val_col_sup" char(50) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_table" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_dyn" IS 'Synoptique - paramétrage des triggers';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."cd_table" IS 'Table associée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière moidification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."pt_auto" IS 'Trigger autorisé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."cd_col_sup" IS 'Code de la colonne pour le solde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn"."val_col_sup" IS 'Valeur pour la colonne de solde';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig" (
	"cd_table" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_synop" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_dyn_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_auto" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"cd_col1" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col2" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col3" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col4" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col5" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col_sup" char(35) NULL,
	"val_col_sup" char(50) NULL,
	"wzoom" char(50) NULL,
	"wzoom_nocompl" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"wzoom_no_cfg" integer NULL,
	"titre" char(40) NULL,
	"hauteur" integer NULL DEFAULT 300,
	"largeur" integer NULL DEFAULT 300,
	"bordure" smallint NULL DEFAULT 2,
	"perio_cligno" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"perio_maj" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fic_alarme" char(256) NULL,
	"perio_alarme" integer NULL,
	"wflash" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"scrollbar" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"marge_x" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
	"marge_y" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 50,
	"depart_x" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"depart_y" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"largeur_max" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 3660,
	"hauteur_max" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 2400,
	"sens" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'H',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_table", "cd_synop", "no_int_dyn_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig" IS 'Synoptique - paramétrage des éléments à accéder par les triggers';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_table" IS 'Table associée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_synop" IS 'Code du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."no_int_dyn_lig" IS 'Numéro interne de l''élément';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière moidification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."pt_auto" IS 'Trigger autorisé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_col1" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_col2" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_col3" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_col4" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_col5" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_col_sup" IS 'Code de la colonne pour le solde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."val_col_sup" IS 'Valeur pour la colonne de solde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."wzoom" IS 'Code de la fenêtre pour le zoom';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."wzoom_nocompl" IS 'Paramètre complémentaire pour le zoom';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."wzoom_no_cfg" IS 'Numéro externe de la configuration de paramètres';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."titre" IS 'Titre de l''élément de type fenêtre de données';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."hauteur" IS 'Hauteur de l''élément (en unités PowerBuilder)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."largeur" IS 'Largeur de l''élément (en unités PowerBuilder)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."bordure" IS 'Bordure de l''élément';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."perio_cligno" IS 'Période de clignotement de la fenêtre de données (en ms)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."perio_maj" IS 'Période de mise à jour de la fenêtre de données (en minutes)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."fic_alarme" IS 'Nom du fichier de type .wav pour l''alarme sonore';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."perio_alarme" IS 'Période pour l''alarme sonore (en secondes)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."wflash" IS 'Faire clignoter la fenêtre s''il y a une alarme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état pour l''élément de type fenêtre de données';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Type de l''état pour l''élément de type fenêtre de données';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."scrollbar" IS 'Présence des barres de défilement vertical et horizontal si nécessaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."marge_x" IS 'Marge horizontale pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."marge_y" IS 'Marge verticale pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."depart_x" IS 'Position horizontale de départ pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."depart_y" IS 'Position verticale de départ pour le remplissage automatique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."largeur_max" IS 'Taille maximale de la fenêtre (en unités PowerBuilder)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."hauteur_max" IS 'Taille maximale de la fenêtre (en unités PowerBuilder)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_dyn_lig"."sens" IS 'Sens pour le remplissage automatique';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_lig" (
	"cd_synop" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_elt" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'D',
	"no_affic" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_table" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col1" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col2" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col3" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col4" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col5" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col_sup" char(35) NULL,
	"val_col1" char(50) NULL,
	"val_col2" char(50) NULL,
	"val_col3" char(50) NULL,
	"val_col4" char(50) NULL,
	"val_col5" char(50) NULL,
	"val_col_sup" char(50) NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NULL,
	"wzoom" char(50) NULL,
	"wzoom_nocompl" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"wzoom_no_cfg" integer NULL,
	"titre" char(40) NULL,
	"posx" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"posy" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"hauteur" integer NULL DEFAULT 300,
	"largeur" integer NULL DEFAULT 300,
	"bordure" smallint NULL DEFAULT 2,
	"perio_cligno" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"perio_maj" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"perio_synchro" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fic_alarme" char(256) NULL,
	"perio_alarme" integer NULL,
	"wflash" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"path_image" char(256) NULL,
	"couleur" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"couleur_fond" integer NULL DEFAULT 16777215,
	"couleur_motif" integer NULL DEFAULT 255,
	"style" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"texte" char(254) NULL,
	"alignement" smallint NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"fonte_police" char(20) NULL DEFAULT 'Arial',
	"fonte_style" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fonte_taille" smallint NULL DEFAULT 12,
	"fonte_famille" smallint NULL DEFAULT 2,
	"fonte_espacement" smallint NULL DEFAULT 2,
	"fonte_ensemble" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"motif" smallint NULL DEFAULT 5,
	"hauteur_coin" smallint NULL DEFAULT 50,
	"largeur_coin" smallint NULL DEFAULT 50,
	"scrollbar" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '1',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_synop", "no_int_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_lig" IS 'Synoptique - éléments rattachés';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_synop" IS 'Code du synoptique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."no_int_lig" IS 'Numéro interne de l''élément';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière moidification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."typ_elt" IS 'Type d''élémént';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."no_affic" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_table" IS 'Code de la table rattachée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_col1" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_col2" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_col3" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_col4" IS 'Code de la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."cd_col5" IS 'Code de la colonne';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."val_col3" IS 'Valeur pour la colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_lig"."val_col4" IS 'Valeur pour la colonne';

CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_zoom" (
	"wzoom" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"wzoom_no_cfg" integer NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"des_cfg" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_requ" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "wzoom", "wzoom_no_cfg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbsynop_zoom" IS 'Paramètres à passer à la fenêtre accédée par zoom';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."wzoom" IS 'Code de la fenêtre pour le zoom';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."wzoom_no_cfg" IS 'Numéro externe de la configuration de paramètres';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."des_cfg" IS 'Désignation de la configuration';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière moidification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."cd_etat" IS 'Etat à initialiser sur la fenêtre de consultation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Etat à initialiser sur la fenêtre de consultation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbsynop_zoom"."cd_requ" IS 'Requête à initialiser sur la fenêtre de consultation';

	"cd_mode_tro" numeric(2,0) NOT NULL,

	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_unit_cond" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"pds_unit_cond" "t_pds" NULL,
	"fmt_pds_unit_cond" char(20) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_unit_cond" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbunitcond" IS 'Unité de conditionnement de base';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."cd_unit_cond" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."des_unit_cond" IS 'Désignation de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."pds_unit_cond" IS 'Poids unitaire de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitcond"."fmt_pds_unit_cond" IS 'Format de présentation du poids';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."dbunitmes" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_unit" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_ref" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"typ_unit_mes" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"coef_unit" char(255) NOT NULL,
	"fmt_unit" char(20) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_unit" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbunitmes" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_ref" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_unit_mes" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"coef_unit" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"fmt_unit" "t_fmt" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_unit" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbunitmes" IS 'Unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."cd_unit_ref" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."typ_unit_mes" IS 'Type d''unité de mesure (exe : longueur, surface...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."coef_unit" IS 'Coefficient de conversion par rapport à l''unité de référence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbunitmes"."fmt_unit" IS 'Format de présentation de l''unité';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbunitmes_dblang" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_lang" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"des_unit_mes_lang" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,

);

	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE "obi"."dbvticptl" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_vti" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_vti" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"pt_comi_vti" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_esc" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_cpte_pays" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_cpte_intcom" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_cpte_exp" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_cpte_susp" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_rem" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_inclus_prx" char(1) NULL,
	"vti_anal" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_ident" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_identa" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_identb" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_identc" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_identd" char(25) NULL,
	"num_identa" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identb" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identd" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_idente" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"num_identf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"clas_vti" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_idente" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_identf" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_vti" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dbvticptl" IS 'Ventilation comptable de base';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."des_vti" IS 'Désignation de la ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."pt_comi_vti" IS 'Pointeur commission (O/N)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."pt_esc" IS 'Pointeur escompte (O/N)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_cpte_pays" IS 'Code du compte comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_cpte_intcom" IS 'Code du compte comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_cpte_exp" IS 'Code du compte comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_cpte_susp" IS 'Code du compte comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."pt_rem" IS 'Pointeur remise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."pt_inclus_prx" IS 'Ligne de prix incluse dans prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."vti_anal" IS 'Correspondance comptable du code ventilation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."clas_vti" IS 'Classe de ventilation A= achat, V= vente, null= autre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_idente" IS 'Critere identification 5';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_identf" IS 'Critere identification 6';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dbvticptl"."cd_imput_anal" IS 'Code imputation analytique';

	"cd_requ" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_fen" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"lib_requ" long varchar NULL,
	"fen_larg" integer NULL,
	"fen_haut" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst_imp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"designation" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_requ" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcrequ"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcrequ"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcrequ"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcrequ"."designation" IS 'Désignation';

	"cd_requ" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"no_ordre" integer NOT NULL,
	"val_init" char(40) NULL,
	"des_col" char(40) NULL,
	"cd_table_requ" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_col_requ" char(35) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,

	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_requ", "no_ordre" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcrequ_col"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';

	"cd_sta" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"des_sta" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcsta"."cd_sta" IS 'Code station';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcsta"."des_sta" IS 'Désignation de la station de travail';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcsta"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';

	"cd_impt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_sta" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_impt", "cd_sta" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcsta_dcimpt"."cd_sta" IS 'Code station';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dcste" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"des_ste" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_intl_pays" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_intl_pays_intcom" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_org" char(14) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"cd_lang" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_habil" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_douan" char(5) NULL,
	"cd_pluri" char(2) NULL,
	"nom_deb" char(20) NULL,
	"mot_passe" char(8) NULL,
	"no_adrste" smallint NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_bnq" char(5) NULL,
	"cd_gui" char(5) NULL,
	"des_bnq" char(35) NULL,
	"bnq_adr_lig_a" char(35) NULL,
	"bnq_adr_lig_b" char(35) NULL,
	"bnq_cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"bnq_vil" char(35) NULL,
	"capital" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_ape" char(4) NULL,
	"bnq_cd_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cpte" char(11) NULL,
	"rib" char(2) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dcste" IS 'Société utilisatrice';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."des_ste" IS 'Nom de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_intl_pays" IS 'Désignateur du code international (1ère partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_intl_pays_intcom" IS 'Désignateur intracommunautaire (1ère partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_org" IS 'Code organisation (en France le no SIREN, 2ième partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_lang" IS 'Langue utilisée en général dans la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_mon" IS 'Monnaie de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_pays" IS 'Pays de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."no_habil" IS 'No habilitation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_douan" IS 'No d agrément du tiers déclarant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_pluri" IS 'Code complément pour les assujettis 
	français pluriactifs';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."nom_deb" IS 'correspondant des douanes pour la deb';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."mot_passe" IS 'Mot de passe pour DEB informatisé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."no_adrste" IS 'No adresse pour la DEB';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_etat" IS 'Code etat pour la DEB';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code type etat pour la DEB';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_bnq" IS 'Code banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_gui" IS 'Code guichet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."des_bnq" IS 'Désignation de la banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."bnq_adr_lig_a" IS 'Ligne 1 adresse banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."bnq_adr_lig_b" IS 'Ligne 2 adresse banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."bnq_cd_post" IS 'Code postal de la banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."bnq_vil" IS 'Ville de la banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."capital" IS 'Capital de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_ape" IS 'Code APE de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."bnq_cd_pays" IS 'Pays de la banque';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."cd_cpte" IS 'Numéro de la compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste"."rib" IS 'Clé RIB';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dcste_adr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_adrste" smallint NOT NULL,
	"deno" "t_deno_ste" NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"adr_lig_a" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"adr_lig_b" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"vil" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"tlc" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlf" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlx" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"nic" char(5) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"e_mail" char(50) NULL,
	"adr_internet" char(50) NULL,
	"no_cee" char(14) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_adrste" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dcste_adr" IS 'ADRESSE SOCIETE';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."no_adrste" IS 'Numéro d''adresse de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."deno" IS 'Dénomination d''une société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."des" IS 'Désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."adr_lig_a" IS '1ère ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."adr_lig_b" IS '2ième ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."cd_post" IS 'Code postal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."vil" IS 'Ville';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."cd_pays" IS 'Code pays';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."tlc" IS 'Numéro de télécopie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."tlf" IS 'Numéro de téléphone';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."tlx" IS 'Numéro de télex';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."nic" IS 'NIC (complément du numéro de Siren pour construire le numéro de Siret)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."e_mail" IS 'adresse email';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."adr_internet" IS 'adresse internet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_adr"."no_cee" IS 'N° TVA';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_frs_ste" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_frs" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_qte" "t_typ_qte" NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_frs_ste" )

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_frs"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_frs"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_frs"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_frs"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcste_frs"."typ_qte" IS 'Quantité suivie (montant commande, montant facture, poids BL)';

CREATE TABLE "obi"."dcutil" (
	"cd_util" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_cat_util" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_util" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"pt_acmit" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_menu" "t_typ1" NOT NULL,
	"cd_lang_util" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"pt_auto_pref" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_compl" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_util" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."dcutil" IS 'Utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."cd_util" IS 'Code de l''utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."cd_cat_util" IS 'Code de la catégorie d''utilisateurs';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."des_util" IS 'Nom de l''utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."pt_acmit" IS 'Autocommit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."typ_menu" IS 'Type de menu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."cd_lang_util" IS 'Langue de l''utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."pt_auto_pref" IS 'Autorisation de modification des préférences';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dcutil"."no_compl" IS 'No comportement point entrée';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_util" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"pt_ste" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

);

CREATE TABLE "obi"."deb_decla" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"typ_flux" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"no_decla" char(6) NOT NULL,
	"no_ligne" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_lig" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"mod_tra" char(1) NULL,
	"nat_tran" char(2) NULL,
	"val_fisc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cond_liv" char(4) NULL,
	"regime" char(2) NULL,
	"nomenc" char(9) NULL,
	"pds_net" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"val_stat" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"unit_supl" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"no_tva_cl" char(14) NULL,
	"dte_hre_decl" timestamp NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"no_lig_deb" integer NULL,
	"cd_pays_orig" char(2) NULL,
	"pt_trans" char(1) NULL,
	"depart" char(2) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "typ_flux", "no_decla", "no_ligne", "typ_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."typ_flux" IS 'type de flux';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."no_decla" IS 'N° de declaration annee + mois';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."typ_lig" IS 'type de ligne (Manuelle,Automatique)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."mod_tra" IS 'Mode de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."nat_tran" IS 'Nature de la transaction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."val_fisc" IS 'Valeur fiscale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."cond_liv" IS 'Condition de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."nomenc" IS 'nomenclature';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."pds_net" IS 'poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."val_stat" IS 'Valeur statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."unit_supl" IS 'Unite supplementaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."cd_pays" IS 'Code pays';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."no_tva_cl" IS 'N° de TVA du client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."dte_hre_decl" IS 'Date/heure declaration';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."no_lig_deb" IS 'n° ligne sur la DEB';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."cd_pays_orig" IS 'pays origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."pt_trans" IS '1 = france, 2 = autre ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."depart" IS 'departement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."deb_decla"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dem_ach" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_dem" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cat_art" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"typ_ref" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_lien" char(1) NULL,
	"no_lien" integer NULL,
	"no_lien_lig" integer NULL,
	"qte_cde" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_recep" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cde" char(3) NULL,
	"coef" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"no_adr_liv" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_dem" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."no_ste" IS 'N de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."no_int_dem" IS 'N  interne de demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."cd_cat_art" IS 'Categorie de produit ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."typ_ref" IS 'Type de produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."cd_art" IS 'Reference produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."no_int_art" IS 'N  interne d article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."des" IS 'Désignation de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."pt_statut" IS 'Statut de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."typ_lien" IS 'Type de lien';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."no_lien" IS 'N  CDE ou AOF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."no_lien_lig" IS 'N ligne CDE ou AOF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."qte_cde" IS 'Quantite commandee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."qte_recep" IS 'Quantite receptionnee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."cd_unit" IS 'Unite de demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."cd_unit_cde" IS 'Unite de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."coef" IS 'Coef. unite / unite cde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach"."no_adr_liv" IS 'no_adr_liv';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."dem_ach_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_dem" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cat_art" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"typ_ref" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_dem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_affect" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"delai_dem" timestamp NULL,
	"delai_prev" timestamp NULL,
	"com_justif" char(2048) NULL,
	"com_refus" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_modif_stat" timestamp NULL,
	"typ_enlev" char(1) NULL,
	"lieu_enlev" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_nature" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"no_adr_liv" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."no_int_dem" IS 'N° interne de demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."no_int_lig" IS 'N° interne de ligne demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."cd_perso" IS 'Code personnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."cd_cat_art" IS 'categorie de produit ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."typ_ref" IS 'Type de produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."cd_art" IS 'Reference produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."no_int_art" IS 'N° interne d article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."des" IS 'Désignation de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."pt_statut" IS 'Statut de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."qte_dem" IS 'Quantite demandee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."qte_affect" IS 'Quantite affectee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."cd_unit" IS 'Unite de demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."delai_dem" IS 'Delai demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."delai_prev" IS 'Delai prevu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."com_justif" IS 'Justification de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."com_refus" IS 'Justification du refus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."dte_modif_stat" IS 'Date/heure modif statut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."typ_enlev" IS 'Type d enlevement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."lieu_enlev" IS 'Lieu d enlevement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."pt_nature" IS 'Nature de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."dem_ach_lig"."no_adr_liv" IS 'no_adr_liv';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."doc" (
	"cd_typ_doc" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_doc" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_doc" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"des_doc" char(35) NULL,
	"no_affic_doc" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_typ_doc", "no_ste", "no_int_doc" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."doc" IS 'Document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."cd_typ_doc" IS 'Code du type de document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."no_int_doc" IS 'Numéro interne de coument';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."cd_doc" IS 'Code du document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."des_doc" IS 'Désignation du document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc"."no_affic_doc" IS 'No ordre affichage';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."doc_lie" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_doc_lie" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_orig_doc" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_doc" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_doc" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"no_int_proc_gamope" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_car" integer NULL,
	"cd_car" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_phctrl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_phctrl_car" integer NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_affic_doc_lie" integer NULL,
	"num_ver" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_ver" timestamp NULL,
	"pt_maj" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_doc" char(25) NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_doc_lie", "typ_orig_doc" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."doc_lie" IS 'Documents liés';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_doc_lie" IS 'Code du document associé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."typ_orig_doc" IS 'Table d''origine du document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."cd_typ_doc" IS 'Code du type de document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_doc" IS 'Numéro interne de coument';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_proc_gamope" IS 'Numéro interne de la procédure liée à l''opération de la gamme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_car" IS 'No interne de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."cd_car" IS 'Code de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_phctrl" IS 'Numéro interne de la phase de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_phctrl_car" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre dans la phase de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_affic_doc_lie" IS 'No ordre d''affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."num_ver" IS 'Numéro de version de la révision';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."dte_hre_ver" IS 'Date de la version';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."pt_maj" IS 'Autorisation de mise à jour de la version';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_phctrl_carmo" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."doc_lie"."no_int_cr_fich" IS 'Numéro interne de la fiche de contrôle réception';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_bn_liv_man" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_liv" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_emet" "datetime" NULL,
	"Achet_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"Exp_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"Exp_nom" char(35) NULL,
	"Exp_adr_1" char(35) NULL,
	"Exp_adr_2" char(35) NULL,
	"Exp_adr_3" char(35) NULL,
	"Exp_adr_4" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_contact" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_nom" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_adr_1" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_adr_2" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_adr_3" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_adr_4" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_pays" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_no" char(17) NULL,
	"Dest_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"Dest_nom" char(35) NULL,
	"Dest_lieu" char(17) NULL,
	"Dest_adr_1" char(35) NULL,
	"Dest_adr_2" char(35) NULL,
	"Dest_adr_3" char(35) NULL,
	"Dest_adr_4" char(35) NULL,
	"Cd_vehi_motr" char(17) NULL,
	"Cd_vehi_trac" char(17) NULL,
	"dte_hre_arriv" "datetime" NULL,
	"Des_inc_lang" char(35) NULL,
	"Pds_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mode_tro" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_pays_vend" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_pays_dest" char(2) NULL,
	"nom_transporteur" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_tre" char(7) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"exp_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"vend_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"dest_cd_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_liv" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."cpt_bn_liv" IS 'No de BL';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Exp_adr_1" IS 'Ligne adresse 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Exp_adr_2" IS 'Ligne adresse 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Exp_adr_3" IS 'Ligne adresse 3';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Exp_adr_4" IS 'Ligne adresse 4';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_contact" IS 'Contact EDI';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_cd" IS 'Code vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_nom" IS 'Nom vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_adr_1" IS 'Ligne adresse vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_adr_2" IS 'Ligne adresse vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_adr_3" IS 'Ligne adresse vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_adr_4" IS 'Ligne adresse vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_pays" IS 'Pays vendeur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Vend_no" IS 'No attribué par le récepteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Dest_cd" IS 'Code destinataire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv"."Dest_nom" IS 'Nom destinataire';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"Cd_art" char(35) NULL,
	"Des_art_a" char(35) NULL,
	"Des_art_b" char(35) NULL,
	"Qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"Cd_ext_cde_cl" char(17) NULL,
	"Ind_plan" char(4) NULL,
	"Ind_pr_art" char(4) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	"cd_ident_transp" char(10) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_liv", "no_int_lig_bnliv" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv_lig"."Ind_pr_art" IS 'Indice modif produit';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_bnliv_lig"."cd_ident_transp" IS 'Identifiant transporteur';

CREATE TABLE "obi"."edi_cl_cde" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_cl_cde" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_cl" char(17) NULL,
	"dte_cl" "datetime" NULL,
	"authe_cl" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_vend" char(20) NULL,
	"cd_achet" char(20) NULL,
	"nom_achet" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_effet" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"msg" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_pivot" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_cl_cde" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."no_cl_cde" IS 'Numéro interne, Clef générée par compteur EDI_CL_CDE';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."no_cl" IS 'Document No Origine MID 1004 (4+1,17)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."dte_cl" IS 'Document date Origine MID 2007 (4+18,6)+MID2002(4+24,4)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."authe_cl" IS 'Authentification Origine MID 4426 (4+59,35)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."cd_vend" IS 'Code vendeur No Origine SDT 33473 (4+1,20)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."cd_achet" IS 'code acheteur Origine BDT 330033 (4+1,17)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."nom_achet" IS 'nom acheteur Origine BDT 3036(4+21,35)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."dte_effet" IS 'Date effet origine ARI 2069(4+2,6) si nul alors horizon calculé sinon horizon saisi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."dte_fin" IS 'date fin origine ARI 2073(4+8,6)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."cd_mon" IS 'Code de la monnaie de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde"."typ_pivot" IS 'Type de programme';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_cl_cde" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_cde_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_dest" char(37) NULL,
	"cd_fact" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_cl_cde", "no_cl_cde_adr" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr"."cd_dest" IS 'destinataire origine CSG31333(4+1,20)+csg3921(4+214,17)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_cl_cde" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_cde_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_cde_adr_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_art" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"cde_cl" char(17) NULL,
	"cd_plan" char(35) NULL,
	"ind_art" char(17) NULL,
	"mod_maj" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_extin" "datetime" NULL,
	"freq_dem" char(2) NULL,
	"dte_calc_bes" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_cumul" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_recu" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_avt_ret" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_dep_cum" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_maj_prog" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"cd_pt_dch" char(17) NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"px_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_net" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"com_liv" char(2048) NULL,
	"ref_com1" char(10) NULL,
	"ref_com2" char(10) NULL,
	"tx_rem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_pie_col" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" char(10) NULL,
	"nom_contact" char(35) NULL,
	"info_contact" char(35) NULL,
	"ind_plan" char(35) NULL,
	"no_release" char(35) NULL,
	"art_vend" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_der_ran" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_cl_cde", "no_cl_cde_adr", "no_cl_cde_adr_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."no_cl_cde_adr_lig" IS 'Numéro interne, Clef générée par compteur EDI_CL_CDE_ADR_LIG';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."cd_pt_dch" IS 'Code du point de déchargement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."cd_pt_dest" IS 'Code du point de destination';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."px_net" IS 'Prix unitaire net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."com" IS 'Commentaire de la ligne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."com_liv" IS 'Commentaire de la livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."ref_com1" IS 'Reference 1 de la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."ref_com2" IS 'Reference 2 de la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."tx_rem" IS 'Taux de remise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."edi_cl_cde_adr_lig"."nb_pie_col" IS 'Nombre de pièces par conditionnement';

);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NOT NULL,

	"nb_hre_th" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"nb_hre_pre" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"nb_hre_arr" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"nb_hre_abs" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,

);
