COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."typ_rego_imp_fact" IS 'Type de regroupement de factures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."perio_clas" IS 'Période de réévaluation du classement du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."com" IS 'commentaire fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."typ_supp_cad" IS 'Type suppression cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."pour_tol_ferme" IS 'Poucentage tolerence ecart ferme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."pour_tol_prev" IS 'Poucentage tolerence ecart prevision.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."nb_jour_mvt" IS 'Nb de jour pour previsionnelle a mouvementer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."cd_cptl_gene" IS 'Compte de ventilation centralise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."typ_supp_cad_apr" IS 'Suppression des cadences après horizon';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."cd_subro" IS 'Code de subrogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."typ_tva" IS 'D = TVA au debit, E = TVA a l encaisssement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."cd_ape" IS 'Code APE';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo"."pt_plan_no" IS '1-Oter du planning par ressource';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_adr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"des_fo_adr" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr_ext" char(10) NULL,
	"deno" "t_deno_ste" NULL,
	"adr_lig_a" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"adr_lig_b" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"vil" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"tlf" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlc" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlx" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"nic" char(5) NULL,
	"e_mail" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_tre" "t_cd" NULL,
	"adr_internet" char(50) NULL,
	"del_trans" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_aqf" timestamp NULL,
	"pt_aqf" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_zongeo" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_cde_gcf" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_cde_avret" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_synch" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_cde_mod_synch" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_cde_maj" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_cde_anal_ecart" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_recep_affec_cad" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_recep_cad_prev" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cl_fo" char(25) NULL,
	"pour_tol_ferme" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pour_tol_prev" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tel_abr" char(17) NULL,
	"fax_abr" char(17) NULL,
	"nb_jour_mvt" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "no_fo_adr" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_adr" IS 'Adresse fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."cd_pays" IS 'Code pays';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."no_aff_fo_adr" IS 'Numéro d''adresse (affichage)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."des_fo_adr" IS 'Désignation de l''adresse du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."no_fo_adr_ext" IS 'Numéro d''adresse donnée par le client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."deno" IS 'Dénomination d''une société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."adr_lig_a" IS '1ère ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."adr_lig_b" IS '2ième ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."cd_post" IS 'Code postal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."vil" IS 'Ville';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."tlf" IS 'Numéro de téléphone';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."tlc" IS 'Numéro de télécopie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."tlx" IS 'Numéro de télex';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."nic" IS 'NIC (complément du numéro de Siren pour construire le numéro de Siret)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."e_mail" IS 'Adresse E-mail';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."cd_tre" IS 'Code du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."adr_internet" IS 'Adresse Internet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."del_trans" IS 'Délai de transport (jours)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."cd_zongeo" IS 'zone geographique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."cd_cl_fo" IS 'Notre reference';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."pour_tol_ferme" IS 'Poucentage tolerence ecart ferme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."pour_tol_prev" IS 'Poucentage tolerence ecart prevision.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."tel_abr" IS 'No telephone abrege';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."fax_abr" IS 'No fax abrege';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr"."nb_jour_mvt" IS 'Nb de jour pour previsionnelle a mouvementer';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_adr_cont" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cont_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_cont_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"des_cont" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"tlf" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"e_mail" char(50) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"prenom_cont" char(20) NULL,
	"Mr_mme_mlle" char(1) NULL,
	"portable" char(17) NULL,
	"fax" char(17) NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"pt_cont_hab" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"tel_abr" char(17) NULL,
	"fax_abr" char(17) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "no_fo_adr", "no_int_cont_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_adr_cont" IS 'Contact par adresse fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."no_int_cont_fo" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."no_aff_cont_fo" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."des_cont" IS 'Nom du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."tlf" IS 'Numéro de téléphone';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."e_mail" IS 'Adresse E-mail';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."prenom_cont" IS 'Prenom contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."Mr_mme_mlle" IS 'Type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."portable" IS 'portable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."fax" IS 'fax';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."com" IS 'com';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."pt_cont_hab" IS 'Contact habituel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."tel_abr" IS 'No telephone abrege';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont"."fax_abr" IS 'No fax abrege';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cont_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_fnct" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "no_fo_adr", "no_int_cont_fo", "cd_fnct" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct" IS 'Fonction des contacts fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct"."no_int_cont_fo" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_adr_cont_dbfnct"."cd_fnct" IS 'Code de la fonction';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_aof" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fo_aof" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"ref_aof" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_aof" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"statut" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'E',
	"dte_aof" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_rep" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_limite_rep" "datetime" NULL,
	"crit_val_delai_a" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_delai_b" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_delai_c" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_delai_d" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_qualite_a" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_qualite_b" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_qualite_c" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_qualite_d" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_prix_a" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_prix_b" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_prix_c" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_prix_d" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_service_a" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_service_b" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_service_c" char(1) NULL,
	"crit_val_service_d" char(1) NULL,
	"compt_a" char(7) NULL,
	"compt_b" char(7) NULL,
	"compt_c" char(7) NULL,
	"compt_d" char(7) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fo_aof" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."no_ste" IS 'No societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."no_int_fo_aof" IS 'NÝ interne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."ref_aof" IS 'Référence de l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."typ_aof" IS 'Type aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."cd_perso" IS 'Code personnel responsable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."statut" IS 'Statut de l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."dte_aof" IS 'Date de saisie de l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."dte_rep" IS 'Date de réponse souhaitée pour l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."dte_limite_rep" IS 'Date de réponse limite pour l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_delai_a" IS 'Niveau de délai souhaité pour la compétence a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_delai_b" IS 'Niveau de délai souhaité pour la compétence b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_delai_c" IS 'Niveau de délai souhaité pour la compétence c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_delai_d" IS 'Niveau de délai souhaité pour la compétence d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_qualite_a" IS 'Niveau de qualité souhaitée pour la compétence a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_qualite_b" IS 'Niveau de qualité souhaitée pour la compétence b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_qualite_c" IS 'Niveau de qualité souhaitée pour la compétence c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_qualite_d" IS 'Niveau de qualité souhaitée pour la compétence d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_prix_a" IS 'Niveau de prix souhaité pour la compétence a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_prix_b" IS 'Niveau de prix souhaité pour la compétence b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_prix_c" IS 'Niveau de prix souhaité pour la compétence c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_prix_d" IS 'Niveau de prix souhaité pour la compétence d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_service_a" IS 'Niveau de service souhaité pour la compétence a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_service_b" IS 'Niveau de service souhaité pour la compétence b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_service_c" IS 'Niveau de service souhaité pour la compétence c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."crit_val_service_d" IS 'Niveau de service souhaité pour la compétence d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."compt_a" IS 'Compétence a nécessaire à l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."compt_b" IS 'Compétence b nécessaire à l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."compt_c" IS 'Compétence c nécessaire à l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."compt_d" IS 'Compétence d nécessaire à l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure creation enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure derniere modification enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_aof_cible" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fo_aof" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"pt_ajout" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_ex" integer NULL,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"pt_imp_aof" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_imp_aof" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fo_aof", "cd_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."no_ste" IS 'No societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."no_int_fo_aof" IS 'NÝ interne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur ciblé par l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."no_fo_adr" IS 'NÝ d''adresse du fournisseur ciblé par l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."pt_ajout" IS 'Pointeur d''ajout manuel du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code type état d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."cd_etat" IS 'Code état d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaire d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire d''entête d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire de pied de page d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."pt_imp_aof" IS 'Pointeur d''impression de l''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."dte_hre_imp_aof" IS 'Date/heure d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure creation enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_cible"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure derniere modification enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_aof_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fo_aof" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_fo_aof_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_fo_aof_lig" integer NULL,
	"des_aof_lig" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_af" char(7) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"typ_orig" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"des_art_a" char(35) NULL,
	"des_art_b" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_plan" char(25) NULL,
	"ind_plan" char(4) NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_oper" char(8) NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"no_int_proc_nomlien" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_proc_gamope" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_cl_dmd_lig" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_unit_aof" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"qte_aof_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_aof_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_aof_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_aof_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_com_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_com_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_com_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_com_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_liv_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_aof_val_a" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_aof_val_b" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_aof_val_c" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_aof_val_d" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_aff" integer NULL,
	"pt_valid" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_accept" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_dem_ach" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fo_aof", "no_int_fo_aof_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_ste" IS 'No societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_fo_aof" IS 'NÝ interne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_fo_aof_lig" IS 'NÝ interne de ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_ext_fo_aof_lig" IS 'NÝ externe de ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."des_aof_lig" IS 'Désignation de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."cd_af" IS 'Code affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."com" IS 'Commentaire de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."typ_orig" IS 'Type d''origine de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."cd_art" IS 'Code article pour typ_orig = 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."indice" IS 'Indice article pour typ_orig = 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."des_art_a" IS 'Désignation 1 article pour typ_orig = 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."des_art_b" IS 'Désignation 2 article pour typ_orig = 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."cd_plan" IS 'Code plan article pour typ_orig = 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."ind_plan" IS 'Indice plan article pour typ_orig = 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_art" IS 'NÝ article pour typ_orig = 2,4 ou 6';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."cd_oper" IS 'Code opération pour typ_orig = 3';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'NÝ OF pour typ_orig = 8 ou 9';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus pour typ_orig = 4 ou 6';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_proc_nomlien" IS 'NÝ nomenclature processus pour typ_orig = 4 ou 5';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_proc_gamope" IS 'NÝ opération processus pour typ_orig = 6 ou 7';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'NÝ nomenclature OF pour typ_orig = 8';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'NÝ opération OF pour typ_orig = 9';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_cl_dmd" IS 'NÝ OPC pour typ_orig = 5,7 ou 10';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_int_cl_dmd_lig" IS 'NÝ ligne OPC pour typ_orig = 5,7 ou 10';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."cd_unit_aof" IS 'Unité de quantité de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_aof_a" IS 'Quantité a de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_aof_b" IS 'Quantité b de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_aof_c" IS 'Quantité c de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_aof_d" IS 'Quantité d de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_com_a" IS 'Quantité de commande a de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_com_b" IS 'Quantité de commande b de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_com_c" IS 'Quantité de commande c de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_com_d" IS 'Quantité de commande d de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_liv_a" IS 'Quantité de livraison a de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_liv_b" IS 'Quantité de livraison b de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_liv_c" IS 'Quantité de livraison c de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."qte_liv_d" IS 'Quantité de livraison d de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."typ_aof_val_a" IS 'Valeur du critère 1 du type d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."typ_aof_val_b" IS 'Valeur du critère 2 du type d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."typ_aof_val_c" IS 'Valeur du critère 3 du type d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."typ_aof_val_d" IS 'Valeur du critère 4 du type d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_aff" IS 'NÝ d''ordre d''affichage des lignes';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."pt_valid" IS 'Pointeur d''acceptation de la ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure creation enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure derniere modification enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."pt_accept" IS 'pointeur accepte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig"."no_dem_ach" IS 'N de demande d achat';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fo_aof" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_fo_aof_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_px" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"coef_unit_px" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"typ_px_a" char(1) NULL,
	"px_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_min_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_px_b" char(1) NULL,
	"px_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_min_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_px_c" char(1) NULL,
	"px_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_min_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_px_d" char(1) NULL,
	"px_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_min_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tps" char(3) NULL,
	"delai_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"delai_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"delai_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"delai_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fo_aof", "no_int_fo_aof_lig", "cd_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."no_ste" IS 'No societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."no_int_fo_aof" IS 'NÝ interne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."no_int_fo_aof_lig" IS 'NÝ interne de ligne d''aof';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur de la réponse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."cd_unit_px" IS 'Unité de prix de la réponse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."coef_unit_px" IS 'Coefficient entre l''unité de px et l''unité de qté';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."cd_mon" IS 'Devise du prix de la réponse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."typ_px_a" IS 'Type de prix (Proportionnel ou Constant) pour la qté a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."px_a" IS 'Valeur du prix pour la qté a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."mnt_min_a" IS 'Montant minimum du prix pour la qté a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."typ_px_b" IS 'Type de prix (Proportionnel ou Constant) pour la qté b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."px_b" IS 'Valeur du prix pour la qté b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."mnt_min_b" IS 'Montant minimum du prix pour la qté b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."typ_px_c" IS 'Type de prix (Proportionnel ou Constant) pour la qté c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."px_c" IS 'Valeur du prix pour la qté c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."mnt_min_c" IS 'Montant minimum du prix pour la qté c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."typ_px_d" IS 'Type de prix (Proportionnel ou Constant) pour la qté d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."px_d" IS 'Valeur du prix pour la qté d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."mnt_min_d" IS 'Montant minimum du prix pour la qté d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."cd_unit_tps" IS 'Unité du délai';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."delai_a" IS 'Délai nécessaire au fournisseur pour la qté a';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."delai_b" IS 'Délai nécessaire au fournisseur pour la qté b';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."delai_c" IS 'Délai nécessaire au fournisseur pour la qté c';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."delai_d" IS 'Délai nécessaire au fournisseur pour la qté d';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."com" IS 'Commentaire de la réponse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure creation enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_aof_lig_rep"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure derniere modification enregistrement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_art" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_oper" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"no_int_proc_gamope" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"typ_art_fo" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_art" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"coef_unit" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"fmt_qte_art_cl" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"nom_pr_art" char(9) NULL,
	"mnt_plus_valu_stat" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_pie_gal" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_pie_regl" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_pie_sec" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"nb_pie_col" "t_nb_pie_col" NULL,
	"cd_typ_tf" char(1) NULL,
	"resp_ach" char(7) NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NULL,
	"pt_valid" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_mini_eco" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "no_int_art_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_art" IS 'article fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."no_int_art_fo" IS 'No interne d''article fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_oper" IS 'Code de l''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."no_int_proc_gamope" IS 'Numéro interne de la procédure liée à l''opération de la gamme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_unit_cond" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_rei" IS 'Code du régime de TVA';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_cnd_port" IS 'Code condition port';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_cnd_emb" IS 'Code de l''emballage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_nat_tran" IS 'Code de la nature de la transaction (Galia)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."typ_art_fo" IS 'Type article fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_art" IS 'Référence de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."indice" IS 'Indice géré en clé unique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."ind_pr_art" IS 'Indice produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."des_art_a" IS '1ère ligne de la désignation de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."des_art_b" IS '2 ième ligne de la désignation de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_pl" IS 'Référence du plan';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."ind_pl" IS 'Indice plan article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."coef_unit" IS 'Coefficient de conversion par rapport à l''unité de référence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."fmt_qte_art_cl" IS 'Format de présentation de la quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."nom_pr_art" IS 'Nomenclature produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."mnt_plus_valu_stat" IS 'Plus value statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."pt_pie_gal" IS 'Pointeur pièce Galia O N';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."pt_pie_regl" IS 'Pointeur piece de règlementation O N';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."pt_pie_sec" IS 'Pointeur pièce de sécurité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."nb_pie_col" IS 'Nombre de pièce par colis';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_typ_tf" IS 'Type de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."resp_ach" IS 'Responsable des achats';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."no_dero" IS 'Code dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."pt_valid" IS 'Pointeur validite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."qte_mini_eco" IS 'Quantite minimum economique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_imput_anal" IS 'Code imputation analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_art"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bnstr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"no_int_aff_bnstr" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_imp" "datetime" NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_ent_bnstr" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"com_pied_bnstr" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"pt_sold" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_comp_liv" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bnstr" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr" IS 'Bon sstr';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."cpt_bnstr" IS 'Numéro du bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."no_int_aff_bnstr" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."dte_hre_imp" IS 'Date te heure de la dernière impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."com_ent_bnstr" IS 'Commentaire d''en-tête d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."com_pied_bnstr" IS 'Commentaire de pied d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."pt_sold" IS 'Solde du bon de travail';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr"."pt_comp_liv" IS 'Composants livres';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig" (
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lig_bnstr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_del" char(3) NULL,
	"no_int_aff_bnstr_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"qte_to_do" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pds_to_do" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_lig_cde_fo" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"del_liv" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_emp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"no_trace" char(25) NULL,
	"pds_accep" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_accep" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pds_recu" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_recu" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_sold" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dt_hre_recep" "datetime" NULL,
	"coef_unit" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dt_hre_recep_init" "datetime" NULL,
	"dt_hre_valid_com" "datetime" NULL,
	"com_contact" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"aut_com_contact" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"pt_ncnf" char(1) NULL,
	"no_n_ncf" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_ordre" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig_bnstr" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig" IS 'Ligne bon sstr';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'Numéro interne d''opération de l''OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_int_lig_bnstr" IS 'Numéro de la ligne de bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."cpt_bnstr" IS 'Numéro du bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."cd_unit_del" IS 'Code unité de délai';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_int_aff_bnstr_lig" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage de la ligne de bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."qte_to_do" IS 'Quantité à faire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."pds_to_do" IS 'Poids à faire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."qte_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Champ non utilise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."del_liv" IS 'Délai de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."pt_emp" IS 'Pointeur stock par emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_trace" IS 'Numéro de traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."pds_accep" IS 'Cumul poids accepté';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."qte_accep" IS 'Cumul quantité accepté';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."pds_recu" IS 'Cumul poids recu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."qte_recu" IS 'Cumul quantité recue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."pt_sold" IS 'Soldé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."dt_hre_recep" IS 'date de réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."coef_unit" IS 'Coefficient de conversion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."dt_hre_recep_init" IS 'Date réception initial';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."dt_hre_valid_com" IS 'Date de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."com_contact" IS 'commentaire suite à contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."aut_com_contact" IS 'auteur du contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."pt_ncnf" IS 'Pointeur non confirme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_n_ncf" IS 'No non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig"."no_int_ordre" IS 'Numero US associee';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom" (
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnstr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_nom_lien" integer NOT NULL,
	"qte_calc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_expe" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_conv" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_lien_ordfab_nomlien", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_int_lig_bnstr", "no_ste", "no_int_nom_lien" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom" IS 'Composants à livrer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'Numéro de lien';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'Numéro interne d''opération de l''OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."no_int_lig_bnstr" IS 'Numéro de la ligne de bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."no_int_nom_lien" IS 'Numérop interne de lien avec un composant à livrer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."qte_calc" IS 'Champ inutilise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."qte_expe" IS 'Champ inutilise';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."qte" IS 'Quantite besoin unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_lig_nom"."qte_conv" IS 'Champ inutilise';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bnstr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"qte_mvt_tot" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_mvt" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bnstr", "no_int_art" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."no_ste" IS 'No societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."cpt_bnstr" IS 'No bon de sous traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."no_int_art" IS 'No interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."qte_mvt_tot" IS 'Quantite mouvementee totale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."qte_mvt" IS 'Quantité dernier mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure creation enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure derniere modification enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_bnstr_nom"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_br" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_recep" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_br" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_br" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_tre" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_mode_tro" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"dte_hre_imp" "datetime" NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"pt_imp_bn_recep" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_valid" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_bn_recep_man" char(30) NULL,
	"dte_hre_recep" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_fact" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_bn_recep" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_imp_inspection" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_recep" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_br" IS 'Bon de réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cpt_bn_recep" IS 'Numéro de bon de réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_typ_etat_br" IS 'Code du type d''état BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_etat_br" IS 'Code de l''état BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_cnd_emb" IS 'Code de l''emballage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_cnd_port" IS 'Code condition port';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_inc" IS 'Code de l''incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_tre" IS 'Code du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."cd_mode_tro" IS 'Code du mode de transport (Galia)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."dte_hre_imp" IS 'Date de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire d''entête de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire de pied de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."pt_imp_bn_recep" IS 'Pointeur bon de réception imprimé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."pt_valid" IS 'Type de valideur (interne ou externe)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."no_bn_recep_man" IS 'Numéro de bon de réception manuel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."dte_hre_recep" IS 'Date de réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."pt_fact" IS 'Pointeur  facturation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."typ_bn_recep" IS 'Type de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Type de BR';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_br_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_bn_recep" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_mon_dcste" char(3) NULL,
	"no_fo_adr_fact" integer NULL,
	"cd_reg" "t_cd" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_mod_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_recep_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_ext_cde_fo" char(25) NULL,
	"pt_cde_edi" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com_acpt" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_lig_cde_fo" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"no_ext_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"cd_pt_dch" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dch" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_bloq" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dero" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_emb" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_grat" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_px_prov" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_recep" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"nom_pr_art" char(9) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"mnt_acpt_recep" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_mon_fo" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_mon_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"esc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_acpt" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_av_recep" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"rem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_lig_bn_recep" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_fact_spe" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_txe" char(1) NULL,
	"txe" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"txe_parf_base1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"txe_parf_base2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_lig_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_bloq_dte_tf" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"tx_rem" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tx_txe" "t_tx" NULL,
	"cd_art" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_brut_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_bloq_man" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_force_sld" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_unit_suppl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"mnt_dero" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_plus_valu_stat" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pds_brut" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pds_net" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pt_intracom" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_art_bnrecep_fo" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_fact_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_fo_dero" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_mon_fo" char(3) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"qte_accep" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pds_net_accep" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_sold_bt" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_sold_bt_lig" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_sold_of_oper" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dt_valid" timestamp NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"qte_ctrl" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_fact" integer NULL,
	"pt_litige" char(1) NULL,
	"com_litige" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"cd_rego" char(10) NULL,
	"qte_unit_supl" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_lig_deb" integer NULL,
	"cd_ext_lig_cde_fo" char(25) NULL,
	"no_decla" char(6) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig_bnrecep" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig"."qte_sto" IS 'Quantité en unité de stock';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig"."cd_ext_lig_cde_fo" IS 'n° externe de ligne de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig"."no_decla" IS 'numero declaration DEB';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'N° ligne BL client associe';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_bn_recep" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" integer NOT NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_sld_cad" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_fo", "no_int_lig_cde_fo", "no_int_cde_cad_fo", "cpt_bn_recep", "no_int_lig_bnrecep" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad" IS 'Cadences reçues';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."no_int_cde_cad_fo" IS 'No interne de cadence de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."cpt_bn_recep" IS 'Numéro de bon de réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."no_int_lig_bnrecep" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."qte_sto" IS 'Quantité en unité de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."pt_sld_cad" IS 'Cadence soldée (0-non,1-oui) (commande ouverte)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_cad"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_recep" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_br_clg" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit_manu" "t_cd" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"pds_brut" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pds_net" "t_pds" NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"nb_unit_cond" "t_nb" NULL,
	"no_prem_eti_cnd" "t_nb" NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_eti_manu" "t_nb" NULL,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_emp" char(7) NULL,
	"qte_sto_bis" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_peremp" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_orig" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ordre" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_recep", "no_int_lig_bnrecep", "no_int_br_clg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg" IS 'Colisage du BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."cpt_bn_recep" IS 'Numéro de bon de réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."no_int_lig_bnrecep" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."no_int_br_clg" IS 'Numéro de ligne de colisage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."cd_unit_cond" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."cd_unit_manu" IS 'Code de l''unité de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Type de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."pds_brut" IS 'Poids brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."nb_unit_cond" IS 'Nombre d''unité de contionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."no_prem_eti_cnd" IS 'Numéro de première étiquette de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."cd_lot" IS 'Numéro de traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."no_eti_manu" IS 'Numéro d''étiquette de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."qte_sto" IS 'Quantité en unité de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."qte_sto_bis" IS 'quantite en unite stok secondaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."dte_peremp" IS 'date de peremption';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_clg"."dte_orig" IS 'date originne du lot';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_bn_recep" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep_pxach" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_px_ach" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"no_aff_br_lig_pxach" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"px_brut" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"px_unia_net" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"mnt_forf" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"tx_rem" "t_tx" NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"coef_unit_qte" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"fmt_px" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tf" char(3) NULL,
	"coef_unit_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"base_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_forf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_frs" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"no_int_fo_cde_lig_pxach" integer NULL,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_brut_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_rem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_rem_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tva" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_tva_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf1_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_vti_parf1" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti_parf2" char(3) NULL,
	"tx_txe" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe_parf1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe_parf2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_frs_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_frs_prefact" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_fact_tiers" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fact" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_fact" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lig_bnrecep", "no_int_lig_bnrecep_pxach" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."no_int_px_ach" IS 'no_int_px_ach';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation de la ligne de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."cd_unit_tf" IS 'Code unité quantité du tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."coef_unit_tf" IS 'Coefficient entre unité de commande et unité de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."base_tf" IS 'Base de calcul du prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."pt_forf" IS 'Frais pas proportionnel a la quantite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."qte_frs" IS 'Nombre de frais';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."typ_tf" IS 'Type de  tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."no_int_fo_cde_lig_pxach" IS 'no interne de ligne de prix origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."mnt_txe_parf1" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."mnt_txe_parf1_ste" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 1 en monnaie société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."mnt_txe_parf2" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."mnt_txe_parf2_ste" IS 'Montant taxe parafiscale 2 en monnaie société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."tx_txe" IS 'Taux taxe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."tx_txe_parf1" IS 'Taux de taxe parafiscale 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."tx_txe_parf2" IS 'Taux de taxe parafiscale 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."pt_fact_tiers" IS 'Ligne de prix facturée par un autre fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."no_int_fact" IS 'Numero de facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_br_lig_pxach"."no_int_lig_fact" IS 'Numero de ligne de facture';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_cde" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_reg" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_ext_cde_fo" char(25) NULL,
	"nat_cde_fo" char(2) NULL,
	"typ_cde" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_cde_edi" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_recep_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_mod_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"tx_mon_cde_fo" "t_tx" NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_cde_fo_imp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp_cde_fo" "t_pt_o" NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"mnt_acpt" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_acpt" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"pt_acpt_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"typ_cad" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"no_int_cont" integer NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_cde" IS 'Cde four';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_inc" IS 'Code de l''incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_reg" IS 'Code règlement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_ext_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."nat_cde_fo" IS 'Nature de la commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."typ_cde" IS 'Type de commande fournisseur (achat, sous traitance)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."pt_cde_edi" IS 'Commande d''origine EDI (oui, non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."dte_cde_fo" IS 'Date de la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."dte_recep_cde_fo" IS 'Date de réception de la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."dte_mod_cde_fo" IS 'Date d''avenant de la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."tx_mon_cde_fo" IS 'Taux de la devise de la commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."pt_cde_fo_imp" IS 'Commande imprimée (Oui/Non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."pt_imp_cde_fo" IS 'Imprimer la commande (O/N)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."mnt_acpt" IS 'Montant de l''acompte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."com_acpt" IS 'Commentaire de l''acompte commandé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire d''entête de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire de pied de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."pt_acpt_fact" IS 'Pointeur acompte déduit sur facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."typ_cad" IS 'Type de cadence (mono ou multi cadencement)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."no_int_cont" IS 'No contact';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde"."cd_imput_anal" IS 'Code imputation analytique';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_cde_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_af" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_rei" numeric(3,0) NULL,
	"cd_nat_tran" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"no_fo_adr_recep" integer NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_unit_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_fo_recep" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_ass_ql" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cl_recep" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_recep" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_adrste_recep" smallint NULL,
	"no_ext_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_aff_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"typ_art_cde_fo" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'F',
	"cd_art" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"qte_lig_cde_fo" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"pt_grat_lig_cde_fo" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_px_prov_lig_cde_fo" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_sld_lig_cde_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"nom_pr_art" char(9) NULL,
	"mnt_mon_fo" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_mon_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_art_fo_cde_fo" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'F',
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"nrm_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"nrm_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"com_art" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_recep" "t_com" NULL,
	"nb_pie_col" "t_nb_pie_col" NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"pt_txe" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_lig_cde_fo_sto" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_anal" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_calc" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_calc" "datetime" NULL,
	"mnt_plus_valu_stat" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_force_sld" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_brut_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_recep" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'S',
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"des_cl_adr" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"deno" "t_deno_ste" NULL,
	"adr_lig_a" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"adr_lig_b" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"vil" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"nic" char(5) NULL,
	"typ_cde" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_px_forc" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_dem_ach" integer NULL,
	"cd_ext_lig_cde_fo" char(25) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dest" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_cde_maj" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_deb_marc" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin_marc" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_deb_cumul" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_rest_recep_avt_intg" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_rest_recep_apr_intg" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pou_vari" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_kanban" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_txe" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_fo", "no_int_lig_cde_fo" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."des_cl_adr" IS 'Désignation adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."deno" IS 'Dénomination d''une société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."adr_lig_a" IS '1ère ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."adr_lig_b" IS '2ième ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."cd_post" IS 'Code postal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."vil" IS 'Ville';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."nic" IS 'NIC (complément du numéro de Siren pour construire le numéro de Siret)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."pt_px_forc" IS 'Pointeur prix forcé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."coef_sto" IS 'coefficient unité cde / unité stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."no_dem_ach" IS 'N de demande d achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."cd_ext_lig_cde_fo" IS 'n° externe de ligne de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."typ_kanban" IS 'type kanban';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'N° ligne commande client associe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."cd_imput_anal" IS 'Code imputation analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig"."cd_txe" IS 'Code taxe';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_cde_cad_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_cde_cad_fo" integer NULL,
	"qte_cde_cad_fo" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_deb_recep_dem_cde_cad_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin_recep_dem_cde_cad_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_recep_conf_cde_cad_fo" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_prev_cde_cad_fo" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_tol_inf_cde_cad_fo" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_tol_sup_cde_cad_fo" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_recep_cde_cad_fo" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_cde_cad_fo_sto" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_recep_tot" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_sld_cad" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_prec" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pou_vari_cad" integer NULL,
	"pt_recep_cad_fo" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_fo", "no_int_lig_cde_fo", "no_int_cde_cad_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad" IS 'Cadences de ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."no_int_cde_cad_fo" IS 'No interne de cadence de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."no_aff_cde_cad_fo" IS 'No d''affichage de la cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."no_ext_cde_cad_fo" IS 'No de cadence fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."qte_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Quantité cadencée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."dte_deb_recep_dem_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Date début réception demandée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."dte_fin_recep_dem_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Date fin réception demandée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."dte_recep_conf_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Date réception confirmée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."pt_prev_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Cadence prévisionnelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."qte_tol_inf_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Quantité inférieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."qte_tol_sup_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Quantité supérieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."qte_recep_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Quantité réceptionnée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."qte_cde_cad_fo_sto" IS 'Quantité cadencée en unité de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."qte_recep_tot" IS 'Quantité réceptionnée totale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_cad"."pt_recep_cad_fo" IS 'pointeur prevision conf.';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_fo_cde_lig_pxach" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_px_ach" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_tf" integer NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"mnt_forf" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_aff_cde_lig_pxach" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"px_unia_net" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"tx_rem" "t_tx" NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"coef_unit_qte" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"fmt_px" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"px_brut" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"typ_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tf" char(3) NULL,
	"coef_unit_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_forf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_frs" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_frs_prefact" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_frs_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_fact_tiers" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cpt_cde_fo", "no_int_lig_cde_fo", "no_int_fo_cde_lig_pxach" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach" IS 'Prix ligne cde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_int_fo_cde_lig_pxach" IS 'No interne de ligne de prix de vente de la ligne de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_int_px_ach" IS 'no_int_px_ach';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_int_art_fo" IS 'no_int_art_fo';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."dte_deb_valid_tf" IS 'Date de début de validité du tarif client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_int_tf_dte_lig" IS 'Numéro de la fourchette de quantité pour le prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."mnt_forf" IS 'Montant forfaitaire dans la monnaie du pays utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."no_aff_cde_lig_pxach" IS 'Numero de frais supplémentaire commande client (affichage)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."px_unia_net" IS 'Prix unitaire net dans la monnaie du pays utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."tx_rem" IS 'Taux de remise pour les références clients (hors pièce de négoce)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."typ_px" IS 'Type de prix (constant ou proportionnel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."typ_sais_tf" IS 'Lieu de saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."coef_unit_qte" IS 'Coefficient de conversion pour l''unité de quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."pt_modif" IS 'Pointeur modification possible';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."fmt_px" IS 'Format de présentation des prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."px_brut" IS 'Prix brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."typ_tf" IS 'Type de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation de la ligne de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."cd_unit_tf" IS 'Code unité quantité du tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."coef_unit_tf" IS 'Coefficient unité de commande et unité de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."pt_forf" IS 'Frais pas proportionnel a la quantite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."qte_frs" IS 'Nombre de frais';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."pt_frs_prefact" IS 'frais préfacturé (oui /non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."pt_frs_fact" IS 'frais facturé (oui /non)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_cde_lig_pxach"."pt_fact_tiers" IS 'Ligne de prix facturée par un autre fournisseur';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_certif" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "cd_certif", "dte_deb_valid" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."cd_certif" IS 'Code certification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."dte_deb_valid" IS 'Date debut validite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."dte_fin_valid" IS 'Date fin validite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_certif"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"del_liv" integer NULL,

	"px_vte_lot_tf_mini" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"des" char(255) NULL,

	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."fo_dboper"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."fo_dboper"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

	"cd_reg" char(7) NULL,

CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_dero" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"des" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "no_dero" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_dero_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_dero" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_dero" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_dero" "datetime" NULL,
	"des" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"mnt_max_dero" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_fact" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_pre_fact" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "no_dero", "dte_deb_dero" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."no_dero" IS 'Code dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."dte_deb_dero" IS 'Date début dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."dte_fin_dero" IS 'Date fin dérogation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."des" IS 'N° de douane';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."mnt_max_dero" IS 'Montant autorisé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."mnt_fact" IS 'Montant facturé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."mnt_pre_fact" IS 'Montant pré-facturé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_dero_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_etat" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"nb_ex" integer NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_fo", "cd_typ_etat" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_etat"."cd_fo" IS 'code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_etat"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Type etat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_etat"."cd_etat" IS 'Code etat par defaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_etat"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Code adresse par défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_etat"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d exemplaire par defaut';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_fact" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_fact_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_reg" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_vti_arron" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_txe_base1" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_base2" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_base3" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_base4" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_txe_base5" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_vti_parf_base1" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti_parf_base2" char(3) NULL,
	"dte_hre_fact" "datetime" NULL,
	"mnt_acpt" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_net" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_arron" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_mon_fo" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_mon_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_rem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_base1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_base2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_base3" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_base4" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_base5" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf_base1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf_base1_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf_base2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe_parf_base2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe_parf_base1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tx_txe_parf_base2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_bloq" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_fact" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"typ_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"no_fact_four" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_fact_four" "datetime" NULL,
	"mnt_esc" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_hre_cptl" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_intcom_real" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_eche_fact" "datetime" NULL,
	"cpt_fact_fo" integer NULL,
	"mnt_txe1_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe2_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe3_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe4_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_txe5_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_esc_ste" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_vti_esc" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_subro" char(10) NULL,
	"typ_tva" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fact_fo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_fact" IS 'Entête de facture fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact"."no_int_fact_fo" IS 'Numéro interne de facture fournisseur';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_cpte_cptl" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_fact_fo" integer NOT NULL,
	"mnt_mon_fo" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_mon_ste" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_debcre" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,

	"cd_cptl_fo" char(10) NULL,
	"no_int_fact_cptl" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_fact_fo", "no_int_fact_cptl" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact_cptl"."mnt_mon_ste" IS 'Montant de la ligne de commande dans la monnaie société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact_cptl"."cd_debcre" IS 'Code sens';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact_cptl"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact_cptl"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact_cptl"."no_int_fact_cptl" IS 'NÝ interne repartition comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_fact_cptl"."cd_vti" IS 'Code Ventilation comptable';

	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,

CREATE TABLE "obi"."fo_pxach" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_px_ach" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_tf" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_unit_qte" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"des_tf" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_forf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_frs" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_fact_tiers" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_px_ach" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."fo_pxach" IS 'prix d''achat fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."no_int_px_ach" IS 'No interne de ligne de prix d''achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."no_int_art_fo" IS 'no_int_art_fo';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."coef_unit_qte" IS 'Coefficient de conversion pour l''unité de quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."typ_sais_tf" IS 'Lieu de saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation de la ligne de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."pt_forf" IS 'Frais pas proportionnel a la quantite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."qte_frs" IS 'Nombre de frais';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."fo_pxach"."pt_fact_tiers" IS 'Ligne de prix facturée par un autre fournisseur';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."fo_raz"."cd_fo" IS 'Code Fournisseur … Supprimer';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."h_art" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_art_stat" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_art_stat_ql" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_sto" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_util" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_base_n_ql" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_ident" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cat_art" char(2) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,

	"num_idente" numeric(19,6) NULL,

	"dur_vie" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NULL,

	"coef_depr_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"cd_typ_etat_ci" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_ci" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
