	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."h_art_mvtreel" (
	"no_ste_gen" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mvt_reel_h" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"typ_mvt" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_mvt" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_mvt" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des_mvt" varchar(50) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"typ_genr" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"typ_orig_mvt" char(3) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv_mvt" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bn_liv_mvt" integer NULL,
	"cd_cl_h" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_art" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"des_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"des_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"nrm_art_a" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"nrm_art_b" "t_des_art" NULL,
	"com_art" "t_com" NULL,
	"cd_art_stat_h" "t_cd" NULL,
	"des_art_stat" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_unit_ref" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_ref_ref" char(3) NULL,
	"coef_unit_ref" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."h_art_mvtreel" IS 'Historique des mouvements réels de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."no_ste_gen" IS 'Numéro de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."no_int_mvt_reel_h" IS 'Numéro interne de mouvement réel de stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."typ_mvt" IS 'Type du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."dte_hre_mvt" IS 'Date et heure de transaction du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."qte_mvt" IS 'Quantité du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."des_mvt" IS 'Libellé du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."typ_genr" IS 'Type de génération (automatique ou manuel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."typ_orig_mvt" IS 'Origine du mouvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cpt_bn_liv_mvt" IS 'Numéro de bon de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."no_int_lig_bn_liv_mvt" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de bon de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cd_cl_h" IS 'Code du client identifiant l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cd_art" IS 'Référence de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."des_art_a" IS '1ère ligne de la désignation de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."des_art_b" IS '2 ième ligne de la désignation de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."ind_pr_art" IS 'Indice produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cd_pl" IS 'Référence du plan';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."ind_pl" IS 'Indice plan article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."nrm_art_a" IS 'Norme 1';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."nrm_art_b" IS 'Norme 2';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."com_art" IS 'Commentaire de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cd_art_stat_h" IS 'Code statistique de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."des_art_stat" IS 'Désignation de la famille statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cd_unit_ref" IS 'Code de l''unité de référence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."cd_unit_ref_ref" IS 'Code de l''unité de référence pour l''unité de référence de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."h_art_mvtreel"."coef_unit_ref" IS 'Coefficient de conversion de l''unité de référence';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_tre" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mode_tro" numeric(2,0) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_trans" integer NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_bn_liv" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_bn_liv" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_eti_cnd" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_eti_cnd" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat_eti_manu" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat_eti_manu" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_rego_bn_liv" char(50) NULL,
	"dte_hre_imp" timestamp NULL,
	"lieu_trans" char(1) NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_ent" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"com_pied" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"pt_imp_bn_liv" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_valid" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_bn_liv_man" integer NULL,
	"pt_int_eti_imp_cnd" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_int_eti_imp_manu" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_hre_liv" timestamp NULL,
	"pt_fact" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_bn_liv" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_tre_trnst" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_vehi_motr" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_vehi_tract" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_arriv_prev" timestamp NULL,
	"nb_unit_manu" integer NULL,
	"cd_vti_port" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_vti_emb" char(3) NULL,
	"pt_edi" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_hre_enlev" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_hre_edi_exp" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_histo" timestamp NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_bn_liv" )
);

CREATE TABLE "obi"."h_cl_cde" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_rep" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_reg" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_stat_cde_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_ext_cde_cl" char(25) NULL,
	"nat_cde_cl" char(2) NULL,
	"typ_cad" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_cde_edi" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_cde_cl" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_recep_cde_cl" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_mod_cde_cl" timestamp NULL,
	"tx_mon_cde_cl" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_cde_cl_imp" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_imp_cde_cl" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"mnt_acpt" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_acpt" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"com_ent" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"com_pied" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"pt_acpt_fact" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_edi_liv" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_vend" char(1) NULL,
	"achet_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"exp_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"Vend_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_nom" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_a" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_b" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_c" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_adr_d" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"vend_no" char(35) NULL,
	"vend_contact" char(35) NULL,
	"dest_cd" char(35) NULL,
	"dest_lieu" char(17) NULL,
	"exp_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"vend_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"achet_iso_odt" char(2) NULL,
	"dte_histo" timestamp NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_cde_cl" )
);

);

);

);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."h_cr_fich_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_proc_gamope" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_phctrl" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NULL,
	"no_int_car" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_car" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"coeff_dmr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_def" char(7) NULL,
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NULL,
	"val_dmr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"val_caq" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"ppc_ncnf" numeric(19,6) NULL,

);

	"no_int_proc_gamope" integer NOT NULL,

	"typ_fam_moy" char(1) NULL,

	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" integer NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,

	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_histo" timestamp NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_proc", "no_int_proc_gamope", "no_ste", "no_int_car", "no_int_ress", "cd_car", "no_int_phctrl", "no_int_phctrl_car", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_art", "no_int_phctrl_carmo" )
);

);

CREATE TABLE "obi"."import_sfao" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_import" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"cd_operateur" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_machine" char(7) NULL,
	"type_evt" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin" "datetime" NULL,
	"duree" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_prod" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"motif" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_lig_trait" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"motif_rejet" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_emp" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(10) NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_lien_nomlien" "t_cpt" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_import" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."import_sfao"."motif_rejet" IS 'Erreur d''importation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."import_sfao"."cd_emp" IS 'Code emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."import_sfao"."cd_lot" IS 'Code lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."import_sfao"."no_lot" IS 'NÝ de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."import_sfao"."no_lien_nomlien" IS 'NÝ de composant';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."indperf" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_calc" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_ref" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_ress" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctchar" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_ctanal" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fam_moy" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_perso_resp" char(7) NULL,
	"tps_tt" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_to" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_tr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_tn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_tu" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tai" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tap" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tp" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tae" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_taf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tcf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tdc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tcop" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_trf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_arr_tef" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_tcr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"npr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"npb" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nptr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"trs" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tq" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tp" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"d_o" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"trg" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tre" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"ts" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tr" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"tps_mont" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"tps_demont" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "dte_hre_calc", "cd_ref", "typ_ress" )
);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

);

CREATE TABLE "admin"."inspec" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_inspec" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_inspect" char(50) NULL,

	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"cd_critc" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_sect_ql_imput" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_oper_imput" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_def" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_detection" char(7) NULL,
	"detection_quand" char(1) NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"ident_resp_suivi" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cout_ncnf" integer NULL,
	"specification_particuliere" char(255) NULL,
	"qte_incriminee" smallint NULL,
	"qte_n_cnf" integer NULL,
	"qte_accep" smallint NULL,
	"pt_refus" float NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_perso_redac" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_retour_demande_resol" "datetime" NULL,
	"analyse_cause" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"preventive" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"preventive_date" "datetime" NULL,
	"corrective" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"corrective_date" "datetime" NULL,
	"verification_efficacite" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"verif_date" "datetime" NULL,
	"sauvegarde_date" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_derog" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"cd_sect_ql" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_oper" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_util" char(7) NULL,
	"no_part_ord_fab" char(5) NULL,
	"cd_cl_group" char(7) NULL,
	"indice" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_titre_doc" char(200) NULL,
	"pt_qte_lot_pce" smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1',
	"cd_qte_lot_pce" integer NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_nc" smallint NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp" smallint NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_inspec" )
);
CREATE TABLE "admin"."inspec_agr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_inspec" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_inspec_agr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_agr" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_debut_agr" date NULL,
	"dte_fin_agr" date NULL,
	"dte_envoi" date NULL,
	"dte_retour" date NULL,
	"pt_interne" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_aff" integer NULL,
	"com" long varchar NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_inspec", "no_int_inspec_agr" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."inspec_agr"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de Site';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."inspec_agr"."cd_motif" IS 'Motif de l inspection';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."inspec_agr"."no_int_inspec" IS 'Numero d ordre de l inspection ( Automatique +1 par Motif)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."inspec_agr"."no_int_inspec_agr" IS 'Numero d Agreement detaille';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."inspec_agr"."cd_cl" IS 'Code Client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."inspec_agr"."cd_fo" IS 'Code Fournisseur';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."inspec_car" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_inspec" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_car" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typcontrol" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"qte_control " smallint NULL,
	"cd_unit " char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_control " char(3) NULL,
	"no_lot_trac" char(10) NULL,
	"consigne" char(40) NULL,
	"valeur_1" char(20) NULL,
	"valeur_2" char(20) NULL,
	"contre_expertise" char(20) NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"non_conforme" smallint NULL,
	"cd_moycontrol" char(7) NULL,
	"ref_tth_temp" smallint NULL,
	"ref_tth_hr" float NULL,
	"ref_val1" float NULL,
	"ref_val2" float NULL,
	"ecart_maxi" float NULL,
	"exige_stabil_therm" smallint NULL,
	"cd_formule" char(7) NULL,
	"cout_ncnf" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"no_aff" integer NULL,
	"no_obj" integer NULL,
	"no_oper" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_imp" smallint NULL,
	"pt_int" smallint NULL,
	"pt_cl" smallint NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_inspec", "cd_car", "cd_typcontrol" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."inventaire" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_invent" integer NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_invent" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"mod_invent" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_resp" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_prev" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_prev" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_fin_reel" timestamp NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"mode_calc" char(1) NULL,
	"para_prix" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_invent" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."no_ste" IS 'NÝ de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."no_int_invent" IS 'NÝ interne inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."des" IS 'Libellé inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."typ_invent" IS 'Type inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."mod_invent" IS 'Mode inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."cd_resp" IS 'Responsable inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."dte_deb_prev" IS 'Date de début inventaire prévue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."dte_fin_prev" IS 'Date de fin inventaire prévue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."dte_fin_reel" IS 'Date de fin inventaire réelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."pt_statut" IS 'Pointeur de statut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."mode_calc" IS 'Mode de calcul inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire"."para_prix" IS 'parametre prix de revient';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."inventaire_ligne" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_invent" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_invent_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_emp" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(35) NULL,
	"no_lot" char(35) NULL,
	"no_unit_manu" integer NULL,
	"no_unit_cond" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,
	"qte_ecart" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_sto_bis" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_ecart_bis" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_lieu" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'I',
	"com_ecart" char(2048) NULL,
	"cd_perso_ecart" char(7) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"px_unia" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_orig" timestamp NULL,
	"typ_gener" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'I',
	"dte_peremp" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_invent", "no_int_invent_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_ste" IS 'NÝ de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_int_invent" IS 'NÝ interne inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_int_invent_lig" IS 'NÝ interne ligne inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_int_art" IS 'NÝ interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."cd_emp" IS 'Code emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."cd_lot" IS 'Code tracabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_lot" IS 'NÝ de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_unit_manu" IS 'NÝ interne unité de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_unit_cond" IS 'NÝ interne unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'NÝ interne OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'NÝ interne opération OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."qte_sto" IS 'Quantité en stock avant début inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."qte_ecart" IS 'Quantité ecart inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."qte_sto_bis" IS 'Quantité secondaire en stock avant début inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."qte_ecart_bis" IS 'Quantité ecart secondaire inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."pt_statut" IS 'Statut de la ligne inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."pt_lieu" IS 'Lieu : I=interne, E=externe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."com_ecart" IS 'Commentaire de justification écart';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."cd_perso_ecart" IS 'Personne justifiant écart';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."px_unia" IS 'prix unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."dte_hre_orig" IS 'Date origine du lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."typ_gener" IS 'Type de generation de la ligne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ligne"."dte_peremp" IS 'date de peremption';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."inventaire_perso" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_invent" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_invent_perso" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_douchette" char(35) NULL,
	"cpt_deb" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_fin" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_der" integer NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_invent", "no_invent_perso" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."cd_douchette" IS 'Code de la douchette';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."cpt_deb" IS 'NÝ du premier ticket attribué à la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."cpt_fin" IS 'NÝ du dernier ticket attribué à la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."cpt_der" IS 'NÝ du dernier ticket saisi par la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_perso"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_invent" integer NOT NULL,

	"qte_invent_bis" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"cpt_ticket_rempl" integer NULL,
	"com_rempl" char(2048) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"no_int_invent_lig" integer NULL,

	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_invent", "cpt_ticket" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."qte_invent" IS 'Quantité inventaire saisi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."qte_invent_bis" IS 'Quantité secondaire inventaire saisi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."pt_statut" IS 'Statut du ticket';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."cpt_ticket_rempl" IS 'NÝ du ticket de remplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."com_rempl" IS 'Justification du remplacement du ticket';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."com" IS 'Commentaire general';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."no_int_invent_lig" IS 'NÝ interne ligne affectée au ticket';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."inventaire_ticket"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."lot" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_lot_trac" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"no_lot_trac_prec" char(10) NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_motif" "t_cd" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_coulee" char(10) NULL,
	"dim_1" float NULL,
	"dim_2" float NULL,
	"tth_temp" smallint NULL,
	"tth_hr" float NULL,
	"etat" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"pds_net" float NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"qte" float NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_ext_inspec_agrt" char(25) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_lot_trac" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "admin"."lot" IS 'Lot tracabilite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_lot_trac" IS 'Numero de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_lot_trac_prec" IS 'Numero de lot precedent';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."cd_motif" IS 'Code Motif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la derniere modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la creation de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."des" IS 'Designation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."cd_lot" IS 'Numero de tracabilite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_coulee" IS 'Num Coulee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."dim_1" IS 'Dimension Mini de la Section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."dim_2" IS 'Dimension Maxi de la Section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."tth_temp" IS 'Temperature du Traitement de Stabilisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."tth_hr" IS 'Duree du Traitement de Stabilisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."etat" IS 'Etat de la Matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."cd_fo" IS 'Code Fournisseur du Lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."pds_net" IS 'Poids Net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Unite de Poids';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."qte" IS 'Quantite du Lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."cd_unit" IS 'Unite de Quantite du Lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Num de Commande Achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Poste Commande Achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."lot"."no_int_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Cafence Commande Achat';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."lot" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_lot_trac" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_lot_trac_prec" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_motif" "t_cd" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_coulee" char(10) NULL,
	"dim_1" float NULL,
	"dim_2" float NULL,
	"tth_temp" smallint NULL,
	"tth_hr" float NULL,
	"etat" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"pds_net" float NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"qte" float NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_cde_cad_fo" integer NULL,
	"pt_clos" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_lot_trac", "no_int_art" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."lot" IS 'Lot traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_lot_trac" IS 'Numero de lot interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_lot_trac_prec" IS 'Numero de lot interne precedent';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."cd_motif" IS 'Code Motif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."des" IS 'Désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."cd_lot" IS 'Numéro de traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_coulee" IS 'Coul‚e';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."dim_1" IS 'Dimension Mini de la Section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."dim_2" IS 'Dimension Maxi de la Section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."tth_temp" IS 'Temp‚rature du Traitement de Stabilisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."tth_hr" IS 'Dur‚e du Traitement de Stabilisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."etat" IS 'Etat de la MatiŠre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."cd_fo" IS 'Code Fournisseur du Lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."pds_net" IS 'Poids Net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Unit‚ de Poids';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."qte" IS 'Quantit‚ du Lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."cd_unit" IS 'Unit‚ de Quantit‚ du Lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'Nø de Commande Achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'Poste Commande Achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."no_int_cde_cad_fo" IS 'Cafence Commande Achat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."pt_clos" IS 'Pointeur de cloture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lot"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."lotstat" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_lotstat" char(12) NOT NULL,
	"des_lotstat" char(35) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"flg_clos" char(1) NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"des_lot1" char(35) NULL,
	"des_lot2" char(35) NULL,
	"des_lot3" char(35) NULL,
	"des_lot4" char(35) NULL,
	"des_lot5" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_lotstat" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."no_int_lotstat" IS 'Numéro interne du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."cd_lotstat" IS 'Code du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."des_lotstat" IS 'Désignation du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."flg_clos" IS 'Flag de clôture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."indice" IS 'Indice du lot (en cas de reprise de prélèvements pour compléter un 	contrôle)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."des_lot1" IS 'Renseignement complémentaire pour caractériser le lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."des_lot2" IS 'Renseignement complémentaire pour caractériser le lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."des_lot3" IS 'Renseignement complémentaire pour caractériser le lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."des_lot4" IS 'Renseignement complémentaire pour caractériser le lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."lotstat"."des_lot5" IS 'Renseignement complémentaire pour caractériser le lot statistique';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."mat" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mat" integer NOT NULL,
	"des" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_car_sect" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_car_liv" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"com_recep" char(255) NULL,
	"com_cde" char(255) NULL,
	"cd_car_code" char(7) NULL,
	"libelle" char(255) NULL,
	"cd_car_E" integer NULL,
	"cd_car_G" integer NULL,
	"cd_car_mass_vol" float NULL,
	"magnetisme" char(50) NULL,
	"cd_car_magn" integer NULL,
	"cd_car_ro" integer NULL,
	"cd_car_coeff_dilat" integer NULL,
	"com_redac_cde" char(255) NULL,
	"com_redac_ctrl_recep" char(255) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_mat" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_motif" IS 'Motif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."no_int_mat" IS 'Numero interne matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."des" IS 'Designation de la matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_sect" IS 'section de la matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_liv" IS 'etat de livraison';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."com_recep" IS 'commentaire en reception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."com_cde" IS 'commentaire en commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_code" IS 'code de la matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."libelle" IS 'libelle du document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_E" IS 'module de Young (MPa)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_G" IS 'module de Coulomb (MPa)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_mass_vol" IS 'masse volumique (g/cm3)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."magnetisme" IS 'magnetisme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_magn" IS 'valeur du magnetisme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_ro" IS 'resistivite (micro-ohm.cm)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."cd_car_coeff_dilat" IS 'coefficient de dilatation (micro-ohm/øC)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."com_redac_cde" IS 'commentaire dans le libelle de la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."com_redac_ctrl_recep" IS 'commentaire dans le libelle du controle reception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."mat_doc" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mat" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_doc" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"cd_tth" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"des_doc" char(50) NULL,
	"ind_doc" char(5) NULL,
	"ref_tth_temp" integer NULL,
	"ref_tth_hr" float NULL,
	"pt_type_recep_mat" smallint NULL,
	"libelle" char(255) NULL,
	"com_recep" char(255) NULL,
	"com_cde" char(255) NULL,
	"pt_doc_chim" smallint NULL,
	"pt_doc_meca" smallint NULL,
	"pt_doc_dim" smallint NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_mat", "cd_doc", "cd_tth" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."cd_motif" IS 'Motif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."no_int_mat" IS 'Numero interne d inspection';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."cd_doc" IS 'Code du type de specification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."cd_tth" IS 'code du traitement thermique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."des_doc" IS 'reference de la specification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."ind_doc" IS 'indice de la reference';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."ref_tth_temp" IS 'temperature de consigne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."ref_tth_hr" IS 'duree du traitement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."pt_type_recep_mat" IS 'pointeur definissant le type de reception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."libelle" IS 'commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."com_recep" IS 'commentaire du document en controle reception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."com_cde" IS 'commentaire du document en commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."pt_doc_chim" IS 'pointeur pour specification composition chimique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."pt_doc_meca" IS 'pointeur pour specification proprietes mecaniques';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."pt_doc_dim" IS 'pointeur pour specification tolerances dimensionnelles';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."mat_doc_car" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mat" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_doc" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"cd_tth" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"cd_car" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"valeur_1" char(50) NULL,
	"valeur_2" char(50) NULL,
	"des" char(255) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_mat", "cd_doc", "cd_tth", "cd_car" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."cd_motif" IS 'Motif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."no_int_mat" IS 'Numero interne matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."cd_doc" IS 'Code du type de specification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."cd_tth" IS 'code du traitement thermique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."cd_car" IS 'caracteristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."valeur_1" IS 'Valeur mini de la caracteristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."valeur_2" IS 'Valeur maxi de la caracteristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."des" IS 'commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_doc_car"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."mat_indice" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_motif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mat" integer NOT NULL,
	"indice" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"motif_indice" char(255) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_motif", "no_int_mat", "indice" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."no_ste" IS 'Numero de la societe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."cd_motif" IS 'Motif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."no_int_mat" IS 'Numero interne matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."indice" IS 'Indice de la fiche matiere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."motif_indice" IS 'Motif de l evolution de l indice';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de creation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."mat_indice"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."mrp_art" (
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_appro" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"qte_sto" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_niv" smallint NULL,
	"cd_calc_appro" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_appro" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"del" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_fam_pdp" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_fam_pdp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_zferm" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_int_art", "no_ste" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art"."cd_fam_pdp" IS 'Famille PDP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art"."pt_fam_pdp" IS '1-Famille PDP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art"."dte_zferm" IS 'Limite de la zone ferme';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."mrp_art_prev" (
	"no_int_mrp_art_prev" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"typ_mvt_prev" char(3) NULL,
	"dte_hre_mvt_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin_mvt_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_mvt_prev" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des_mvt_prev" char(50) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"typ_prev" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"typ_orig_mvt" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_orig_ref_mvt" "t_typ_orig_ref" NULL,
	"no_doc_mvt" integer NULL,
	"no_lig_mvt" integer NULL,
	"no_cad_mvt" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_prev_cde" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_fam_pdp" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_asc" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_mrp_art_prev_orig" integer NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_int_mrp_art_prev", "no_ste" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art_prev"."cd_fam_pdp" IS 'Famille PDP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art_prev"."cd_cl" IS 'Client origine si unique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art_prev"."cd_fo" IS 'Fournisseur commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art_prev"."typ_asc" IS 'Type origine O-OF,L-Cadence à fabriquer,P-Cadence pas à fabriquer,D- indépendant PDP,S- indépendant stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art_prev"."no_int_mrp_art_prev_orig" IS 'Prévision MRP origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_art_prev"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."mrp_charg" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mrp_art_prev" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_charg" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctchar" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_oper" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb_reel" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin" "datetime" NULL,
	"dur_pass" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dur_rest" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"coef_dur_ope" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_oper" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_def" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_asc" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_crea" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"qte_brute" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_real" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art", "no_int_mrp_art_prev", "no_int_charg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."mrp_charg" IS 'Charge MRP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_ste" IS 'Société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_int_art" IS 'Lien MRP art, article ou famille PDP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_int_mrp_art_prev" IS 'Lien MRP prévision';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_int_charg" IS 'No creation charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."cd_ctchar" IS 'Centre de charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'No opération OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_int_of_ress" IS 'No ressource opération OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."cd_fo" IS 'Fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."cd_oper" IS 'Code opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."dte_hre_deb" IS 'Date début au plus tôt';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."dte_hre_deb_reel" IS 'Date début réelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."dte_hre_fin" IS 'Date fin au plus tôt';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."dur_pass" IS 'Durée passée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."dur_rest" IS 'Durée restante';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."coef_dur_ope" IS 'Coefficient durée pour opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."no_oper" IS 'No manuel opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."pt_def" IS '1 - Ressource par défaut opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."typ_asc" IS 'Type origine O-OF,L-Cadence à fabriquer,P-Cadence pas à fabriquer,D- indépendant PDP,S- indépendant stock';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."aut_crea" IS 'Auteur calcul MRP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date calcul MRP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."qte_brute" IS 'Quantite de lancement operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_charg"."qte_real" IS 'Quantite realisee operation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."mrp_msg" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_mrp_art_prev" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_msg" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"lib" char(150) NULL,
	"typ_msg" char(2) NULL,
	"pt_trait" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_appro" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_doc" integer NULL,
	"no_doc_lig" integer NULL,
	"no_doc_cad" integer NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"dte_hre_dispo" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin_calc" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art", "no_int_mrp_art_prev", "no_int_msg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."mrp_msg" IS 'Message MRP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_ste" IS 'Société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_int_art" IS 'Lien MRP art, article ou famille PDP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_int_mrp_art_prev" IS 'Lien MRP prévision';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_int_msg" IS 'No interne message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."dte_hre_deb" IS 'Date début OF ou cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."dte_hre_fin" IS 'Date fin OF ou cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."qte" IS 'Quantité OF ou cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."lib" IS 'Message en clair';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."typ_msg" IS 'Type message: 0-avancer cad client,1-Retarder cad client,2-Avancer cad four,3-Retarder cad four,4-Avancer OF,5-Retarder OF,6-Creer OF,7-Modifier qte OF,8-Mettre en fab OF,9-Supprimer OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."pt_trait" IS 'Message traiter';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."typ_appro" IS 'Type approvisionnement prevu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur calcul MRP ou auteur prise en compte message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date calcul MRP';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_doc" IS 'No document genere par la validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_doc_lig" IS 'No ligne de document genere par la validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."no_doc_cad" IS 'No cadence de ligne de document genere par la validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."com" IS 'Zone de commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."dte_hre_dispo" IS 'Date butoir de diponibilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."mrp_msg"."dte_fin_calc" IS 'Date fin calcul';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."msg" (
	"application" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"repertoire" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"emetteur" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"recepteur" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"recepteur_transco" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"msg" integer NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "application", "repertoire", "emetteur", "recepteur", "recepteur_transco", "msg" )
);
CREATE TABLE "admin"."msg_objet" (
	"application" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"repertoire" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"emetteur" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"recepteur" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"recepteur_transco" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"msg" integer NOT NULL,
	"objet" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"lignes" integer NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "application", "repertoire", "emetteur", "recepteur", "recepteur_transco", "msg", "objet" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_oper_dec" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"cd_sect_ql_dec" "t_cd" NULL,
	"typ_moy_dec" "t_typ_moy" NULL,
	"cd_moy_dec" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"typ_moy_imput" "t_typ_moy" NULL,
	"cd_moy_imput" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"cd_sect_ql_imput" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_oper_imput" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"cd_cl_dec" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_dec" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_fo_dec" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr_dec" integer NULL,
	"cd_critc" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_util_sld" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_typ_n_cnf" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso_dec" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_af" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_perso_redac" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"ident_n_cnf" "t_com" NULL,
	"ident_redac" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"dte_redac" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_lot" char(15) NULL,
	"no_fab" char(15) NULL,
	"no_cde_ach" char(15) NULL,
	"ident_acht" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"no_cde_vte" char(15) NULL,
	"dte_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"ident_resp_suivi" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_pl" "t_cd_art" NULL,
	"ind_pl" "t_ind" NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" "t_ind" NULL,
	"mnt_n_cnf" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_sld_n_cnf" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_n_cnf_man" char(15) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"pt_redac" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_resp_suivi" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dec" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imput" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_n_cnf" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte_n_cnf" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"cd_cl_imput" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo_imput" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_imput" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_suivi" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser_redac" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser_suivi" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_redac" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_suivi" "t_cd" NULL,
	"pt_refus" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cout_ncnf" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_cde_cad_cl" integer NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"typ_oper_dec" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_oper_imput" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"pt_typ" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_n_cnf" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf" IS 'Non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_oper_dec" IS 'Code de l''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_sect_ql_dec" IS 'Code de la section au sens qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."typ_moy_dec" IS 'Type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_moy_dec" IS 'Code du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."typ_moy_imput" IS 'Type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_moy_imput" IS 'Code du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_sect_ql_imput" IS 'Code de la section au sens qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_oper_imput" IS 'Code de l''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_cl_dec" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_cl_adr_dec" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_fo_dec" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_fo_adr_dec" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_critc" IS 'Code criticité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_util_sld" IS 'Code de l''utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_typ_n_cnf" IS 'Code du type de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_perso_dec" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_af" IS 'Code de l''affaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_perso_redac" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."ident_n_cnf" IS 'Identification de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."ident_redac" IS 'Identification complémentaire du rédacteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."dte_redac" IS 'Date de rédaction de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_lot" IS 'Numéro de lot (non controlé)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_fab" IS 'Numéro de fabrication (non controlé)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_cde_ach" IS 'Numéro de commande d''achat (non controlé)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."ident_acht" IS 'Identification complémentaire de l''acheteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_cde_vte" IS 'Numéro de commande vente (non controlé)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."dte_valid" IS 'Date de validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."ident_resp_suivi" IS 'Identification complémentaire du responsable du suivi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_pl" IS 'Référence du plan';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."ind_pl" IS 'Indice plan article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."ind_pr_art" IS 'Indice produit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."mnt_n_cnf" IS 'Montant de la non qualité affectée à la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."dte_sld_n_cnf" IS 'Date du solde d''une non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."no_n_cnf_man" IS 'Numéro de non conformité manuel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."pt_redac" IS 'Type de rédacteur (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."pt_resp_suivi" IS 'Type de responsable de suivi (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."pt_dec" IS 'Type découverte en externe (client,fournisseur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."pt_imput" IS 'Type imputation en externe (client,fournisseur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."qte_n_cnf" IS 'Quantité défecteuse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."fmt_qte_n_cnf" IS 'Format de la quantité de défectueux';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_cl_imput" IS 'Code client imputation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_fo_imput" IS 'Code du fournisseur imputation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_perso_imput" IS 'Code de la personne d''imputation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_perso_suivi" IS 'Code de la personne du suivi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_ser_redac" IS 'Code du service de rédaction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_ser_suivi" IS 'Code du service du suivi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_fnct_redac" IS 'Code de la fonction de rédaction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_fnct_suivi" IS 'Code de la fonction du suivi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_proc" IS 'Code du processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."typ_moy" IS 'Type de moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf"."pt_typ" IS 'Type origine Article, Moyen, Processus';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_actn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn" integer NULL,
	"cd_actn" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_doc" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_decis" "t_cd" NULL,
	"typ_moy" "t_typ_moy" NULL DEFAULT 'C',
	"cd_moy" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tps" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_base" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_unia" char(3) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_n_cnf_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_doc_ref_actn" "t_doc" NULL,
	"ident_act" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_n_cnf_actn" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"qte_n_cnf_actn" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte_n_cnf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"tps_n_cnf_actn" "t_tps" NULL,
	"fmt_tps_n_cnf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"ident_result" "t_com" NULL,
	"base_calc_n_cnf_actn" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_base_calc_n_cnf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"px_unia_n_cnf_actn" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"fmt_px_unia_n_cnf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"forf_n_cnf_actn" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_forf_n_cnf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"mnt_n_cnf_actn" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_mnt_n_cnf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"dte_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"ident_valid" "t_com" NULL,
	"dte_imput_chif" "datetime" NULL,
	"tx_mon_actn" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"typ_actn" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"pt_act" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_act_int" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_act_ext" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_perso" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_mon_forf" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_mnt" char(3) NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NULL,
	"cd_cpte_evl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_n_cnf_actn" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf_actn" IS 'Action de suivi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."no_int_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création de la demande d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_actn" IS 'Code de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_typ_doc" IS 'Code du type de document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_decis" IS 'Code de la décision';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."typ_moy" IS 'Type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_unit_qte" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_unit_tps" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_unit_base" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_unit_px_unia" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."no_aff_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_doc_ref_actn" IS 'Document de référence lié à l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."ident_act" IS 'Identification complémentaire de l''acteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."dte_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Date de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."qte_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Quantité de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."fmt_qte_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."tps_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Temps de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."fmt_tps_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."ident_result" IS 'Identification du résultat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."base_calc_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Base de calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."fmt_base_calc_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."px_unia_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Prix unitaire de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."fmt_px_unia_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."forf_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Forfait de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."fmt_forf_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."mnt_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Montant global de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."fmt_mnt_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."dte_valid" IS 'Date de validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."ident_valid" IS 'Identification de la validation(mesure de l''efficacité)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."dte_imput_chif" IS 'Date d''évaluation (imputation du chiffrage)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."tx_mon_actn" IS 'Taux de la devise lors de la modification du montant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."typ_actn" IS 'Type de l''action (corrective, préventive ou les deux)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."pt_act" IS 'Type acteur (interne, externe)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."pt_act_int" IS 'Type acteur interne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."pt_act_ext" IS 'Type acteur (client, fournisseur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_perso" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_ser" IS 'Code du service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_fnct" IS 'Code de la fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_mon_forf" IS 'Code monnaie du forfait';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_mon_mnt" IS 'Code monnaie du montant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_cpte_evl" IS 'Compte evaluation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_sect" IS 'Section analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn"."cd_anal" IS 'Sous-Section analytique';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"qte_ncnf_actn_ncnf_def" "t_qte" NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte" "t_fmt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_n_cnf_def", "no_int_n_cnf_actn" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def" IS 'Quantité par défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."no_int_n_cnf_def" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."no_int_n_cnf_actn" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."qte_ncnf_actn_ncnf_def" IS 'Quantité par défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."fmt_qte" IS 'Format de présentation de la quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_actn_ncnf_def"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_def" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_def" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_car" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_n_cnf_def" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"ident_n_cnf_def" "t_com" NULL,
	"sol_n_cnf_def" "t_com" NULL,
	"des_car" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"tx_imput" "t_tx" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_def" "t_fmt" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_n_cnf", "no_int_n_cnf_def" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf_def" IS 'Défaut de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."no_int_n_cnf_def" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."cd_def" IS 'Code du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."cd_car" IS 'Code de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."no_aff_n_cnf_def" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."ident_n_cnf_def" IS 'Identification du défaut de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."sol_n_cnf_def" IS 'Solution préconisée pour le traitement du défaut de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."des_car" IS 'Désignation de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."tx_imput" IS 'Taux d''imputation du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def"."fmt_def" IS 'Format';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_def_cau" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def_cau" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_cau" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_n_cnf_def_cau" integer NULL,
	"ident_n_cnf_def_cau" varchar(2048) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_n_cnf", "no_int_n_cnf_def", "no_int_n_cnf_def_cau" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf_def_cau" IS 'Cause d''un défaut d''une non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."no_int_n_cnf_def" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."no_int_n_cnf_def_cau" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création de la cause';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."cd_cau" IS 'Code de la cause';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."no_aff_n_cnf_def_cau" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage de la cause';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_def_cau"."ident_n_cnf_def_cau" IS 'Identification de la cause pour un défaut d''une non conformité';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_demactn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_actn" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_typ_doc" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_fnct" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_n_cnf_dem_actn" integer NOT NULL,
	"ident_emet" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"dte_dem_actn" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"ident_dem_actn" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"qte_dem_actn" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte_dem_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"dte_repo_sh" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_doc_ref_dem_actn" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_ex_dem_actn" smallint NULL,
	"com_ent_dem_actn" "t_com" NULL,
	"com_pied_dem_actn" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"ident_dest" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"pt_imp_real" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp" "t_pt_o" NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	"pt_emet" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dest" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dest_int" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dest_ext" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_valid" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_perso_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"nb_actn" integer NULL,
	"nb_actn_valid" integer NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NULL,
	"cd_orig" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_sld_dem" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_int_pl_actn" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf_demactn" IS 'Demande d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création de la demande d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_actn" IS 'Code de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_typ_doc" IS 'Code du type de document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_fnct" IS 'Code de la fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_perso" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_aff_n_cnf_dem_actn" IS 'Numéro d''ordre d''affichage de la demande d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."ident_emet" IS 'Identification complémentaire de l''émetteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."dte_dem_actn" IS 'Date de la demande d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."ident_dem_actn" IS 'Identification de la demande (objet)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."qte_dem_actn" IS 'Quantité à traiter pour la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."fmt_qte_dem_actn" IS 'Format de présentation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."dte_repo_sh" IS 'Date d''engagement de la réponse à la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_doc_ref_dem_actn" IS 'Code du document référence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."nb_ex_dem_actn" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."com_ent_dem_actn" IS 'Commentaire d''entête pour l''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."com_pied_dem_actn" IS 'Commentaire de pied pour l''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."ident_dest" IS 'Identification complémentaire du destinataire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_imp_real" IS 'Pointeur impression de la demande déjà réalisée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_imp" IS 'Pointeur impression  à réaliser';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_emet" IS 'Type émetteur (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_dest" IS 'Type de destinataire (interne, externe)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_dest_int" IS 'Type destinataire interne (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_dest_ext" IS 'Type destinataire (client, fournisseur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."pt_valid" IS 'Type destinataire (client, fournisseur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_perso_dest" IS 'Code de la personne destinataire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_perso_valid" IS 'Code de la personne de validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_ser" IS 'Code du service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_ser_dest" IS 'Code du service destinataire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_fnct_dest" IS 'Code de la fonction destinataire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_fnct_valid" IS 'Code de la fonction de validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."nb_actn" IS 'Nombre de résultats';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."nb_actn_valid" IS 'Nombre de résultats validés';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_int_amdec" IS 'Numéro interne AMDEC';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."cd_orig" IS 'Origine de la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn"."no_int_pl_actn" IS 'Notre reference';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn_dest" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_aff_n_cnf_dem_actn_dest" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"ident_dest" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_perso" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct" "t_cd" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn", "no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn_dest" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest" IS 'Destinataire demande d''action';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest"."no_int_n_cnf_dem_actn_dest" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du destinataire de la demande d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ncnf_demactn_dest"."cd_fnct" IS 'Code de la fonction';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ncnf_ident_lot" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ncnf_orig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_lot" char(15) NULL,
	"no_cde_ach" char(15) NULL,
	"no_cde_vte" char(15) NULL,
	"cd_af" char(7) NULL,
	"no_fab" char(15) NULL,
	"ident_acht" char(35) NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(7) NULL,
	"fmt_qte" char(20) NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_recept" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecept" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ncnf_orig", "no_n_cnf" )
);

);

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_obj" integer NOT NULL,

	"des_obj" char(255) NULL,
	"cd_typ_obj" integer NULL,
	"obj" long binary NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"cd_ident_ident" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_obj", "no_obj" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."objet"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "admin"."objet"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la modification';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."ect_dur_fab_f" IS 'Ecart temps fabrication atelier / fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."ect_dur_cst_t" IS 'Ecart temps constant atelier / theorique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."ect_dur_cst_f" IS 'Ecart temps constant atelier / fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."ect_dur_att_t" IS 'Ecart temps attente atelier / theorique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."pt_ect_t" IS 'Un ecart theorique en montant ou temps en dehors seuil société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."pt_ect_f" IS 'Un ecart fabrication en montant ou temps en dehors seuil société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."dur_tot_a" IS 'Duree totale OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."pds_brut" IS 'Poids brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Unité de poids';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."pou_avan" IS 'Pourcentage avancement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."typ_us" IS 'Type US associe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."nat_of" IS 'Type OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."no_lot_int" IS 'NÝ interne de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."dte_hre_invent" IS 'Date et heure du dernier inventaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."no_der_etiq" IS 'n° dernière étiquette';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab"."no_lot_art" IS 'No lot article';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_charg" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb_reel" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_ctchar_plan" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ress_plan" "t_cd" NULL,
	"typ_ress_plan" char(1) NULL,
	"dur_pass" "t_tps" NULL,
	"dur_rest" "t_tps" NULL,
	"coef_dur_ope" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"dte_hre_deb_sem" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin_sem" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_sem" "t_cpt" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "aut_modif", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_of_ress", "no_int_opegam_of" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_enc" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dt_calc" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"typ_oper" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_term" "t_tx" NULL,
	"pou_avanc_of" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_ope" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_enc" "t_tx" NULL,
	"pou_avanc" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_th_ope" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_enc_ope" "t_tx" NULL,
	"ecart_ope" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_bes_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_term_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_enc_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_th_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_enc_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_ecart_nom" "t_tx" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "dt_calc", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_int" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."dt_calc" IS 'Date du calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'No operation OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."no_int" IS 'No affichage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'No composant OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."cd_mon" IS 'Monnaie societe lors du calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."typ_oper" IS 'Type operation lors du calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_term" IS 'Quantite entree en stock sur OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."pou_avanc_of" IS 'Pourcentage avancement OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_ope" IS 'Quantite bonne pour l operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_enc" IS 'quantite encours operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."pou_avanc" IS 'Pourcentage avancement operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."mnt_th_ope" IS 'Montant theorique encours operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."mnt_enc_ope" IS 'Montant reel encours operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."ecart_ope" IS 'Ecart montant operation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_bes_nom" IS 'Besoin therorique pour le composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_term_nom" IS 'Besoin pour la quantite terminee';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_nom" IS 'Sortie reelle composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."qte_enc_nom" IS 'Quantite reelle encours composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."mnt_th_nom" IS 'Montant theorique encours composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."mnt_enc_nom" IS 'Montant reel encours composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_enc"."mnt_ecart_nom" IS 'Ecart montant composant';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."pou_effi_f" IS '% d efficacité fabrication';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."dte_hre_scind" IS 'Date de scindage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."dte_ref_scind" IS 'Date de début ou de fin suivant pt_scind';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."no_scind" IS 'No de scindage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."no_scind_pere" IS 'No de scindage pere';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."no_scind_noeud" IS 'No de noeud pour calcul encours';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope"."dte_prev_inter_ope" IS 'Date de fin au plus incluant la durée inter-opération';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_affut" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_affut" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(7) NULL,
	"no_nom" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_actn" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cau" char(7) NULL,
	"compteur" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_affut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_theo" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_affut" "datetime" NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"des_art_a" char(35) NULL,
	"jauge_1" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"carac_jauge_1" char(35) NULL,
	"jauge_2" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"carac_jauge_2" char(35) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_affut" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_car" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_car_oppf" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_int_car_oppf" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_feuil" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_repert_obj" char(100) NULL,
	"no_int_obj" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_feuil"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur de stockage  (système ou utilisateur)';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
