	"qte_brute" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_t" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_f" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_emp" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_sld" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_affut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_theo" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"jauge_1" char(35) NULL,
	"carac_jauge_1" char(35) NULL,
	"jauge_2" char(35) NULL,
	"carac_jauge_2" char(35) NULL,

);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'Numéro de lien';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'Numéro interne d''opération de l''OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."qte" IS 'Numéro interne d''opération de l''OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."qte_brute" IS 'Quantité brute';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."pt_modif" IS 'Pointeur modification possible';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."qte_t" IS 'quantite theorique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."qte_f" IS 'quantite fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."cd_emp" IS 'Emplacement de consomation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_nomlien"."pt_sld" IS 'Solde réservation opération nomenclature';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ordfab" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opgam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctchar" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_compt" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_plan" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_dur_ope" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_px_revie" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_suivi_cout" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_man_auto" char(1) NULL,
	"cout_dir" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"coeff_dur_ope" float NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_of_ress", "no_int_opgam_of" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_para" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_of_opegam_para" integer NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_repert_obj" char(100) NULL,
	"typ_sto_obj" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_obj" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_typ_para" char(1) NULL,
	"val_alpha" char(50) NULL,
	"val_num" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_obj" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_ordfab_ope" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_lien_feuil" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_col" integer NULL,
	"no_lig" integer NULL,
	"no_page" integer NULL,
	"typ_ent_res" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'E',
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_of_opegam_para" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_para"."no_page" IS 'numéro page';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_para"."pt_modif" IS 'Pointeur modification possible';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctchar" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_moy" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"typ_moy" "t_typ_moy" NULL DEFAULT 'C',
	"cd_perso" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_compt" "t_cd" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"pt_plan" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"coef_dur_ope" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_px_revie" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_suivi_cout" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_man_auto" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"cout_dir" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_ress" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_def" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ctchar_plan" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ress_plan" char(8) NULL,
	"typ_ress_plan" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"coef_px" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pla" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_suivi_tps" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dur_pass" "t_tps" NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo_art" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo_art_t" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo_t" integer NULL,
	"cd_fo_art_f" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo_f" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_px" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_t" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_f" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cde" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cde_t" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cde_f" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_fo_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_perso_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_perso_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_ctchar_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_ctchar_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_compt_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_compt_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_moy_f" char(8) NULL,
	"cd_moy_t" char(8) NULL,
	"typ_moy_f" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_moy_t" char(1) NULL,
	"px" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_unit_px" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_unit_px_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_unit_px_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"cout_sect_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"cout_sect_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_dur_ope_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_dur_ope_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_px_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_px_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"pt_orig" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'P',
	"pt_suppr" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"mnt_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_a" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coeff_unit_cde" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_px_t" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_px_f" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_def_t" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_def_f" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_px_spe" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_princ" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_equip" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com" char(2032) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_int_of_ress" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress" IS 'Ressource OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'Numéro interne d''opération de l''OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."no_int_of_ress" IS 'Numéro interne de la ressource pour l''OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."cd_ctchar" IS 'Code du centre de charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."typ_moy" IS 'Type';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."cd_perso" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."cd_fo" IS 'Code du fournisseur';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."cd_fo_art" IS 'Fournisseur article fournisseur';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."coef_dur_ope_f" IS 'Coefficient de prix fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."pt_orig" IS 'Origine ressource: P-Processus,F-Fabrication,A-Atelier';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."pt_def_f" IS 'ressource par defaut fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."typ_px_spe" IS 'Prix specifique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."pt_princ" IS 'Pointeur ressource principale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."pt_equip" IS 'Personnel - Travail en équipe ou nominatif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_empreinte" integer NOT NULL,
	"pt_actif" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_int_of_ress", "typ_moy", "cd_moy", "no_int_empreinte" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte" IS 'Disponibilité des empreintes pour une opération de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."no_ste" IS 'Code de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'Numéro de l''opération de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."no_int_of_ress" IS 'Numéro de la ressource de l''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."typ_moy" IS 'Type du moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."no_int_empreinte" IS 'Numéro interne de l''empreinte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_gamope_ress_empreinte"."pt_actif" IS 'Indicateur de disponibilité de l''empreinte';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_listserv" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_liste" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_liste" char(25) NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_liste" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."no_ste" IS 'NÝ de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."no_int_liste" IS 'NÝ interne liste';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."no_ext_liste" IS 'NÝ externe liste';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."des" IS 'Désignation de la liste';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."pt_statut" IS 'Pointeur de statut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_liste" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"qte_calc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_liste", "no_int_art", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."no_ste" IS 'NÝ de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."no_int_art" IS 'NÝ interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'NÝ interne OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'NÝ interne opération de sortie du composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."qte_calc" IS 'Quantité de besoin calculée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_comp"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_emp" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_liste" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lot_emp" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_orig" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_lot" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_emp_orig" char(7) NULL,
	"qte_calc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_rest" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_statut" char(1) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_peremp" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_emp", "no_int_liste", "no_int_art", "no_int_lot_emp" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."no_ste" IS 'NÝ de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."cd_emp" IS 'Code emplacement';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."no_int_lot_emp" IS 'NÝ interne lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."cd_lot" IS 'NÝ de lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."dte_hre_orig" IS 'date/heure tracabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."pt_lot" IS 'Pointeur de gestion des lots';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."cd_emp_orig" IS 'Emplacement origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."qte_calc" IS 'Quantité à servir calculée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."qte_rest" IS 'Quantité restant à valider';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."qte" IS 'Quantité à servir';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."pt_statut" IS 'Pointeur de statut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."com" IS 'commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_listserv_emp"."dte_peremp" IS 'date de peremption';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_nomlien" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"typ_sais" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"cd_form" char(25) NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_rebut" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"no_affic" integer NULL,
	"typ_sto_sor" char(1) NULL,
	"pds_net" "t_pds" NULL,
	"px_stand" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_art" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_brute" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_modif_lien" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"qte_conv" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_unit_px" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_t" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_f" char(3) NULL,
	"px_stand_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_stand_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"qte_t" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_f" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_conv_t" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_conv_f" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_rebut_t" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_rebut_f" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_unit_px" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_unit_px_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"coef_unit_px_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"pt_orig" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'P',
	"pt_suppr" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"mnt_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"mnt_a" "t_tx" NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_unit_util" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect_t" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect_f" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_anal_a" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_sect_a" char(7) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"qte_besoin_t" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_besoin_f" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_besoin_a" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_px_spe" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_px_a" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"pt_sld" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_nom" char(7) NULL,
	"typ_sto_resrv" char(1) NULL,
	"typ_qte_resrv" char(1) NULL,
	"px_revie_unit" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_rebut" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_rebut_t" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_rebut_f" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_rebut_a" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_art_h" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordfab_nomlien" IS 'lien nomenclature OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'Numéro de lien';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."typ_sais" IS 'Type de saisie quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."cd_form" IS 'Code de la formule';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."qte" IS 'Quantité';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien"."typ_sto_sor" IS 'E-Entrée en Fin, D-sortie Début, F-sortie Fin, O-sortie Opération, P-entrée oPération, M-sortie Manuelle, N-entrée maNuelle,S-sortie sans saisie,T-entrée sans saisie';

CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_repert_obj" char(100) NULL,
	"no_int_obj" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil" IS 'ordfab_nomlien_feuil';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil"."no_lien_ordfab_nomlien" IS 'Numéro de lien';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil"."cd_repert_obj" IS 'Répertoire de l''objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil"."no_int_obj" IS 'no objet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_nomlien_feuil"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur de stockage  (système ou utilisateur)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_para" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"no_int_ordfab_para" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_para" char(1) NULL,
	"val_alpha" char(50) NULL,
	"val_num" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"typ_obj" char(35) NULL,
	"typ_sto_obj" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_repert_obj" char(100) NULL,
	"no_int_obj" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_proc_ope" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_lien_feuil" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_col" integer NULL,
	"no_lig" integer NULL,
	"no_page" integer NULL,
	"typ_ent_res" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'E',
	"pt_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_ord_imp" integer NULL,
	"fmt_para" char(20) NULL,
	"val_num_saisie" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"val_alpha_saisie" char(50) NULL,
	"no_int_" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ordfab_para", "no_int_ord_fab" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ord_fab" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_of_pxrevie" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_anal" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_sect" "t_cd" NULL,
	"px_revie" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"px_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_a" "t_tx" NULL,
	"ect_px_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"ect_px_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tps_cst_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tps_cst_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tps_cst_a" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tps_prod_t" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tps_prod_f" "t_tx" NULL,
	"tps_prod_a" "t_tx" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_of_pxrevie" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie" IS 'Prix de revient OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."no_int_of_pxrevie" IS 'no interne ligne prix revient';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."cd_anal" IS 'Code analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."cd_sect" IS 'Code section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."px_revie" IS 'Prix de revient';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."px_t" IS 'Prix theorique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."px_f" IS 'Prix fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."px_a" IS 'Prix atelier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."ect_px_t" IS 'Ecart prix atelier / theorique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."ect_px_f" IS 'Ecart prix atelier / fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."tps_cst_t" IS 'Temps des opérations en temps constant theorique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."tps_cst_f" IS 'Temps des opérations en temps constant fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."tps_cst_a" IS 'Temps des opérations en temps constant atelier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."tps_prod_t" IS 'Temps des opérations production theorique';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordfab_pxrevie"."tps_prod_a" IS 'Temps des opérations production atelier';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordfab_reunion" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NULL,
	"ind_pr_art" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_af" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"nb_oper" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte" decimal(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_etat_ordfab" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of1" integer NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress1" integer NULL,
	"typ_ress1" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_ress1" char(16) NULL,

CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordo_capa" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"cd_ress" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"typ_ress" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctchar" char(7) NULL,
	"dte_ctchar_capa" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"val_capa" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"val_occup" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"val_dispo" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"val_occup_che" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"val_dispo_che" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"val_capa_j" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_ress", "typ_ress", "dte_ctchar_capa" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordo_capa" IS 'Capacité et occupation pour ordonnancement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."no_ste" IS 'Sociéte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."cd_ress" IS 'Ressource ou centre de charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."typ_ress" IS 'C-Centre de charge,P-Personne, M-Moyen,O-Outil, C-Contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."cd_ctchar" IS 'Code centre de charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."dte_ctchar_capa" IS 'Date de la capacité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."val_capa" IS 'Capacité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."val_occup" IS 'Occupé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."val_dispo" IS 'Libre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."val_occup_che" IS 'Occupé chevauchement jour suivant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."val_dispo_che" IS 'Libre chevauchement jour suivant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."val_capa_j" IS 'Disponible jour pour centre de charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_capa"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordo_gamope" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_occ" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dur" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dur_prem" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dur_dern" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_etat" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_lanc" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_prior" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb_prev_tot" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_deb_prev_tard" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin_prev_tot" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin_prev_tard" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_prev_inter_ope" "datetime" NULL,
	"coord_horiz" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"coord_larg" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_occ" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordo_gamope" IS 'Opération OF ordonnancement ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."no_ste" IS 'Sociéte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'No interne opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."no_occ" IS '0 pas haché, > 0 Ordre hachage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dur" IS 'Durée en heure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dur_prem" IS 'Durée imputable sur le premier jour';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dur_dern" IS 'Durée imputable sur le dernier jour';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_deb" IS 'Date de début suivant le calendrier de la ressource calendrier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_fin" IS 'Date de fin suivant le calendrier de la ressource calendrier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."pt_etat" IS '0-Nouveau, 1-Calculé, 2-Figé, 3-Démarré, 4-Soldé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."qte_lanc" IS 'Quantité lancement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."qte" IS 'Quantité attendue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_deb_prev_tot" IS 'Date de début au plus tot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_deb_prev_tard" IS 'Date de début au plus tard';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_fin_prev_tot" IS 'Date de fin au plus tot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_hre_fin_prev_tard" IS 'Date de fin au plus tard';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."dte_prev_inter_ope" IS 'Date de fin au plus incluant la durée inter-opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."coord_horiz" IS 'Coordonnée horizontale par rapport à la date de calcul';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope"."coord_larg" IS 'Largeur';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_occ" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_of_ress" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_ress" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_fo" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_compt" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_ctchar" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_def" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_princ" char(1) NULL,
	"pla" char(1) NULL,
	"coef_occup" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_opegam_of", "no_occ", "no_int_of_ress" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress" IS 'Ressource opération pour ordonnancement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."no_ste" IS 'Sociéte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'No interne opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."no_occ" IS '0 pas haché, > 0 Ordre hachage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."no_int_of_ress" IS 'No interne ressource opération OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."typ_ress" IS 'Type ressource';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."cd_perso" IS 'Code personnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."cd_moy" IS 'Code moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."typ_moy" IS 'Type moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."cd_compt" IS 'Code compétence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."cd_ctchar" IS 'Code centre de charge';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."pt_def" IS 'Ressource calendrier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."pt_princ" IS 'Ressource principale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."pla" IS 'Planification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_gamope_ress"."coef_occup" IS 'Coefficient occupation ressource disponible';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."ordo_msg" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_msg" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"no_occ" integer NULL,
	"no_int_of_ress" integer NULL,
	"cd_msg" char(7) NULL,
	"des_msg" char(150) NULL,
	"dte_hre_msg" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_trait" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_msg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."ordo_msg" IS 'Message ordonnancement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."no_ste" IS 'Sociéte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."no_int_msg" IS 'No interne message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."no_int_ord_fab" IS 'No ordre de fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."no_int_opegam_of" IS 'No interne opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."no_occ" IS '0 pas haché, > 0 Ordre hachage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."no_int_of_ress" IS 'No interne ressource opération OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."cd_msg" IS 'Code message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."des_msg" IS 'Désignation message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."dte_hre_msg" IS 'Jour du message';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."ordo_msg"."pt_trait" IS 'Message traité';
CREATE TABLE "admin"."pbcatcol" (
	"pbc_tnam" char(129) NOT NULL,
	"pbc_tid" integer NULL,
	"pbc_ownr" char(129) NOT NULL,
	"pbc_cnam" char(129) NOT NULL,
	"pbc_cid" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_labl" char(254) NULL,
	"pbc_lpos" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_hdr" char(254) NULL,
	"pbc_hpos" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_jtfy" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_mask" char(31) NULL,
	"pbc_case" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_hght" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_wdth" smallint NULL,
	"pbc_ptrn" char(31) NULL,
	"pbc_bmap" char(1) NULL,
	"pbc_init" char(254) NULL,

CREATE TABLE "obi"."plactn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_pl_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_ser_suivi" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_suivi" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_suivi" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_pl_actn_stat" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_orig_pl_actn" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_doc" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"ident_pl_actn" "t_com" NULL,
	"ident_resp_suivi" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"dte_crea_pl_actn" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_modif_pl_actn" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_orig_n_cnf" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"ident_orig_pl_actn" "t_com" NULL,
	"doc_ref_pl_actn" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_ser_redac" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_redac" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_orig" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_redac" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_util" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_critc" char(10) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"no_int_pl_actn_lie" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_typ_n_cnf" "t_cd" NULL,
	"dte_redac" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_sld_plactn" "datetime" NULL,
	"no_plactn_man" char(15) NULL,
	"ident_redac" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"pt_redac" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_resp_suivi" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"mnt_reel_plactn" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_est_plactn" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_doc_orig" "t_doc" NULL,
	"no_int_meth8d" integer NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NULL,
	"ident" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_pl_actn" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."plactn" IS 'Plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_int_pl_actn" IS 'Numéro du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_ser_suivi" IS 'Code du service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_perso_suivi" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_fnct_suivi" IS 'Code de la fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_pl_actn_stat" IS 'Code de la famille du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_orig_pl_actn" IS 'Code de l''origine d''un plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_typ_doc" IS 'Code du type de document';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."ident_pl_actn" IS 'Identification du plan d''action (objet)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."ident_resp_suivi" IS 'Identification complémentaire du responsable du suivi';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_crea_pl_actn" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_modif_pl_actn" IS 'Date de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."pt_orig_n_cnf" IS 'Plan d''action ayant pour origine une non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."ident_orig_pl_actn" IS 'Identication de l''origine du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."doc_ref_pl_actn" IS 'Document de référence lié au plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_ser_redac" IS 'Code du service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_perso_redac" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_perso_orig" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_fnct_redac" IS 'Code de la fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_util" IS 'Code de l''utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_critc" IS 'Code criticité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_int_pl_actn_lie" IS 'Numéro du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."cd_typ_n_cnf" IS 'Code du type de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_redac" IS 'Date de rédaction de la non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_valid" IS 'Date de validation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."dte_hre_sld_plactn" IS 'Date de solde du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_plactn_man" IS 'Numéro de plan d''action manuel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."ident_redac" IS 'Identification complémentaire du rédacteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."pt_redac" IS 'Type de rédacteur (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."pt_resp_suivi" IS 'Type de responsable de suivi (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."mnt_reel_plactn" IS 'Montant réel des actions du plan (somme du montant de chaque action)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."mnt_est_plactn" IS 'Montant estimé des actions du plan (somme du montant estimés de chaque action)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_doc_orig" IS 'Numéro de document origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_int_meth8d" IS 'N° interne methode 8D';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."no_int_amdec" IS 'N° interne amdec origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn"."ident" IS 'Identification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."plactn_actn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_pl_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_ser_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_actn" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cl_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo_dest" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fnct_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_perso_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_ser_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_cl_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo_valid" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_typ_doc" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_dem" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_repo_sh" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_imput_chif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_actn" "datetime" NULL,
	"ident_dem_actn" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"ident_dest" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"ident_valid" "t_com" NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_imp_real" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dest" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dest_ext" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_dest_int" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"ident_compl_valid" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"no_aff_actn" integer NULL,
	"no_doc_dem" "t_doc" NULL,
	"pt_imp_prev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"ident_result" "t_com" NULL,
	"mnt_est" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_mnt_est" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"gain_estim" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_gain_estim" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"qte_actn" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_qte_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"tps_actn" "t_tps" NULL,
	"fmt_tps_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"base_calc_actn" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_base_calc_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"px_unia_actn" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"fmt_px_unia_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"forf_actn" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_forf_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"mnt_actn" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"fmt_mnt_actn" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"tx_mon_actn" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tps" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_base" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_px_unia" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_px_unia" char(3) NULL,
	"tx_mon_estim_actn" "t_coef_conv" NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"pt_valid" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_valid_int" "t_pt_pfs" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_valid_ext" "t_pt" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_forf" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_mnt" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mon_mnt_estim" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_pl_actn", "no_int_actn" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."plactn_actn" IS 'Actions du plan d''action (demandes et résultats)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."no_int_pl_actn" IS 'Numéro du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."no_int_actn" IS 'Numéro interne de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_ser_dest" IS 'Code du service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_perso_dest" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_fnct_dest" IS 'Code de la fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_actn" IS 'Code de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_cl_dest" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_fo_dest" IS 'Code du fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_fnct_valid" IS 'Code de la fonction';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_perso_valid" IS 'Code de la personne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_ser_valid" IS 'Code du service';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_cl_valid" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_fo_valid" IS 'Code du fournisseur';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."dte_hre_dem" IS 'Date de la demande';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."pt_imp_real" IS 'Pointeur impression de la demande déjà réalisée';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."pt_dest_int" IS 'Type destinataire interne (personne,fonction,service)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."ident_compl_valid" IS 'Identification complémentaire du valideur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."no_aff_actn" IS 'Numéro d''affichage de l''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."no_doc_dem" IS 'Numéro de document associé à la demande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."pt_imp_prev" IS 'Impression à prévoir';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."ident_result" IS 'Identification du résultat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."mnt_est" IS 'Montant estimé (budget alloué)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."fmt_mnt_est" IS 'Format du montant estimé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."gain_estim" IS 'Gain estimé';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."fmt_mnt_actn" IS 'Format du montant de l''action';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_unit_qte" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_unit_tps" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_mon_px_unia" IS 'Code monnaie';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_actn"."cd_mon_mnt_estim" IS 'Code monnaie montant estimé';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_n_cnf" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_pl_actn" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_n_cnf_def_cau" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_n_cnf", "no_int_n_cnf_def", "no_int_pl_actn", "no_int_n_cnf_def_cau" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau" IS 'Rattachement des causes fnc à un plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau"."no_n_cnf" IS 'Numéro de non conformité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau"."no_int_n_cnf_def" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création du défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau"."no_int_pl_actn" IS 'Numéro du plan d''action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_ncnf_def_cau"."no_int_n_cnf_def_cau" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de création de la cause';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."plactn_orig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_plactn" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_plactn_orig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ncnf" char(7) NULL,
	"no_ncnf_def" integer NULL,
	"no_ncnf_def_cau" integer NULL,
	"no_int_amdec" integer NULL,
	"no_int_amdec_def" integer NULL,
	"cd_def" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_cau" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_effet" char(7) NULL,
	"ident_cau" varchar(2028) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"typ_orig" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_plactn", "no_int_plactn_orig" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_ste" IS 'N° de société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_int_plactn" IS 'N° interne de plan action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_int_plactn_orig" IS 'N° interne de plan action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_ncnf" IS 'N° interne de non conformite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_ncnf_def" IS 'N° interne de defaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_ncnf_def_cau" IS 'N° interne de cause de defaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_int_amdec" IS 'N° interne amdec';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."no_int_amdec_def" IS 'N° interne de defaut amdec';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."cd_def" IS 'Code defaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."cd_cau" IS 'Code cause';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."cd_effet" IS 'Code effet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."ident_cau" IS 'Identifiant de la cause';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."plactn_orig"."typ_orig" IS 'Origine plan';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."prel_histo" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_histo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_phctrl_carmo", "no_int_prelevt", "no_int_histo", "no_int_cr_fich" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prel_histo"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prel_histo"."no_int_phctrl_carmo" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prel_histo"."no_int_lotstat" IS 'Numéro interne du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prel_histo"."no_int_prelevt" IS 'Numéro interne du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prel_histo"."no_int_histo" IS 'Numéro interne d''histogramme';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."prelevt" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"dt_prelevt" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"cd_perso" char(7) NULL,
	"eff" smallint NOT NULL,
	"trace1" char(35) NULL,
	"trace2" char(35) NULL,
	"trace3" char(35) NULL,
	"lscx" float NULL,
	"licx" float NULL,
	"lssx" float NULL,
	"lisx" float NULL,
	"lscs" float NULL,
	"lics" float NULL,
	"lsss" float NULL,
	"liss" float NULL,
	"cp" float NULL,
	"cpk" float NULL,
	"cam" float NULL,
	"flags" smallint NULL,
	"criteres" integer NULL,
	"somme_mes" double NULL,
	"somme_mes_2" double NULL,
	"mes_min" float NULL,
	"mes_max" float NULL,
	"moymoy" float NULL,
	"moysig" float NULL,
	"derive_inf" float NULL,
	"derive_sup" float NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpm" float NULL,
	"nb_prelevt" integer NULL,
	"nb_ht_sup" integer NULL,
	"nb_ht_inf" integer NULL,
	"cp_min" float NULL,
	"cp_max" float NULL,
	"cpk_min" float NULL,
	"cpk_max" float NULL,
	"cpm_min" float NULL,
	"cpm_max" float NULL,
	"reglage" float NULL,
	"moy_sig" double NULL,
	"moy_eten" double NULL,
	"somme_emm" double NULL,
	"nb_perio" integer NULL,
	"typ_prelev" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_phctrl_carmo", "no_int_prelevt", "no_int_cr_fich" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."no_int_phctrl_carmo" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."no_int_lotstat" IS 'Numéro interne du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."no_int_prelevt" IS 'Numéro interne du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."no_ext_prelevt" IS 'Numéro externe du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."dt_prelevt" IS 'Date et heure du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cd_perso" IS 'Opérateur ayant effectué le prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."eff" IS 'Effectif prélevé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."trace1" IS 'Libellé pour la traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."trace2" IS 'Libellé pour la traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."trace3" IS 'Libellé pour la traçabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."lscx" IS 'Limite supérieure de contrôle du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."licx" IS 'Limite inférieure de contrôle du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."lssx" IS 'Limite supérieure de surveillance du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."lisx" IS 'Limite inférieure de surveillance du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."lscs" IS 'Limite supérieure de contrôle de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."lics" IS 'Limite inférieure de contrôle de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."lsss" IS 'Limite supérieure de surveillance de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."liss" IS 'Limite inférieure de surveillance de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cp" IS 'Indice de capabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cpk" IS 'Indice de capabilité centrée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cam" IS 'Indice de capabilité CNOMO';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."flags" IS '16 flags';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."criteres" IS 'Critères ayant déclenché';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."somme_mes" IS 'Somme des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."somme_mes_2" IS 'Somme du carré des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."mes_min" IS 'Minimum des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."mes_max" IS 'Maximum des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."moymoy" IS 'Moyenne estimée depuis le dernier recalcul de la carte S.P.C.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."moysig" IS 'Ecart-type estimé depuis le dernier recalcul de la carte S.P.C.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."derive_inf" IS 'Valeur inférieure pour la droite de dérive';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."derive_sup" IS 'Valeur supérieure pour la droite de dérive';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."no_int_cr_fich" IS 'Numéro interne de l''ordre de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cpm" IS 'Indicateur Cpm de TAGUCHI';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."nb_prelevt" IS 'Comptage absolu du nombre de prélèvements';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."nb_ht_sup" IS 'Nombre de mesures au-delà de la tolérance supérieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."nb_ht_inf" IS 'Nombre de mesures en-deçà de la tolérance inférieure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cp_min" IS 'Capabilité minimale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cp_max" IS 'Capabilité maximale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cpk_min" IS 'Capabilité centrée minimale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cpk_max" IS 'Capabilité centrée maximale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cpm_min" IS 'Indice de TAGUCHI minimal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."cpm_max" IS 'Indice de TAGUCHI maximal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."reglage" IS 'Valeur de réglage envoyé à la machine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."moy_sig" IS 'Moyenne des écarts-types pour la période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."moy_eten" IS 'Moyenne des étendues pour la période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."somme_emm" IS 'Somme des évolutions de la moyenne pour chaque période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."nb_perio" IS 'Nombre de périodes (closes ou dernière en cours)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt"."typ_prelev" IS 'Mesure avec choix (1) ou non des caracteristiques';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."prelevt_actn" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_actn" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_phctrl_carmo", "no_int_prelevt", "cd_actn", "no_int_cr_fich" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_actn"."no_ste" IS 'Code société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_actn"."no_int_phctrl_carmo" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_actn"."no_int_lotstat" IS 'Numéro interne du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_actn"."no_int_prelevt" IS 'Numéro interne du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_actn"."cd_actn" IS 'Code de l''action saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_actn"."no_int_cr_fich" IS 'Numéro interne de l''ordre de contrôle';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."prelevt_cau" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cau" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_phctrl_carmo", "no_int_prelevt", "cd_cau", "no_int_cr_fich" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_cau"."no_ste" IS 'Code société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_cau"."no_int_phctrl_carmo" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_cau"."no_int_lotstat" IS 'Numéro interne du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_cau"."no_int_prelevt" IS 'Numéro interne du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_cau"."cd_cau" IS 'Code de la cause saisie';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."prelevt_empreinte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_empreinte" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"no_ext_empreinte" integer NOT NULL,
	"eff" smallint NOT NULL,
	"lscx" float NULL,
	"licx" float NULL,
	"lscs" float NULL,
	"lics" float NULL,
	"lssx" float NULL,
	"lisx" float NULL,
	"lsss" float NULL,
	"liss" float NULL,
	"cp" float NULL,
	"cpk" float NULL,
	"cam" float NULL,
	"cpm" float NULL,
	"flags" smallint NULL,
	"criteres" integer NULL,
	"somme_mes" double NULL,
	"somme_mes_2" double NULL,
	"mes_min" float NULL,
	"mes_max" float NULL,
	"moymoy" float NULL,
	"moysig" float NULL,
	"derive_inf" float NULL,
	"derive_sup" float NULL,
	"nb_prelevt" integer NULL,
	"cp_min" float NULL,
	"cp_max" float NULL,
	"cpk_min" float NULL,
	"cpk_max" float NULL,
	"cpm_min" float NULL,
	"cpm_max" float NULL,
	"moy_sig" double NULL,
	"moy_eten" double NULL,
	"somme_emm" double NULL,
	"nb_perio" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_phctrl_carmo", "no_int_prelevt", "no_int_cr_fich", "no_int_empreinte", "typ_moy", "cd_moy" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."prelevt_empreinte" IS 'Résultats calculés pour une empreinte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_ste" IS 'Code de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_int_phctrl_carmo" IS 'Numéro interne de la caractéristique mise en oeuvre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_int_lotstat" IS 'Numéro interne du lot statistique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_int_prelevt" IS 'Numéro interne du prélèvement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_int_cr_fich" IS 'Numéro interne de l''ordre de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_int_empreinte" IS 'Numéro interne de l''empreinte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."typ_moy" IS 'Type du moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen technique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."no_ext_empreinte" IS 'Numéro externe de l''empreinte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."eff" IS 'Effectif prélevé pour cette empreinte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."lscx" IS 'Limite supérieure de contrôle du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."licx" IS 'Limite inférieure de contrôle de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."lscs" IS 'Limite supérieure de contrôle du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."lics" IS 'Limite inférieure de contrôle de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."lssx" IS 'Limite supérieure de surveillance du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."lisx" IS 'Limite inférieure de surveillance de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."lsss" IS 'Limite supérieure de surveillance du centrage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."liss" IS 'Limite inférieure de surveillance de la dispersion';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cp" IS 'Indice de capabilité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cpk" IS 'Indice de capabilité centrée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cam" IS 'Indice de capabilité CNOMO';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cpm" IS 'Indicateur Cpm de TAGUCHI';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."flags" IS '16 flags';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."criteres" IS 'Criteres ayant déclenché';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."somme_mes" IS 'Somme des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."somme_mes_2" IS 'Somme du carré des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."mes_min" IS 'Minimum des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."mes_max" IS 'Maximum des mesures';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."moymoy" IS 'Moyenne estimée depuis le dernier recalcul de la carte S.P.C.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."moysig" IS 'Ecart-type estimé depuis le dernier recalcul de la carte S.P.C.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."derive_inf" IS 'Valeur inférieure de la droite de dérive';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."derive_sup" IS 'Valeur supérieure de la droite de dérive';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."nb_prelevt" IS 'Comptage absolu du nombre de prélèvements';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cp_min" IS 'Capabilité minimale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cp_max" IS 'Capabilité maximale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cpk_min" IS 'Capabilité centrée minimale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cpk_max" IS 'Capabilité centrée maximale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cpm_min" IS 'Indice de TAGUCHI minimal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."cpm_max" IS 'Indice de TAGUCHI maximal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."moy_sig" IS 'Moyenne des écarts-types pour la période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."moy_eten" IS 'Moyenne des étendues pour la période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."somme_emm" IS 'Somme des évolutions de la moyenne pour chaque période';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_empreinte"."nb_perio" IS 'Nombre de périodes (closes ou dernière en cours)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."prelevt_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_phctrl_carmo" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lotstat" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_prelevt" integer NOT NULL,
	"mes_01" float NULL,
	"mes_02" float NULL,
	"mes_03" float NULL,
	"mes_04" float NULL,
	"mes_05" float NULL,
	"mes_06" float NULL,
	"mes_07" float NULL,
	"mes_08" float NULL,
	"mes_09" float NULL,
	"mes_10" float NULL,
	"mes_11" float NULL,
	"mes_12" float NULL,
	"mes_13" float NULL,
	"mes_14" float NULL,
	"mes_15" float NULL,
	"no_int_cr_fich" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_phctrl_carmo", "no_int_prelevt", "no_int_lig_prelevt", "no_int_cr_fich" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_02" IS 'Mesure individuelle';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_06" IS 'Mesure individuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_07" IS 'Mesure individuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_08" IS 'Mesure individuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_09" IS 'Mesure individuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_10" IS 'Mesure individuelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."prelevt_lig"."mes_11" IS 'Mesure individuelle';

);

CREATE TABLE "obi"."proc_art" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"pt_def" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_calc" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art", "cd_proc" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."proc_art" IS 'processus de l''article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."no_int_art" IS 'Compteur interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."pt_def" IS 'Pointeur défaut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art"."dte_hre_calc" IS 'Date heure calcul';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_art" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_pxrevie" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_anal" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_sect" "t_cd" NULL,
	"px_revie" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_marge" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_art", "cd_proc", "no_int_pxrevie" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie" IS 'décomposition prix de revient';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie"."no_int_pxrevie" IS 'No interne prix revient';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie"."cd_anal" IS 'Code analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie"."cd_sect" IS 'Code section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie"."px_revie" IS 'Prix de revient';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_art_pxrevie"."coef_marge" IS 'Coefficient marge';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."proc_dbanal_sect" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_proc" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_anal" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_sect" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"mnt_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"mnt_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_calc" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_proc", "cd_anal", "cd_sect" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_dbanal_sect"."dte_hre_calc" IS 'Date dernier calcul';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."proc_gamope" (
	"cd_proc_lie" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_proc_remp" char(35) NULL,
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_proc" char(35) NOT NULL,

	"cd_unit_tps_prod" char(3) NULL,

	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"typ_sais" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_form" char(25) NULL,

	"typ_prise" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_oper_lie" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"typ_lie" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_oper_remp" "t_cd_8" NULL,

	"dte_fin_valid_com" "datetime" NULL,

	"typ_chev_ope" "t_typ1" NULL,

	"no_int_proc_gamope_remp" integer NULL,

	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"nb_ex" smallint NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pt_imp_real" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_imp_prev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com_ent" "t_com" NULL,
	"qte_brute" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"com_pied" "t_com" NULL,
	"cd_ope_manu" "t_cd_8" NULL,
	"mnt_brut" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_oper" char(7) NULL,
	"def_val_prod" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"def_coef_conv" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"repart_mode" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_suivi_tps" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_suivi_qte" char(1) NULL,
	"coef_marge" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_px_revie" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_revie" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"mnt_px_vte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"typ_sais_qte" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_mis_oeuvr_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_mis_oeuvr_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_mis_oeuvr_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_mis_oeuvr_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_fabr_a" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_fabr_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_fabr_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_fabr_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"bas_px_vte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"bas_px_vte_b" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"bas_px_vte_c" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"bas_px_vte_d" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"del_prepa" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_gam" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_etat2" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat2" char(3) NULL,
	"pt_maj_us" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pou_effi" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_cons" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_proc", "no_int_proc_gamope" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."proc_gamope" IS 'Opération gamme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_proc_lie" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_proc_remp" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."no_int_proc_gamope" IS 'Numéro interne de la procédure liée à l''opération de la gamme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_unit_tps_prod" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_oper" IS 'Code de l''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_sais" IS 'Type de saisie quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_form" IS 'Code de la formule';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."des" IS 'Désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_oper" IS 'Type d''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_prise" IS 'Pointeur optionnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_oper_lie" IS 'Code de l''opération liée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_lie" IS 'Lien opération: M-Montage,P-Production,S-Suivante,D-Démontage, (L-inutilisé)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_oper_remp" IS 'Code de l''opération de remplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."dte_deb_valid_com" IS 'Date de début de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."dte_fin_valid_com" IS 'Date de fin de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."coef_rebut" IS 'Pourcentage rebut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."qte_regla" IS 'Quantité de réglage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_dur" IS 'Type de durée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."coef_unit" IS 'Coefficient de conversion par rapport à l''unité de référence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_contr_ope" IS 'Contrainte de liaison opé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."pt_suivi_qte" IS 'Pointeur suivi quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."qte_fab" IS 'Quantité eco fabrication';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."no_aff" IS 'Numéro d''ordre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_unit_chev_ope" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_unit_tps_ope" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_of" IS 'Mono ou multi OF';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_chev_ope" IS 'Chevauchement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."no_int_proc_gamope_lie" IS 'Numéro interne de la procédure liée à l''opération de la gamme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."no_int_proc_gamope_remp" IS 'Numéro interne de la procédure liée à l''opération de la gamme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."typ_ctrl" IS 'Type de contrôle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état du contrôle intégré';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état du contrôle intégré';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."nb_ex" IS 'Nombre d''exemplaires d''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."pt_imp_real" IS 'Pointeur impression de la demande déjà réalisée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."pt_imp_prev" IS 'Impression à prévoir';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."com_ent" IS 'Commentaire d''entête de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."qte_brute" IS 'Quantité brute';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."com_pied" IS 'Commentaire de pied de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."cd_ope_manu" IS 'Code manuel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."mnt_brut" IS 'Montant brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."no_oper" IS 'Numéro d''opération';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."def_val_prod" IS 'Valeur par défaut pour la durée ou production';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."proc_gamope"."def_coef_conv" IS 'Valeur par défaut du coefficient de conversion entre unités de mise en oeuvre et de stock';
