CREATE TABLE "obi"."syintr_segment" (
	"cd_intr" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_seg" char(10) NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_fic" char(50) NULL,
	"no_aff" integer NOT NULL,
	"pt_repet" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_niv" integer NULL,
	"lng_seg" integer NULL,
	"no_table" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"pt_suiv" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_intr", "cd_seg" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."cd_intr" IS 'Code interface';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."cd_seg" IS 'Code segment';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."des" IS 'Désignation segment';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."cd_fic" IS 'Code fichier correspondant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."no_aff" IS 'NÝ d''ordre du segment';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."pt_repet" IS 'Bouclage sur segment';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."no_niv" IS 'Niveau du segment';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."lng_seg" IS 'Longueur du segment';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."no_table" IS 'NÝ de table correspondante';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_segment"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur dernière modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syintr_table" (
	"cd_intr" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"no_int_intr_table" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_aff" integer NOT NULL,
	"typ_select" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'T',
	"cd_table" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"no_niv" integer NULL,
	"pt_repet" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"form_comp" char(2048) NULL,
	"form_tri" char(2048) NULL,
	"pt_requ" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_seg_decl" char(10) NULL,
	"typ_maj" char(1) NULL,
	"lng_form_comp" integer NULL,
	"zone_maj" char(2048) NULL,
	"pt_suiv" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_intr", "no_int_intr_table" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."cd_intr" IS 'Code interface';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."no_int_intr_table" IS 'NÝ interne de table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."no_aff" IS 'NÝ d''ordre de la table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."typ_select" IS 'Support de sélection (table ou dw)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."cd_table" IS 'Code de la table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."no_niv" IS 'Niveau de la table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."pt_repet" IS 'Bouclage sur la table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."form_comp" IS 'Formule Sql complémentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."pt_requ" IS 'Pointeur de lien avec une requête';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date/heure création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date/heure modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syintr_table"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur dernière modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syistable" (
	"no_fic" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_logi" char(35) NULL,
	"dataw" char(50) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"nb_champ" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_fic" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syistable" IS 'Liste des tables logiques utilisées par interscan';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable"."no_fic" IS 'Indice table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable"."cd_logi" IS 'Nom logique de la table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable"."dataw" IS 'Dessin pour lecture PROCOST';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable"."nb_champ" IS 'Nombre de champ';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syistable_col" (
	"no_fic" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_champ" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_logi" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_champ" char(50) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"typ_col" char(5) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_fic", "no_champ" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syistable_col" IS 'Liste des données utilisées par interscan';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable_col"."no_fic" IS 'Indice table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable_col"."no_champ" IS 'Indice champ';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable_col"."cd_logi" IS 'Nom logique de la donnée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable_col"."cd_champ" IS 'Code du champ pour le dessin';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable_col"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syistable_col"."typ_col" IS 'Type des données pour PROCOST';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sylib" (
	"cd_lib" char(100) NOT NULL,
	"cd_lang" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"lib" char(100) NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_exp" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_lib", "cd_lang", "pt_syst" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sylib" IS 'Libellé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sylib"."cd_lib" IS 'Code du libellé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sylib"."cd_lang" IS 'Code langue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sylib"."lib" IS 'Libellé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sylib"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur de stockage  (système ou utilisateur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sylib"."pt_exp" IS 'Pointeur filtrage export';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."symdl" (
	"cd_mdl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"des_mdl" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_mdl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."symdl" IS 'Module commercial';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symdl"."cd_mdl" IS 'Code du module commercial (point d''entrée au premier menu)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symdl"."des_mdl" IS 'Désignation du module commercial';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."symdl_jeton" (
	"cd_mdl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_id_trans" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_stati" char(15) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_mdl", "no_id_trans" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."symenu" (
	"menu_suiv" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"menu_prec" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"mode_init" smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"no_compl" smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_menu_suiv" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"no_ord" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_lib_menu" char(30) NOT NULL,
	"mica" varchar(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "menu_suiv", "menu_prec", "mode_init", "no_compl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."symenu" IS 'Table système des menus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."menu_suiv" IS 'Menu suivant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."menu_prec" IS 'Menu précédent';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."mode_init" IS 'Mode initial';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."no_compl" IS 'Numero complément';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."typ_menu_suiv" IS 'Type du menu suivant (fenêtre ou menu)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."no_ord" IS 'Numéro d''ordre dans le menu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur de stockage  (système ou utilisateur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."cd_lib_menu" IS 'Code libellé menu';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symenu"."mica" IS 'Microaide';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."symsg" (
	"id_msg" smallint NOT NULL,
	"sect_msg" char(20) NOT NULL,
	"ico_msg" integer NOT NULL,
	"bton" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"bton_def" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"bton_echap" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"pt_chp_opt" "t_pt_n" NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"typ_chp_opt" char(10) NULL,
	"lg_chp_opt" float NULL,
	"pt_chp_repo" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_lib_ent" char(30) NOT NULL,
	"cd_lib_msg" char(30) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "id_msg", "sect_msg" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."symsg" IS 'Messages';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."id_msg" IS 'No identification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."sect_msg" IS 'Section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."ico_msg" IS 'Icone affiché sur le panneau d''erreur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."bton" IS 'Bouton';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."bton_def" IS 'Bouton par défaut si touche entrée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."bton_echap" IS 'Bouton échappement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."pt_chp_opt" IS 'Champ optionnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."typ_chp_opt" IS 'Type champ optionnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."lg_chp_opt" IS 'Longueur champ optionnel';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."pt_chp_repo" IS 'Zone de saisie réservée à l''utilisateur pour tracer l''erreur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."cd_lib_ent" IS 'Code libellé entête';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."symsg"."cd_lib_msg" IS 'Code libellé message';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sypersomet" (
	"cd_obj_orig" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_lge_met" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_obj_met" char(50) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_obj_orig", "cd_lge_met" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sypersomet" IS 'PERSO METIER';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sypersomet"."cd_obj_orig" IS 'Objet origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sypersomet"."cd_lge_met" IS 'Code de la langage métier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sypersomet"."cd_obj_met" IS 'Objet remplacement';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syproc" (
	"no_proc" integer NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_proc" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syproc" IS 'Procédure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syproc"."no_proc" IS 'Numéro procédure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syproc"."des" IS 'Désignation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syproc_requ" (
	"no_ordre_requ" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_requ" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_proc" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ordre_requ", "no_requ", "no_proc" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syproc_requ" IS 'requête de procédure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syproc_requ"."no_ordre_requ" IS 'Numéro d''ordre de la requête';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syproc_requ"."no_requ" IS 'Numéro de requète';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syproc_requ"."no_proc" IS 'Numéro procédure';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt" (
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"typ_prog_drt" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"pt_dev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_syst" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_aide" integer NULL,
	"pt_triauto" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"page" char(256) NULL,
	"pt_mes" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_mdl" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_prog_drt" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt" IS 'Droit';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."typ_prog_drt" IS 'Type du programme (menu, fenêtre...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."pt_dev" IS 'Pointeur programme développé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur de stockage  (système ou utilisateur)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."no_aide" IS 'No d''aide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."pt_triauto" IS 'Autorisation de tri personnalisé des lignes';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."com" IS 'Informations sur le choix du numéro d''aide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."page" IS 'Chemin (relatif à W:\\, et nom de la page HTML d''aide';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."pt_mes" IS 'Présence de point de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt"."cd_mdl" IS 'Code module';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_comp" (
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_prog_drt_ongl" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"pt_suite" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_compl" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_prog_drt", "cd_prog_drt_ongl" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_comp" IS 'Composant fenêtre';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_comp"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Fenêtre principale';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_comp"."cd_prog_drt_ongl" IS 'Onglet ou suite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_comp"."pt_suite" IS '0-onglet, 1 - Suite';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_comp"."no_compl" IS 'No comportement appelant';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil" (
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_cat_util" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"limta_acs" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_crea" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_suppr" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_imp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_exp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_prog_drt", "cd_cat_util" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil" IS 'Droits d''accès utilisateurs par catégorie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."cd_cat_util" IS 'Code de la catégorie d''utilisateurs';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."limta_acs" IS 'Limitation à l''accès';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."limta_crea" IS 'Limitation à la création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."limta_modif" IS 'Limitation à la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."limta_suppr" IS 'Limitation à la suppression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."limta_imp" IS 'Limitation à l''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dccatutil"."limta_exp" IS 'Limitation pour l''exportation de données';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_dcrequ" (
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_requ" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL DEFAULT current user,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL DEFAULT current timestamp,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_prog_drt", "cd_requ" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_dcrequ" IS 'Requetes du pogramme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcrequ"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcrequ"."cd_requ" IS 'Code de requête';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil" (
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_util" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"limta_acs" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_crea" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_modif" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_suppr" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_imp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"limta_exp" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_prog_drt", "cd_util" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil" IS 'Droits d''accès utilisateurs par utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."cd_util" IS 'Code de l''utilisateur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."limta_acs" IS 'Limitation à l''accès';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."limta_crea" IS 'Limitation à la création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."limta_modif" IS 'Limitation à la modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."limta_suppr" IS 'Limitation à la suppression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."limta_imp" IS 'Limitation à l''impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_dcutil"."limta_exp" IS 'Limitation pour l''exportation de données';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_onglet" (
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"cd_ongle" char(50) NOT NULL,
	"des_ongle" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_prog_drt", "cd_ongle" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_onglet" IS 'onglet supp';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_onglet"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_onglet"."cd_ongle" IS 'Code de l''onglet';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_onglet"."des_ongle" IS 'Désignation de l''onglet';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_table" (
	"cd_table" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_prog_drt" char(50) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_table", "cd_prog_drt" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syprogdrt_table" IS 'Liste des tables utilisables dans une requète';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_table"."cd_table" IS 'Code table';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprogdrt_table"."cd_prog_drt" IS 'Code du programme';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syprotoc" (
	"no_int_protoc" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_protoc" char(15) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"des" char(100) NULL,
	"format" char(1) NULL,
	"baudrate" char(1) NULL,
	"stops" char(1) NULL,
	"parity" char(1) NULL,
	"xonxoffout" char(1) NULL,
	"xonxoffin" char(1) NULL,
	"rtscts" char(1) NULL,
	"cxon" integer NULL,
	"cxoff" integer NULL,
	"pcheck" char(1) NULL,
	"cerr" integer NULL,
	"ceof" integer NULL,
	"evtchar" integer NULL,
	"timeout" integer NULL,
	"delai" integer NULL,
	"rxbuf" integer NULL,
	"txbuf" integer NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NULL,
	"fmt_init_tx" char(256) NULL,
	"fmt_init_rx" char(256) NULL,
	"fmt_lect_tx" char(256) NULL,
	"fmt_lect_rx" char(256) NULL,
	"parai" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"paras" char(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
	"parad" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.0,
	"repmax" integer NULL,
	"lgmax_rx" integer NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dtr" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dtr_duree" integer NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"sfin" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_int_protoc", "cd_protoc", "parai", "paras", "parad" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."no_int_protoc" IS 'Numéro interne du protocole';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date de modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."cd_protoc" IS 'Code du protocole';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."des" IS 'Désignation du protocole';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."format" IS 'Format des caractères';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."baudrate" IS 'Vitesse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."stops" IS 'Nombre de bits stops';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."parity" IS 'Parité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."xonxoffout" IS 'Xon/Xoff géré en émission';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."xonxoffin" IS 'Xon/Xoff géré en réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."rtscts" IS 'Gestion du flux par RTS/CTS';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."cxon" IS 'Caractère Xon';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."cxoff" IS 'Caractère Xoff';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."pcheck" IS 'Contrôle de la parité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."cerr" IS 'Caractère de remplacement si erreur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."ceof" IS 'Caractère de fin de trame reçue';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."evtchar" IS 'Caractère de déclenchement de la réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."timeout" IS 'Time-out global';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."delai" IS 'Time-out inter-caractères';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."rxbuf" IS 'Taille du tampon en réception';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."txbuf" IS 'Taille du tampon en émission';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."cd_moy" IS 'Code du moyen associé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."typ_moy" IS 'Type du moyen associé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."fmt_init_tx" IS 'Format en émission pour initialisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."fmt_init_rx" IS 'Format en réception pour initialisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."fmt_lect_tx" IS 'Format en émission pour lecture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."fmt_lect_rx" IS 'Format en réception pour lecture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."parai" IS 'Paramètre entier';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."paras" IS 'Paramètre chaîne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."parad" IS 'Paramètre décimal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."repmax" IS 'Délai maximum pour attentendre une réponse (ms)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."lgmax_rx" IS 'Longueur maximale à recevoir';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."dtr" IS 'Gestion du signal Data Terminal Ready';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."dtr_duree" IS 'Durée du signal Data Terminal Ready';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syprotoc"."sfin" IS 'Chaîne identifiant la fin de la réception';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syrappo" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_rappo" integer NOT NULL DEFAULT autoincrement,
	"dte_hre_deb_trait" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_fin_trait" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_util_trait" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_prog_drt_trait" char(50) NULL,
	"nb_err" integer NULL,
	"nb_typ_a" integer NULL,
	"nb_typ_b" integer NULL,
	"nb_typ_c" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_rappo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syrappo" IS 'Stockage des rapports de traitement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."no_rappo" IS 'Numéro du rapport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."dte_hre_deb_trait" IS 'Date debut taitement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."dte_hre_fin_trait" IS 'Date fin traitement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."cd_util_trait" IS 'Utilisateur ayant effectué le traitement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."cd_prog_drt_trait" IS 'Programme ayant généré les erreurs';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."nb_err" IS 'Nombre d''erreurs';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."nb_typ_a" IS 'Nombre d''erreur de type A';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."nb_typ_b" IS 'Nombre d''erreur de type B';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo"."nb_typ_c" IS 'Nombre d''erreur de type C';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syrappo_lig" (
	"no_rappo_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_rappo" integer NOT NULL,
	"com_rappo" long varchar NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"des_rappo" char(150) NULL,
	"typ_msg" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_rappo_lig", "no_rappo" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syrappo_lig" IS 'Ligne de rapport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo_lig"."no_rappo_lig" IS 'Numéro de ligne de rapport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo_lig"."no_rappo" IS 'Numéro du rapport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo_lig"."com_rappo" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo_lig"."des_rappo" IS 'Désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrappo_lig"."typ_msg" IS 'Type de message (erreur, avertissement, ...)';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syrequ" (
	"no_requ" integer NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_typ_requ" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"cd_pipe" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_prof_orig" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_prof_dest" char(35) NULL,
	"lib_cde" "t_com" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_requ" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."syrequ" IS 'Requête';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."no_requ" IS 'Numéro de requète';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."des" IS 'Désignation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."cd_typ_requ" IS 'Code du type de requête';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."cd_pipe" IS 'Code pipeline';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."cd_prof_orig" IS 'Profil origine';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."cd_prof_dest" IS 'Profil destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrequ"."lib_cde" IS 'Libelle de la commande';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."syrgltqual" (
	"no_int_syrgltqual" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_syrgltqual" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"des_syrgltqual" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"com" varchar(2048) NULL,
	"path_obj" char(100) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_int_syrgltqual" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."no_int_syrgltqual" IS 'Numéro interne de la règlementation qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."cd_syrgltqual" IS 'Code de la règlementation qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."des_syrgltqual" IS 'Désignation de la règlementation qualité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."syrgltqual"."path_obj" IS 'Chemin d''accès et nom de l''objet associé';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."systatconf" (
	"cd_stat_conf" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"des_stat_conf" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_stat_conf" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf"."cd_stat_conf" IS 'Code de la configuration';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf"."des_stat_conf" IS 'Désignation de la configuration';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';

	"cd_stat_conf" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"cd_para" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"des_para" char(100) NULL,
	"val_para" char(100) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_stat_conf", "cd_para" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf_para"."cd_stat_conf" IS 'Code de la configuration';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf_para"."cd_para" IS 'Code du paramètre';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf_para"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."systatconf_para"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytable" (
	"cd_table" char(35) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_table" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytable" IS 'Table de la base';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytable"."cd_table" IS 'Code de la table';

	"cd_col" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_table" char(35) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_col", "cd_table" )
);

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytable_col"."cd_table" IS 'Code de la table';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypactpres" (
	"no_act" integer NOT NULL,
	"des_act" char(35) NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_act" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypactpres"."no_act" IS 'No action';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypactpres"."des_act" IS 'Désignation action';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypcar" (
	"cd_typ_car" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"pt_syst" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"des_typ_car" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"path_obj" char(100) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_typ_car" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytypcar" IS 'Types pour les caractéristiques';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."cd_typ_car" IS 'Type de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."pt_syst" IS 'Pointeur système';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."des_typ_car" IS 'Désignation du type de la caractéristique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de création';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypcar"."path_obj" IS 'Chemin d''accès à l''objet associé';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypemp" (
	"typ_emp" "t_typ1" NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "typ_emp" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytypemp" IS 'type d''emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypemp"."typ_emp" IS 'Type d''emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypemp"."des" IS 'Désignation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypetat" (
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_mdl" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"des_typ_etat" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"typ_tiers" char(1) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_typ_etat" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytypetat" IS 'Type d''états';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypetat"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypetat"."cd_mdl" IS 'Code du module commercial (point d''entrée au premier menu)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypetat"."des_typ_etat" IS 'Désignation du type de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypetat"."typ_tiers" IS 'Type de tiers pour restriction';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypfeuil" (
	"cd_typ_feuil" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "cd_typ_feuil" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytypfeuil" IS 'Type de feuille';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypfeuil"."cd_typ_feuil" IS 'Code type feuille';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypfeuil"."des" IS 'Désignation';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypfeuil_col" (
	"cd_col_feuil" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_feuil" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"typ_ent_res" char(1) NULL DEFAULT 'E',
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"no_int_feuil_col" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_int_feuil_col" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytypfeuil_col" IS 'Colonnes type feuille';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypfeuil_col"."cd_col_feuil" IS 'Code colonne';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypfeuil_col"."cd_typ_feuil" IS 'Type de feuille';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypfeuil_col"."typ_ent_res" IS 'type Entrée Résultat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypfeuil_col"."no_int_feuil_col" IS 'NÝ interne de colonne';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."sytypunitmes" (
	"typ_unit_mes" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"des_typ_unit_mes" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "typ_unit_mes" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."sytypunitmes" IS 'Type d''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypunitmes"."typ_unit_mes" IS 'Type d''unité de mesure (exe : longueur, surface...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."sytypunitmes"."des_typ_unit_mes" IS 'Désignation de l''unité de mesure';
CREATE TABLE "DBA"."tempo" (
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tf" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_tf" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_tf" char(35) NOT NULL,
	"clas_tf" "t_typ1" NOT NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"typ_tf" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"des_tf" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"typ_sais_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL DEFAULT 'CD',
	"typ_prise_cpte" "t_typ2" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"indice_tf" char(4) NULL,
	"pt_mono_util" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_prov" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"fmt_px" "t_fmt" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_tf" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tf" IS 'TARIF GENERAL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."cd_tf" IS 'Code du tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."clas_tf" IS 'Classe de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."cd_mon" IS 'Code monnaie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."cd_vti" IS 'Code ventilation comptable';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."typ_tf" IS 'Type de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."des_tf" IS 'Désignation tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."typ_sais_tf" IS 'Lieu de saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."typ_px_fact" IS 'Type de valorisation  (date de commande, date de livraison prévue,...)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."typ_prise_cpte" IS 'Type prise en compte';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."indice_tf" IS 'Indice du tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."pt_mono_util" IS 'Pointeur mono ou multi référencement du tarif général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."pt_prov" IS 'Pointeur Provisoire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf"."fmt_px" IS 'Format de présentation des prix';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tf_dte" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_tf" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_valid" "datetime" NULL,
	"com" "t_com" NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_com" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin_valid_com" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"fmt_px" char(20) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_tf", "dte_deb_valid_tf" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tf_dte" IS 'Tarif général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."dte_deb_valid_tf" IS 'Date de début de validité du tarif client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."dte_fin_valid" IS 'Date de fin de validité de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."com" IS 'Commentaire général';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."dte_deb_valid_com" IS 'Date de début de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."dte_fin_valid_com" IS 'Date de fin de validité du commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."cd_mon" IS 'Monnaie ligne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte"."fmt_px" IS 'Format prix unitaire';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tf_dte_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_tf" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"px_vte_unia_tf_lig" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"qte_inf_tf_lig" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_sup_tf_lig" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_unit_px" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 1,
	"mnt_min_tf_lig" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"px_min_tf_lig" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	"typ_px" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_proc" char(35) NULL,
	"qte_fab" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"tx_rem" "t_tx" NULL,
	"px_brut" "t_px_unia" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_tf", "dte_deb_valid_tf", "no_int_tf_dte_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tf_dte_lig" IS 'Ligne d''un tarif pour un article vendu à un client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."dte_deb_valid_tf" IS 'Date de début de validité du tarif client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."no_int_tf_dte_lig" IS 'Numéro de la fourchette de quantité pour le prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."px_vte_unia_tf_lig" IS 'Prix de vente unitaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."qte_inf_tf_lig" IS 'Quantité inférieure de la fourchette';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."qte_sup_tf_lig" IS 'Quantité supérieure de la fourchette';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."coef_unit_px" IS 'Coefficient de conversion de l''unité de prix';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."mnt_min_tf_lig" IS 'Montant minimum appliqué sur le prix unitaire*quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."px_min_tf_lig" IS 'Prix minimum';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."typ_px" IS 'Type de prix (constant ou proportionnel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."cd_proc" IS 'Code processus';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."qte_fab" IS 'Type de prix (constant ou proportionnel)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."tx_rem" IS 'Taux de remise pour les références clients (hors pièce de négoce)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig"."px_brut" IS 'Prix brut';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_tf" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_valid_tf" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"no_int_tf_dte_lig_pxrev" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_art_pxvte" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_anal" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_sect" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_anal_ext" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_sect_ext" "t_cd" NULL,
	"px_revie" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"coef_marge" "t_mnt" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_tf", "dte_deb_valid_tf", "no_int_tf_dte_lig", "no_int_tf_dte_lig_pxrev" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi" IS 'Prix de revient';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."no_int_tf" IS 'Numéro interne de tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."dte_deb_valid_tf" IS 'Date de début de validité du tarif client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."no_int_tf_dte_lig" IS 'Numéro de la fourchette de quantité pour le prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."no_int_tf_dte_lig_pxrev" IS 'Numéro interne ligne de prix de revient du tarif';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."no_int_art_pxvte" IS 'Numéro interne du prix de vente';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."cd_anal" IS 'Code analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."cd_sect" IS 'Code section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."cd_anal_ext" IS 'Code analytique';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."cd_sect_ext" IS 'Code section';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."px_revie" IS 'Prix de revient';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tf_dte_lig_prxrevi"."coef_marge" IS 'Code section';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_prog" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"typ_tiers" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"typ_prog" char(1) NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"des_prog" char(35) NULL,
	"dte_prog" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"typ_perio_maj" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_perio" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin_perio" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_prog" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog" IS 'Entete programme de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."no_int_prog" IS 'No interne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."typ_tiers" IS 'Type de tiers';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."typ_prog" IS 'Type de programme: demande de livraison, Kanban';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."des_prog" IS 'Référence du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."dte_prog" IS 'Date d''émission du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."typ_perio_maj" IS 'Période de mise à jour: calculée suivant les cadences, saisie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."dte_deb_perio" IS 'Date de début de la période de mise à jour (saisie)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."dte_fin_perio" IS 'Date de fin de la période de mise à jour (saisie)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."cd_etat" IS 'Code etat';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Type etat';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_prog" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cd_fo" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_fo_adr" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_prog", "no_int_prog_adr" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr" IS 'Adresse programme de commande';

COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."no_int_prog" IS 'No interne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."no_int_prog_adr" IS 'No interne d''adresse programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numéro d''adresse client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."cd_fo" IS 'Code fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."no_fo_adr" IS 'Numéro d''adresse fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_prog" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"cpt_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_fo" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"pt_maj" char(1) NULL,
	"dte_calc_bes" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_deb_cum" "datetime" NULL,
	"qte_cum" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_der_bon" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_retar" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_intgr" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_imp" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_der_ran" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_prog", "no_int_prog_adr", "no_int_prog_lig" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig" IS 'Ligne de programme de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."no_int_prog" IS 'No interne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."no_int_prog_adr" IS 'No interne d''adresse programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."no_int_prog_lig" IS 'No interne de ligne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'No de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'No de ligne commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."cpt_cde_fo" IS 'No de commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."no_int_lig_cde_fo" IS 'No de ligne commande fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."pt_maj" IS 'Mode de mise à jour';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."dte_calc_bes" IS 'Date de calcul des informations';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."dte_deb_cum" IS 'Date de départ des cumuls';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."qte_cum" IS 'Quantité de cumul des bons';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."qte_der_bon" IS 'Quantité du dernier bon';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."qte_retar" IS 'Quantité de retard';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."dte_intgr" IS 'Date d''intégration du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."dte_hre_imp" IS 'Date et heure impression';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig"."cd_der_ran" IS 'Code du dernier RAN';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_prog" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_bon" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnrecep" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_prog", "no_int_prog_adr", "no_int_prog_lig", "no_int_prog_bon" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon" IS 'Bons (liv ou recep) relatifs à la commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_int_prog" IS 'No interne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_int_prog_adr" IS 'No interne d''adresse programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_int_prog_lig" IS 'No interne de ligne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_int_prog_bon" IS 'No interne de ligne de bon';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'No de ligne de BL';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."no_int_lig_bnrecep" IS 'No de ligne de BR';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_bon"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_prog" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_prog_cad" integer NOT NULL,
	"des_cad" char(35) NULL,
	"qte_cad" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"dte_deb" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_fin" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_conf" "datetime" NULL,
	"pt_cad_retar" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_prev" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_mvt" char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"pt_ach_cde_cad_cl" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"pt_sld" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ident_transp" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_routage" char(35) NULL,
	"pt_enlev" "t_pt_n" NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_ran" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_prog", "no_int_prog_adr", "no_int_prog_lig", "no_int_prog_cad" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad" IS 'Cadences du programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."no_int_prog" IS 'No interne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."no_int_prog_adr" IS 'No interne d''adresse programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."no_int_prog_lig" IS 'No interne de ligne de programme';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."no_int_prog_cad" IS 'No interne de cadences';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."des_cad" IS 'Désignation de la cadence (kanban)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."qte_cad" IS 'Quantité de cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."dte_deb" IS 'Date de début de la cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."dte_fin" IS 'Date de fin de la cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."dte_conf" IS 'Date confirmée de la cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."pt_cad_retar" IS 'Pointeur de retard sur la cadence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."pt_prev" IS 'Indication d''une cadence prévisionnelle';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."pt_mvt" IS 'Pointeur de mouvement (à fabriquer/à réceptionner)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."pt_ach_cde_cad_cl" IS 'Autorisation achat composant';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."pt_sld" IS 'Pointeur de solde';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."cd_ident_transp" IS 'Identifiant transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."cd_routage" IS 'Code routage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."pt_enlev" IS 'Gestion des dates enlevement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."cd_ran" IS 'Code RAN';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."tiers_prog_adr_lig_cad"."cd_pt_dest" IS 'Point de destination';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."transf_tf" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"origine" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_tiers" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"indice" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_art_tiers" char(25) NULL,
	"indice_tiers" char(3) NULL,
	"des_art_a" char(35) NULL,
	"des_art_b" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cde" char(7) NULL,
	"coef_unit_cde" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nom_pr_art" char(25) NULL,
	"cd_vti" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_imput_anal" char(25) NULL,
	"typ_tf" char(2) NULL,
	"typ_prise_cpte" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_unit_tf" char(7) NULL,
	"coef_unit_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_deb_tf" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dte_fin_tf" timestamp NULL,
	"cd_unit_px" char(7) NULL,
	"coef_unit_px" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_inf_tf" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,
	"qte_sup_tf" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"px_unia" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"fmt_px" char(25) NULL,
	"typ_px_fact" char(2) NULL,
	"dte_hre_integ" timestamp NULL,
	"typ_err" char(1) NULL,
	"lib_err" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" timestamp NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" timestamp NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "origine", "cd_tiers", "cd_art", "dte_deb_tf", "qte_inf_tf" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."transp" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cd_tre" "t_cd" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"des_tre" char(35) NULL,
	"deno" "t_deno_ste" NULL,
	"adr_lig_a" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"adr_lig_b" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"vil" "t_des_gen" NULL,
	"tlf" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlc" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"tlx" "t_tlf_tlc_tlx" NULL,
	"cd_intl_pays" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_org" char(14) NULL,
	"nic" char(5) NULL,
	"dte_auto" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"typ_tr" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_inc" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_mode_tro" integer NULL,
	"site" char(35) NULL,
	"e_mail" char(35) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cd_tre" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."transp" IS 'Transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_tre" IS 'Code du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."des_tre" IS 'Nom du transporteur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."deno" IS 'Dénomination d''une société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."adr_lig_a" IS '1ère ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."adr_lig_b" IS '2ième ligne de l''adresse';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_post" IS 'Code postal';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."vil" IS 'Ville';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."tlf" IS 'Numéro de téléphone';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."tlc" IS 'Numéro de télécopie';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."tlx" IS 'Numéro de télex';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_intl_pays" IS 'Désignateur du code international (1ère partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_org" IS 'Code organisation (en France le no SIREN, 2ième partie du code d''identification)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."nic" IS 'NIC (complément du numéro de Siren pour construire le numéro de Siret)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."dte_auto" IS 'Date d''autorisation';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_pays" IS 'Code pays';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."typ_tr" IS 'Type Transiteur/transporteur/les Deux';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_cnd_emb" IS 'conditions d emballage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_cnd_port" IS 'conditions de port';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_inc" IS 'conditions incoterm';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."cd_mode_tro" IS 'mode de transport';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."site" IS 'Site Web';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."transp"."e_mail" IS 'e_mail';

);

CREATE TABLE "obi"."unite_suivi" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ordre" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"no_lot_int" integer NULL,
	"no_lot_ext" char(25) NULL,
	"typ_lot" char(1) NULL,
	"unit_orig" char(50) NULL,
	"unit_dest" char(50) NULL,
	"statut" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"no_int_clg" integer NULL,
	"no_int_us_det" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"no_der_etiq" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ordre", "no_int_ord_fab" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi"."no_lot_ext" IS 'Numero de lot externe';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi"."no_int_us_det" IS 'derniere valeur de numero de detail pour US';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi"."no_int_art" IS 'Numero interne article';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi"."com" IS 'Commentaire';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi"."no_der_etiq" IS 'n° dernière étiquette';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."unite_suivi_contenant" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cont" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ordre" integer NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"statut" char(1) NULL,
	"nb_unit_sto" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cont", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_ordre" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."unite_suivi_cycle" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_cycle" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ordre" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_moy" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"typ_moy" char(1) NOT NULL,
	"cd_cycle" char(8) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"no_int_opegam_of" integer NULL,
	"cd_oper" char(8) NULL,
	"no_aff" integer NULL,
	"no_oper" char(7) NULL,
	"pds_tot" numeric(19,6) NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_cycle_man" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_cycle" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi_cycle"."no_int_cycle_man" IS 'No manuel issu de la ressource';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."unite_suivi_det" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_int_ordre" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_det_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_bonne" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_rebut" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"qte_real" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"des" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_qte" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds_tot" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cmd" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_unit_util" char(3) NULL,
	"pds_unit" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"pds_tot" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"no_int_us_det" integer NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_int_ordre", "no_int_ord_fab", "no_int_us_det" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi_det"."cpt_cde_cl" IS 'numero interne de commande client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi_det"."no_int_lig_cde_cl" IS 'numero interne de ligne de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi_det"."no_int_det_lig_cde_cl" IS 'numero interne de detail de ligne de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unite_suivi_det"."no_int_us_det" IS 'compteur de numero de detail';

	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"no_unit_manu" "t_cpt" NOT NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,

	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"aut_modif" "t_auteur" NOT NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"no_int_clg" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_manu" "t_cd" NULL,
	"qte" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"typ_art_cde_cl" "t_typ1" NULL,
	"typ_unit" char(1) NULL,
	"no_ext_unit_manu" integer NULL,
	"cpt_bn_liv" integer NULL,
	"cd_cl" "t_cd" NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" "t_cpt" NULL,
	"pds_brut" "t_pds" NULL,
	"pds_net" "t_pds" NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	"fmt_pds" "t_fmt" NULL,
	"cd_pt_dch" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dch" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_pt_dest" char(17) NULL,
	"des_pt_dest" char(35) NULL,
	"nb_col_um" "t_qte" NULL DEFAULT 0,
	"cd_emp_preced" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"typ_um" char(1) NULL,
	"fmt_qte" char(20) NULL,
	"cd_emp" char(7) NULL,
	"cpt_bn_transf_lig" integer NULL,
	"no_int_clg_trans" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_unit_manu" )
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "obi"."unitmanu" IS 'Unité de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_ste" IS 'Numéro de la société';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_unit_manu" IS 'Numéro de l''unité de manutention';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_typ_etat" IS 'Code du type d''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_etat" IS 'Code de l''état';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."pt_imp_real" IS 'Pointeur impression de la demande déjà réalisée';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."dte_hre_crea" IS 'Date et heure de la création de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."dte_hre_modif" IS 'Date et heure de la modification de l''enregistrement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."aut_modif" IS 'Auteur de la dernière modification';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_unit" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_int_lig_bnliv" IS 'Numéro interne de ligne de bl facture';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_int_clg" IS 'Numéro de ligne de colisage';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_unit_manu" IS 'Code de l''unité de conditionnement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."qte" IS 'Quantité';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."typ_art_cde_cl" IS 'Type d''article commandé';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."typ_unit" IS 'type de colis';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_ext_unit_manu" IS 'Numéro manuel d''étiquette';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cpt_bn_liv" IS 'Numéro de bon de livraison client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_cl" IS 'Code client';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_cl_adr" IS 'Numero de l''adresse client (ordre de création)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."pds_brut" IS 'Poids brut';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Code de l''unité de mesure';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."fmt_pds" IS 'Format poids';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_pt_dch" IS 'Code du point de déchargement de la ligne de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."des_pt_dch" IS 'Désignation du point de déchargement de la ligne de commande';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_pt_dest" IS 'Code du point de destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."des_pt_dest" IS 'Désignation du point de destination';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."nb_col_um" IS 'Nombre colis par um';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_emp_preced" IS 'Code de l''emplacement pr+c+dent';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_lot" IS 'Code du lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_lot" IS 'num+ro du lot';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."typ_um" IS 'type de l'' UM';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cd_emp" IS 'Code de l''emplacement';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."cpt_bn_transf_lig" IS 'N ligne de bon de tranfert';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitmanu"."no_int_clg_trans" IS 'N ligne de bon de tranfert colisage';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."unitprecond" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL,
	"no_unit_precond" integer NOT NULL,
	"no_unit_cond" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit_precond" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_typ_etat" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_etat" char(25) NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnliv" integer NULL,
	"no_int_clg" integer NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"no_int_art_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"typ_art_cde_cl" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_lot" char(25) NULL,
	"no_int_ord_fab" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_orig" "datetime" NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"fmt_qte" char(20) NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cpt_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_bnstr" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art_fo" integer NULL,
	"pds_net" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_unit_pds" char(3) NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "no_unit_precond" )
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitprecond"."cpt_bnstr" IS 'Bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitprecond"."no_int_lig_bnstr" IS 'Ligne de bon de sous-traitance';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitprecond"."no_int_art_fo" IS 'No interne article fournisseur';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitprecond"."pds_net" IS 'Poids net';
COMMENT ON COLUMN "obi"."unitprecond"."cd_unit_pds" IS 'Unite de poids';
CREATE TABLE "obi"."web_cde" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_web_cde" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl_liv" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_liv" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_cl_fact" char(7) NOT NULL,
	"no_cl_adr_fact" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_ext_cde_cl" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"dte_cde_cl" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"dte_deb_liv" "datetime" NOT NULL,
	"cd_fam_orig" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_actn_orig" char(7) NULL,
	"adr_lig_a" char(35) NULL,
	"adr_lig_b" char(35) NULL,
	"adr_lig_c" char(35) NULL,
	"adr_lig_d" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_post" char(10) NULL,
	"vil" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_pays" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_stat_cde_cl" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_contr_mrq" char(1) NULL,
	"cd_rep" char(7) NULL,
	"mnt_cde" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"dte_hre_crea" "datetime" NULL,
	"dte_hre_modif" "datetime" NULL,
	"aut_modif" char(7) NULL,
	"pt_suppr" char(1) NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"dte_hre_intg" "datetime" NULL,
	"lib_err" char(500) NULL,
	"cd_mon" char(3) NULL,
	"cd_af" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_reg" char(7) NULL,
	"des_adr" char(35) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"dte_prev" "datetime" NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_web_cde" )
);
CREATE TABLE "obi"."web_cde_lig" (
	"no_ste" char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
	"cpt_web_cde" integer NOT NULL,
	"cpt_web_cde_lig" integer NOT NULL,
	"cd_ctl" char(7) NULL,
	"cd_art" char(25) NOT NULL,
	"qte" numeric(19,6) NOT NULL,
	"px_unit" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"pt_px_forc" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_typ_cde" char(1) NULL,
	"lib_typ_cde" char(35) NULL,
	"ss_option" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_remfr" char(10) NULL,
	"com" char(2048) NULL,
	"pt_suppr" char(1) NULL,
	"cpt_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_lig_cde_cl" integer NULL,
	"pt_crea_of" char(1) NULL,
	"pt_config" char(1) NULL,
	"no_int_art_cl" integer NULL,
	"no_int_art" integer NULL,
	"cd_unit" char(3) NULL,
	"indice" char(4) NULL,
	"cd_pl" char(25) NULL,
	"indice_pl" char(4) NULL,
	"des_art_a" char(35) NULL,
	"des_art_b" char(35) NULL,
	"cd_unit_cond" char(7) NULL,
	"nb_pie_col" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_emb" char(2) NULL,
	"cd_cnd_port" char(1) NULL,
	"qte_min" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"qte_max" numeric(19,6) NULL,
	"nb_rem" integer NULL,
	"no_ext_lig" integer NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY ( "no_ste", "cpt_web_cde", "cpt_web_cde_lig" )
);
